                     advntrs of hcklbry fnths ebk is fr the use of anyne anywhre at no cst and wth almstno rstrctns whtsvr yu my cpy it gve it awy or rse itndr the trms of the prjct gtnbrg lcnse incld wth thsbk or onlne at htpwgtnbrgrglcnstle advntrs of hcklbry fnthr mrk twnrlse dte agst   ebk lnge englshchrctr st encdng utf strt of ths prjct gtnbrg ebk advntrs of hcklbryfn by mrk twn ilstrtn hcklbry fnlstrtn mrk twn frm the bst by krl grhrdt                               advntrs                                   of                            hcklbry fn                        tm swyrs cmrde                    scne the mspi vly                    tme frty to fty yrs ago                                   by                              mrk twn            wth one hndrd and svntyfr ilstrtns                               nw yrk                    chrls l wbstr and cmpny                                                             cpyrght                          by sml l clmns                                                           al rghts rsrvd                      prs of j j ltle  co                  ns  to  astr plce nw yrk                                ntce                                  prsns atmptng to fnd a mtve in ths nrtve wl bprsctd prsns atmptng to fnd a mrl in it wl be bnshdprsns atmptng to fnd a plt in it wl be sht                                                  by ordr of the athr                                           pr g g chf of ordnce                              explntry                                  in ths bk a nmbr of dlcts are usd to wt the msri ngrdlct the extrmst frm of the bckwds sthwstrn dlct thrdnry pke cnty dlct and fr mdfd vrts of thslst the shdngs hve nt bn dne in a hphzrd fshn or bygswrk bt pnstkngly and wth the trstwrthy gdnce andsprt of prsnl fmlrty wth thse svrl frms of spchi mke ths explntn fr the rsn tht wtht it mny rdrswld spse tht al thse chrctrs wre tryng to tlk alke andnt scdng                                                             the athrcntntschptr icvlzng hck  ms wtsn  tm swyr wtschptr ithe bys escpe jm  trn swyrs gng  dpld plnschptr ia gd gngvr  grce trmphnt  one of tm swyrs lschptr ivhck and the jdge  sprstnchptr vhcks fthr  the fnd prnt  rfrmchptr vhe wnt fr jdge thtchr  hck dcd to lve  pltclcnmy  thrshng arndchptr vlyng fr hm  lckd in the cbn  snkng the bdy  rstngchptr vslpng in the wds  rsng the d  explrng the islnd fndng jm  jms escpe  sgns  blmchptr ixthe cve  the fltng hschptr xthe fnd  old hnk bnkr  in dsgschptr xhck and the wmn  the srch  prvrctn  gng to gshnchptr xslw nvgtn  brwng thngs  brdng the wrck  thpltrs  hntng fr the btchptr xscpng frm the wrck  the wtchmn  snkngchptr xva gnrl gd tme  the hrm  frnchchptr xvhck ls the rft  in the fg  hck fnds the rft  trshchptr xvxpctn  a whte le  fltng crncy  rng by cro swmng ashrchptr xvn evng cl  the frm in arknsw  intr dcrtns stphn dwlng bts  ptcl efsnschptr xvcl grngrfrd  arstcrcy  fds  the tstmnt  rcvrngthe rft  the wd  ple  prk and cbgchptr xtyng up dy  tms  an astrnmcl thry  rng a tmprncrvl  the dke of brdgwtr  the trbls of ryltychptr xhck explns  lyng ot a cmpgn  wrkng the cmp  mtng a prte at the cmp  mtng  the dke as a prntrchptr xswrd exrcse  hmlts slqy  thy lfd arnd twn  alzy twn  old bgs  dchptr xshrbrn  atndng the crcs  intxctn in the rng  ththrlng trgdychptr xsld  ryl cmprsns  jm gts hmsckchptr xvjm in ryl rbs  thy tke a psngr  gtng infrmtn fmly grfchptr xvs it thm  sngng the dxlgr  awfl sqre  fnrl orgs a bd invstmnt chptr xva ps kng  the kngs clrgy  she askd hs prdn  hdng inthe rm  hck tks the mnychptr xvthe fnrl  stsfyng crsty  spcs of hck  qck slsnd smlchptr xvthe trp to englnd  the brte  mry jne dcds to lve  hckprtng wth mry jne  mps  the opstn lnchptr xcntstd rltnshp  the kng explns the ls  a qstn ofhndwrtng  dgng up the crpse  hck escpschptr xthe kng wnt fr hm  a ryl rw  pwrfl mlwchptr xmns plns  nws frm jm  old rclctns  a shp stry vlble infrmtnchptr xstl and sndy  lke  mstkn idnty  up a stmp  in adlmchptr xa ngr stlr  sthrn hsptlty  a prty lng blsng tr and fthrschptr xvthe ht by the ash hpr  otrgs  clmbng the lghtng rd trbld wth wtchschptr xvscpng prprly  drk schms  dscrmntn in stlng  adp hlchptr xvthe lghtng rd  hs lvl bst  a bqst to pstrty  a hghfgrchptr xvthe lst shrt  mng arnd  slng ordrs  the wtch pchptr xvthe ct of arms  a skld sprntndnt  unplsnt glry  atrfl sbjctchptr xrts  lvly bd  flws  the strw dmychptr xlfshng  the vglnce cmte  a lvly rn  jm advs adctrchptr xlthe dctr  uncle sls  str htchks  ant sly in trblchptr xltm swyr wnd  the dctrs stry  tm cnfs  ant plyrvs  hnd ot thm ltrschptr the lst of bndge  pyng the cptve  yrs trly hck fnlstrtns    hcklbry fn    mrk twn frm the bst by krl grhrdt    the wdws    lrng abt ms and the blrshrs    ms wtsn    hck stlng awy    thy tptd alng    jm    tm swyrs bnd of rbrs    hck crps into hs wndw    ms wtsns lctre    the rbrs dsprsd    rbng the lmp            jdge thtchr srprsd    jm lstng    p    hck and hs fthr    rfrmng the drnkrd    flng frm grce    gtng ot of the wy    sld cmfrt    thnkng it ovr    rsng a hwl    gt up    the shnty    shtng the pg    tkng a rst    in the wds    wtchng the bt    dscvrng the cmp fre    jm and the ghst    msto brdshs ngr    explrng the cve    in the cve    jm s a d mn    thy fnd eght dlrs    jm and the snke    old hnk bnkr    a fr ft    cme in    hm and anthr mn    she pts up a snck    hmp yrslf    on the rft    he smtms lftd a chckn    plse dnt bl    it ant gd mrls    oh lrdy lrdy    in a fx    hlo whts up    the wrck    we trnd in and slpt    trng ovr the trck    slmn and hs mln wvs    the stry of slrmn    we wld sl the rft    amng the sncks    aslp on the rft    it amntd to smthng bng a rftsmn    by thts a le    hre i is hck    clmbng up the bnk    whs thre    bck    it mde hr lk spdry    thy gt hm ot and empd hm    the hse    cl grngrfrd    yng hrny shphrdsn    ms chrlte    and askd me if i lkd hr    bhnd the wdple    hdng dytms    and dgs acmng    by rghts i am a dke    i am the lte dphn    tl pce    on the rft    the kng as jlt    crtng on the sly    a prte fr thrty yrs    anthr ltle jb    prctcng    hmlts slqy    gme a chw    a ltle mnthly drnk    the dth of bgs    shrbrn stps ot    a d hd    he shd svntn sts    trgdy    thr pckts blgd    hnry the eghth in bstn hrbr    hrmls    adlphs    he frly emptd tht yng flw    als or pr brthrs    yu bt it is    lkng    mkng up the dfst    gng fr hm    the dctr    the bg of mny    the cby    spr wth the hrlp    hnst injn    the dke lks undr the bd    hck tks the mny    a crck in the dngrm dr    the undrtkr    he hd a rt    ws yu in my rm    jwng    in trble    indgntn    hw to fnd thm    he wrte    hnr wth the mps    the actn    the tre brthrs    the dctr lds hck    the dke wrte    gntlmngntlmn    jm lt ot    the kng shks hck    the dke wnt fr hm    spnsh ms    who nld hm    thnkng    he gve hm tn cnts    strkng fr the bck cntry    stl and sndy lke    she hgd hm tght    who do yu rckn it is    it ws tm swyr    mr archbld nchls i prsme    a prty lng blsng    trvlng by rl    vtls    a smple jb    wtchs    gtng wd    one of the bst athrts    the brkfsthrn    smchng the knvs    gng dwn the lghtngrd    stlng spns    tm advs a wtch pe    the rbgple    ms dys a sht gne    in a trng wy    one of hs ancstrs    jms ct of arms    a tgh jb    btns on thr tls    irgtn    kpng of dl tms    trble is brwng    fshng    evry one hd a gn    tm cght on a splntr    jm advs a dctr    the dctr    uncle sls in dngr    old mrs htchks    ant sly tlks to hck    tm swyr wnd    the dctr spks fr jm    tm rse sqre up in bd    hnd ot thm ltrs    ot of bndge    tms lbrlty    the end yrs trly hck fnlstrtn the wdwsthe advntrs of hcklbry fnchptr iyu dnt knw abt me wtht yu hve rd a bk by the nme of thdvntrs of tm swyr bt tht ant no mtr  tht bk ws mdby mr mrk twn and he tld the trth mnly  thre ws thngswhch he strtchd bt mnly he tld the trth  tht is nthng  invr sn anybdy bt ld one tme or anthr wtht it ws antply or the wdw or mybe mry  ant plytms ant ply shsnd mry and the wdw dgls is al tld abt in tht bk whchs mstly a tre bk wth sme strtchrs as i sd bfrnw the wy tht the bk wnds up is ths  tm and me fnd the mnytht the rbrs hd in the cve and it mde us rch  we gt sxthsnd dlrs apcl gld  it ws an awfl sght of mny whnt ws pld up  wl jdge thtchr he tk it and pt it ot atntrst and it ftchd us a dlr a dy apce al the yrndmre thn a bdy cld tl wht to do wth  the wdw dglshe tk me fr hr sn and alwd she wld svlze me bt it wsrgh lvng in the hse al the tme cnsdrng hw dsml rglrnd dcnt the wdw ws in al hr wys and so whn i cldnt stndt no lngr i lt ot  i gt into my old rgs and my sgrhgshdgn and ws fre and stsfd  bt tm swyr he hntd me up andsd he ws gng to strt a bnd of rbrs and i mght jn if iwld go bck to the wdw and be rspctble  so i wnt bckthe wdw she crd ovr me and cld me a pr lst lmb and shcld me a lt of othr nms to bt she nvr mnt no hrm by itshe pt me in thm nw clths agn and i cldnt do nthng btswt and swt and fl al crmpd up  wl thn the old thngcmncd agn  the wdw rng a bl fr spr and yu hd to cmto tme whn yu gt to the tble yu cldnt go rght to etng btyu hd to wt fr the wdw to tck dwn hr hd and grmble a ltlvr the vctls thgh thre wrnt rly anythng the mtr wththmtht is nthng only evrythng ws ckd by itslf  in abrl of ods and ends it is dfrnt thngs gt mxd up and thjce knd of swps arnd and the thngs go btrftr spr she gt ot hr bk and lrnd me abt ms and thblrshrs and i ws in a swt to fnd ot al abt hm bt by andby she lt it ot tht ms hd bn d a cnsdrble lng tme sthn i dnt cre no mre abt hm bcse i dnt tke no stck ind plstrtn lrng abt ms and the blrshrsprty sn i wntd to smke and askd the wdw to lt me  bt shwldnt  she sd it ws a mn prctce and wsnt cln and i mstry to nt do it any mre  tht is jst the wy wth sme ple  thygt dwn on a thng whn thy dnt knw nthng abt it  hre she wsbthrng abt ms whch ws no kn to hr and no use to anybdybng gne yu se yt fndng a pwr of flt wth me fr dng athng tht hd sme gd in it  and she tk snf to of crse thtws al rght bcse she dne it hrslfhr str ms wtsn a tlrble slm old md wth gls on hdjst cme to lve wth hr and tk a st at me nw wth a splngbk she wrkd me mdlng hrd fr abt an hr and thn the wdwmde hr ese up  i cldnt std it mch lngr  thn fr an hr itws dly dl and i ws fdgty  ms wtsn wld sy dnt ptyr ft up thre hcklbry and dnt scrnch up lke ththcklbryst up strght and prty sn she wld sy dnt gpnd strtch lke tht hcklbrywhy dnt yu try to bhve  thnshe tld me al abt the bd plce and i sd i wshd i ws thrshe gt md thn bt i dnt mn no hrm  al i wntd ws to gsmwhrs al i wntd ws a chnge i wrnt prtclr  she sd itws wckd to sy wht i sd sd she wldnt sy it fr the whlwrld she ws gng to lve so as to go to the gd plce  wl icldnt se no advntge in gng whre she ws gng so i mde up mymnd i wldnt try fr it  bt i nvr sd so bcse it wld onlymke trble and wldnt do no gdlstrtn ms wtsnw she hd gt a strt and she wnt on and tld me al abt the gdplce  she sd al a bdy wld hve to do thre ws to go arnd aldy lng wth a hrp and sng frvr and evr  so i dnt thnk mchf it bt i nvr sd so  i askd hr if she rcknd tm swyrwld go thre and she sd nt by a cnsdrble sght  i ws gldbt tht bcse i wntd hm and me to be tgthrms wtsn she kpt pckng at me and it gt trsme and lnsme bynd by thy ftchd the ngrs in and hd pryrs and thn evrybdyws of to bd  i wnt up to my rm wth a pce of cndle and pt itn the tble  thn i st dwn in a chr by the wndw and trd thnk of smthng chrfl bt it wrnt no use  i flt so lnsme imst wshd i ws d  the strs wre shng and the lvs rstldn the wds evr so mrnfl and i hrd an owl awy of whwhngbt smbdy tht ws d and a whpwl and a dg cryng abtsmbdy tht ws gng to de and the wnd ws tryng to whsprsmthng to me and i cldnt mke ot wht it ws and so it mde thcld shvrs rn ovr me thn awy ot in the wds i hrd tht kndf a snd tht a ghst mks whn it wnts to tl abt smthngthts on its mnd and cnt mke itslf undrstd and so cnt rstsy in its grve and hs to go abt tht wy evry nght grvng  igt so dwnhrtd and scrd i d wsh i hd sme cmpny  prtysn a spdr wnt crwlng up my shldr and i flpd it of and itlt in the cndle and bfre i cld bdge it ws al shrvld up  idnt nd anybdy to tl me tht tht ws an awfl bd sgn and wldftch me sme bd lck so i ws scrd and mst shk the clths of me i gt up and trnd arnd in my trcks thre tms and crsdmy brst evry tme and thn i td up a ltle lck of my hr wth athrd to kp wtchs awy  bt i hdnt no cnfdnce  yu do thtwhn yve lst a hrshe tht yve fnd instd of nlng it upvr the dr bt i hdnt evr hrd anybdy sy it ws any wy tkp of bd lck whn yd kld a spdri st dwn agn ashkng al ovr and gt ot my pe fr a smkfr the hse ws al as stl as dth nw and so the wdw wldntknw wl aftr a lng tme i hrd the clck awy of in the twn gbmbmbmtwlve lcks and al stl agnstlr thn evrprty sn i hrd a twg snp dwn in the drk amngst thtrsmthng ws a strng  i st stl and lstnd  drctly icld jst brly hr a myw myw dwn thre  tht ws gdsys i myw myw as sft as i cld and thn i pt ot thlght and scrmbld ot of the wndw on to the shd  thn i slpdwn to the grnd and crwld in amng the trs and sre enghthre ws tm swyr wtng fr mlstrtn hck stlng awylstrtn thy tptd alngchptr iwe wnt tptng alng a pth amngst the trs bck twrds the end ofthe wdws grdn stpng dwn so as the brnchs wldnt scrpe orhds whn we ws psng by the ktchn i fl ovr a rt and mde anse  we scrchd dwn and ld stl  ms wtsns bg ngrnmd jm ws stng in the ktchn dr we cld se hm prtyclr bcse thre ws a lght bhnd hm  he gt up and strtchdhs nck ot abt a mnte lstng  thn he syswho dhe lstnd sme mre thn he cme tptng dwn and std rghtbtwn us we cld a tchd hm nrly  wl lkly it ws mntsnd mnts tht thre wrnt a snd and we al thre so clstgthr  thre ws a plce on my ankle tht gt to itchng bt idsnt scrtch it and thn my er bgn to itch and nxt my bckrght btwn my shldrs  smd lke id de if i cldnt scrtchwl ive ntcd tht thng plnty tms snce  if yu are wth thqlty or at a fnrl or tryng to go to slp whn yu antslpyf yu are anywhrs whre it wnt do fr yu to scrtch whyu wl itch al ovr in upwrds of a thsnd plcs prty sn jmsysy who is yu  whr is yu  dg my cts ef i dn hr smfnwl i knw wht is gwyne to do  is gwyne to st dwn hre andlstn tl i hrs it agnlstrtn jmso he st dwn on the grnd btwxt me and tm  he lnd hs bck upgnst a tre and strtchd hs lgs ot tl one of thm mst tchdne of mne  my nse bgn to itch  it itchd tl the trs cme intmy eys  bt i dsnt scrtch  thn it bgn to itch on the insdnxt i gt to itchng undrnth  i dnt knw hw i ws gng to ststl ths msrblns wnt on as mch as sx or svn mnts bt smd a sght lngr thn tht  i ws itchng in elvn dfrntplcs nw  i rcknd i cldnt stnd it mrn a mnte lngr bti st my th hrd and gt rdy to try  jst thn jm bgn tbrthe hvy nxt he bgn to snrnd thn i ws prty sncmfrtble agntm he mde a sgn to mknd of a ltle nse wth hs mthnd wnt crpng awy on or hnds and kns  whn we ws tn ft of tmwhsprd to me and wntd to te jm to the tre fr fn  bt i sdno he mght wke and mke a dstrbnce and thn thyd fnd ot iwrnt in thn tm sd he hdnt gt cndls engh and he wld slpn the ktchn and gt sme mre  i dnt wnt hm to try  i sd jmght wke up and cme  bt tm wntd to rsk it so we sld in thrnd gt thre cndls and tm ld fve cnts on the tble fr pythn we gt ot and i ws in a swt to gt awy bt nthng wld dtm bt he mst crwl to whre jm ws on hs hnds and kns and plysmthng on hm  i wtd and it smd a gd whle evrythng wso stl and lnsms sn as tm ws bck we ct alng the pth arnd the grdn fncnd by and by ftchd up on the stp tp of the hl the othr sde ofthe hse  tm sd he slpd jms ht of of hs hd and hng it ona lmb rght ovr hm and jm strd a ltle bt he dnt wkftrwrds jm sd the wtchs be wtchd hm and pt hm in a trncnd rde hm al ovr the ste and thn st hm undr the trs agnd hng hs ht on a lmb to shw who dne it  and nxt tme jm tldt he sd thy rde hm dwn to nw orlns and aftr tht evrytme he tld it he sprd it mre and mre tl by and by he sd thyrde hm al ovr the wrld and trd hm mst to dth and hs bckws al ovr sdlbls  jm ws mnstrs prd abt it and he gtso he wldnt hrdly ntce the othr ngrs  ngrs wld cmls to hr jm tl abt it and he ws mre lkd up to thn anyngr in tht cntry  strnge ngrs wld stnd wth thr mthspn and lk hm al ovr sme as if he ws a wndr  ngrs islwys tlkng abt wtchs in the drk by the ktchn fre btwhnvr one ws tlkng and ltng on to knw al abt sch thngsjm wld hpn in and sy hm  wht yu knw bt wtchs andtht ngr ws crkd up and hd to tke a bck st  jm alwys kptht fvcntr pce rnd hs nck wth a strng and sd it ws achrm the dvl gve to hm wth hs own hnds and tld hm he cldcre anybdy wth it and ftch wtchs whnvr he wntd to jst bysyng smthng to it bt he nvr tld wht it ws he sd to itngrs wld cme frm al arnd thre and gve jm anythng thy hdjst fr a sght of tht fvcntr pce bt thy wldnt tch itbcse the dvl hd hd hs hnds on it  jm ws mst rnd fr asrvnt bcse he gt stck up on acnt of hvng sn the dvl andbn rde by wtchswl whn tm and me gt to the edge of the hltp we lkd awy dwnto the vlge and cld se thre or fr lghts twnklng whrthre ws sck flks mybe and the strs ovr us ws sprklng evr sfne and dwn by the vlge ws the rvr a whle mle brd andwfl stl and grnd  we wnt dwn the hl and fnd jo hrpr andbn rgrs and two or thre mre of the bys hd in the old tnyrdso we unhtchd a skf and pld dwn the rvr two mle and a hlfto the bg scr on the hlsde and wnt ashrwe wnt to a clmp of bshs and tm mde evrybdy swr to kp thscrt and thn shwd thm a hle in the hl rght in the thckstprt of the bshs  thn we lt the cndls and crwld in on orhnds and kns  we wnt abt two hndrd yrds and thn the cvpnd up tm pkd abt amngst the psgs and prty sn dckdndr a wl whre yu wldnt a ntcd tht thre ws a hle  wnt alng a nrw plce and gt into a knd of rm al dmp andswty and cld and thre we stpd  tm sysnw wl strt ths bnd of rbrs and cl it tm swyrs gngvrybdy tht wnts to jn hs gt to tke an oth and wrte hs nmn bldlstrtn tm swyrs bnd of rbrsvrybdy ws wlng  so tm gt ot a sht of pr tht he hdwrte the oth on and rd it  it swre evry by to stck to thbnd and nvr tl any of the scrts and if anybdy dne anythng tny by in the bnd whchvr by ws ordrd to kl tht prsn andhs fmly mst do it and he mstnt et and he mstnt slp tl hd kld thm and hckd a crs in thr brsts whch ws the sgnf the bnd and nbdy tht dnt blng to the bnd cld use thtmrk and if he d he mst be sd and if he dne it agn he mst bkld  and if anybdy tht blngd to the bnd tld the scrts hmst hve hs thrt ct and thn hve hs crcs brnt up and thshs sctrd al arnd and hs nme bltd of of the lst wthbld and nvr mntnd agn by the gng bt hve a crse pt on itnd be frgt frvrvrybdy sd it ws a rl btfl oth and askd tm if he gt it of hs own hd  he sd sme of it bt the rst ws ot ofprtbks and rbrbks and evry gng tht ws hghtnd hdtsme thght it wld be gd to kl the fmls of bys tht tld thscrts  tm sd it ws a gd ida so he tk a pncl and wrte itn thn bn rgrs syshrs hck fn he hnt gt no fmly wht yu gng to do bthmwl hnt he gt a fthr sys tm swyrys hs gt a fthr bt yu cnt nvr fnd hm thse dys  hsd to ly drnk wth the hgs in the tnyrd bt he hnt bn sn thse prts fr a yr or mrthy tlkd it ovr and thy ws gng to rle me ot bcse thysd evry by mst hve a fmly or smbdy to kl or else itwldnt be fr and sqre fr the othrs  wl nbdy cld thnk ofnythng to dvrybdy ws stmpd and st stl  i ws mst rdyto cry bt al at once i thght of a wy and so i ofrd thm mswtsnthy cld kl hr  evrybdy sdh shl do  thts al rght  hck cn cme inthn thy al stck a pn in thr fngrs to gt bld to sgn wthnd i mde my mrk on the prnw sys bn rgrs whts the lne of bsns of ths gngnthng only rbry and mrdr tm sdbt who are we gng to if it ws gd and thn he sd he wsgng dwn twn to gt sme whsky sd he hdnt hd a drnk al dywhn he hd gt ot on the shd he pt hs hd in agn and csd mfr ptng on frls and tryng to be btr thn hm and whn ircknd he up the mny bt he cldnt and thnhe swre hd mke the lw frce hmthe jdge and the wdw wnt to lw to gt the crt to tke me awyfrm hm and lt one of thm be my grdn bt it ws a nw jdge ththd jst cme and he dnt knw the old mn so he sd crts mstntntrfre and sprte fmls if thy cld hlp it sd hd drthrnt tke a chld awy frm its fthr  so jdge thtchr and the wdwhd to qt on the bsnstht plsd the old mn tl he cldnt rst  he of hmso he tk hm to hs own hse and drsd hm up cln and nce andhd hm to brkfst and dnr and spr wth the fmly and ws jstld pe to hm so to spk  and aftr spr he tlkd to hm abtmprnce and sch thngs tl the old a shtgn mybe bt he dnt knw no othr wylstrtn flng frm grclstrtn gtng ot of the wychptr vwl prty sn the old mn ws up and arnd agn and thn he wntfr jdge thtchr in the crts to mke hm gve up tht mny and knwd why i ws gng to lve tht  i ftchdt the gn and nw i ws dni hd wre the grnd a gd dl crwlng ot of the hle and drgngt so mny thngs  so i fxd tht as gd as i cld frm the otsdby sctrng dst on the plce whch cvrd up the smthns and thswdst  thn i fxd the pce of lg bck into its plce and pt twrcks undr it and one agnst it to hld it thre fr it ws bnt upt tht plce and dnt qte tch grnd  if yu std fr or fvft awy and dnt knw it ws swd yu wldnt nvr ntce itnd bsds ths ws the bck of the cbn and it wrnt lklynybdy wld go flng arnd thrt ws al grs clr to the cne so i hdnt lft a trck  iflwd arnd to se  i std on the bnk and lkd ot ovr thrvr  al sfe  so i tk the gn and wnt up a pce into the wdsnd ws hntng arnd fr sme brds whn i se a wld pg hgs snwnt wld in thm btms aftr thy hd gt awy frm the prfrms i sht and ld hm dwn the grnd to bld i sy grnd bcse it ws grndhrd pckdnd no brds  wl nxt i tk an old sck and pt a lt of bg rcksn itl i cld drgnd i strtd it frm the pg and drgd it the dr and thrgh the wds dwn to the rvr and dmpd it in andwn it snk ot of sght  yu cld esy se tht smthng hd bndrgd ovr the grnd  i d wsh tm swyr ws thre i knwd hwld tke an intrst in ths knd of bsns and thrw in the fncytchs  nbdy cld sprd hmslf lke tm swyr in sch a thng asthtwl lst i pld ot sme of my hr and bld the axe gd andstck it on the bck sde and slng the axe in the crnr  thn i tkp the pg and hld hm to my brst wth my jckt so he cldntdrp tl i gt a gd pce blw the hse and thn dmpd hm inthe rvr  nw i thght of smthng else  so i wnt and gt the bgf ml and my old sw ot of the cne and ftchd thm to the hsi tk the bg to whre it usd to stnd and rpd a hle in thbtm of it wth the sw fr thre wrnt no knvs and frks on thplcp dne evrythng wth hs clspknfe abt the ckng  thni crd the sck abt a hndrd yrds acrs the grs and thrghthe wlws the mlsftd ot and mde a ltle trck al the wy to the lke  i drpdps whtstne thre to so as to lk lke it hd bn dne bycdnt thn i td up the rp in the ml sck wth a strng so itwldnt lk no mre and tk it and my sw to the cne agnt ws abt drk nw so i drpd the cne dwn the rvr undr smwlws tht hng ovr the bnk and wtd fr the mn to rse  imde fst to a wlw thn i tk a bte to et and by and by ldwn in the cne to smke a pe and ly ot a pln  i sys to myslfthyl flw the trck of tht sckfl of rcks to the shre and thndrg the rvr fr me  and thyl flw tht ml trck to the lknd go brwsng dwn the crk tht lds ot of it to fnd the rbrstht kld me and tk the thngs  thy wnt evr hnt the rvr frnythng bt my d crcs thyl sn gt trd of tht and wntbthr no mre abt me  al rght i cn stp anywhre i wnt tjcksns islnd is gd engh fr me i knw tht islnd prty wlnd nbdy evr cms thre  and thn i cn pdle ovr to twn nghtsnd slnk arnd and pck up thngs i wnt jcksns islnds thplci ws prty trd and the frst thng i knwd i ws aslp  whn iwke up i dnt knw whre i ws fr a mnte  i st up and lkdrnd a ltle scrd  thn i rmbrd  the rvr lkd mls andmls acrs  the mn ws so brght i cld a cntd the drft lgstht wnt aslpng alng blck and stl hndrds of yrds ot frmshre evrythng ws d qt and it lkd lte and smlt ltyu knw wht i mni dnt knw the wrds to pt it ini tk a gd gp and a strtch and ws jst gng to unhtch and strtwhn i hrd a snd awy ovr the wtr  i lstnd  prty sn imde it ot  it ws tht dl knd of a rglr snd tht cms frmrs wrkng in rwlcks whn its a stl nght  i pd ot thrghthe wlw brnchs and thre it wsa skf awy acrs the wtr  icldnt tl hw mny ws in it  it kpt acmng and whn it wsbrst of me i se thre wrnt bt one mn in it  thnks i mybts p thgh i wrnt expctng hm  he drpd blw me wth thcrnt and by and by he cme aswngng up shre in the esy wtrnd he wnt by so clse i cld a rchd ot the gn and tchd hmwl it ws p sre enghnd sbr to by the wy he ld hsrsi dnt lse no tme  the nxt mnte i ws aspng dwn strmsft bt qck in the shde of the bnk  i mde two mle and a hlfnd thn strck ot a qrtr of a mle or mre twrds the mdle ofthe rvr bcse prty sn i wld be psng the fry lndng andple mght se me and hl me  i gt ot amngst the drftwd andthn ld dwn in the btm of the cne and lt hr fltlstrtn wtr sch nghts  i hrd pltlkng at the fry lndng i hrd wht thy sd tvry wrd oft  one mn sd it ws gtng twrds the lng dys and the shrtnghts nw  thr one sd ths wrnt one of the shrt ons hrckndnd thn thy lghd of the mdle of the rvr bg and drk and sld lka stmbt wtht any lghts  thre wrnt any sgns of the br athe hdt ws al undr wtr nwt dnt tke me lng to gt thre  i sht pst the hd at a rpngrte the crnt ws so to wh dy wrnt no hs  id mde up my mne btwht is agwyne to do  yu se ef i kp on tryn to gt awy aftde dgs ud trck me ef i stle a skft to crs ovr dyd ms dtskft yu se en dyd knw bt wh id ln on de ythr sde enwh to pck up my trck  so i sys a rf is wht is artr it dnmke no trcki se a lght acmn rn de pnt bymby so i wde in en shve alg ahd o me en swm mrn hlf wy acrst de rvr en gt inmngst de drftwd en kp my hd dwn lw en kndr swm agn dcrnt tl de rf cme alng  dn i swm to de strn uv it en tckhlt  it cld up en uz pty drk fr a ltle whle  so i clmbp en ld dwn on de plnks  de mn uz al wy yndr in de mdlwh de ms dwn to de hd er dsln a mn bgn to cme aft wd de lntrn i se it wrnt no usfr to wt so i sld ovrbrd en strck ot fr de isln  wl ihd a ntn i cld ln ms anywhrs bt i cldntbnk to blfi uz ms to de ft er de isln bfo i fnd a gd plce  i wntnto de wds en jdgd i wldn fl wd rfs no mo lng as dymve de lntrn rn so  i hd my pe en a plg er dglg en smtchs in my cp en dy wrnt wt so i uz al rghtnd so yu ant hd no mt nr brd to et al ths tme  whydnt yu gt mdtrklshw yu gwyne to gt m  yu cnt slp up on um en grb um en hwsa bdy gwyne to ht um wd a rck  hw cld a bdy do it in de nghtn i wrnt gwyne to shw mysf on de bnk in de dytmwl thts so  yve hd to kp in the wds al the tme ofcrse d yu hr em shtng the cnh ys  i knwd dy ws artr yu  i se um go by hwtchd umtho de bshsme yng brds cme alng flyng a yrd or two at a tme andlghtng jm sd it ws a sgn it ws gng to rn  he sd it ws asgn whn yng chckns flw tht wy and so he rcknd it ws thsme wy whn yng brds dne it  i ws gng to ctch sme of thmbt jm wldnt lt me  he sd it ws dth  he sd hs fthr ldmghty sck once and sme of thm ctchd a brd and hs old grnysd hs fthr wld de and he dnd jm sd yu mstnt cnt the thngs yu are gng to ck frdnr bcse tht wld brng bd lck  the sme if yu shk thtblclth aftr sndwn  and he sd if a mn ownd a bhve andtht mn d the bs mst be tld abt it bfre snp nxtmrng or else the bs wld al wkn dwn and qt wrk and djm sd bs wldnt stng idts bt i dnt blve tht bcsi hd trd thm lts of tms myslf and thy wldnt stng mi hd hrd abt sme of thse thngs bfre bt nt al of thm  jmknwd al knds of sgns  he sd he knwd mst evrythng  i sdt lkd to me lke al the sgns ws abt bd lck and so i askdhm if thre wrnt any gdlck sgns  he sysmghty fwn dy ant no use to a bdy  wht yu wnt to knw whngd lcks acmn fr  wnt to kp it of  and he sd  efys gt hry arms en a hry brs its a sgn dt ys agwyne tbe rch wl dys sme use in a sgn lke dt kse its so frhd yu se mybe ys gt to be po a lng tme fst en so ymght gt dscrge en kl ysf f yu dn knw by de sgn dtyu gwyne to be rch bymbyhve yu gt hry arms and a hry brst jmwhts de use to ax dt qstn  dnt yu se i hswl are yu rchno bt i bn rch wnst and gwyne to be rch agn  wnst i hdftn dlrs bt i tck to spcltn en gt bstd otwht d yu spclte in jmwl fst i tckld stckwht knd of stckwhy lve stckctle yu knw  i pt tn dlrs in a cw  bt in gwyne to rsk no mo mny in stck  de cw up n d on myhnso yu lst the tn dlrsno i dnt lse it al  i ony ls bt ne of it  i sle dhde en tlr fr a dlr en tn cntsyu hd fve dlrs and tn cnts lft  d yu spclte any mrlstrtn msto brdshs ngrys  yu knw tht onlgd ngr dt blngs to old mstbrdsh wl he st up a bnk en sy anybdy dt pt in a dlrwld gt fo dlrs mo at de en er de yr  wl al de ngrswnt in bt dy dnt hve mch  i wz de ony one dt hd mch  si stck ot fr mo dn fo dlrs en i sd f i dn gt it idstrt a bnk mysf wl o crse dt ngr wnt to kp me ot erde bsns bkse he sys dy wrnt bsns ngh fr two bnks she sy i cld pt in my fve dlrs en he py me thrtyfve at de enr de yrso i dne it  dn i rcknd id invs de thrtyfve dlrs rghtf en kp thngs amvn  dy wz a ngr nme b dt hdktchd a wdflt en hs mrstr dn knw it en i bght it ofnhm en tld hm to tke de thrtyfve dlrs whn de en er de yrcme bt smbdy stle de wdflt dt nght en nx dy de onlgd ngr sy de bnks bstd  so dy dn ne uv us gt nmnywht d yu do wth the tn cnts jmwl i uz gwyne to spn it bt i hd a drm en de drm tle mto gve it to a ngr nme blmblms as dy cl hm fr shrths one er dm chcklhds yu knw  bt hs lcky dy sy en ise i wrnt lcky  de drm sy lt blm invs de tn cnts en hdmke a rse fr me  wl blm he tck de mny en whn he wz inchrch he hr de prchr sy dt whvr gve to de po ln to dlrd en bn to gt hs mny bck a hnd tms  so blm he tckn gve de tn cnts to de po en ld lw to se wht wz gwyne tcme of itwl wht d cme of it jmnfn nvr cme of it  i cldn mnge to klck dt mny no wyn blm he cldn  i an gwyne to ln no mo mny dt i se dscrty  bn to gt yo mny bck a hnd tms de prchr sysf i cld gt de tn cnts bck id cl it sqh en be gld er dchnstwl its al rght anywy jm lng as yre gng to be rch agnsme tme or othrys en is rch nw cme to lk at it  i owns mysf en is wthght hnd dlrs  i wsht i hd de mny i wldn wnt no mlstrtn explrng the cvchptr ixi wntd to go and lk at a plce rght abt the mdle of the islndtht id fnd whn i ws explrng so we strtd and sn gt to itbcse the islnd ws only thre mls lng and a qrtr of a mlwdths plce ws a tlrble lng stp hl or rdge abt frty fthgh we hd a rgh tme gtng to the tp the sds ws so stp andthe bshs so thck  we trmpd and clmb arnd al ovr it and bynd by fnd a gd bg cvrn in the rck mst up to the tp on thsde twrds ilns  the cvrn ws as bg as two or thre rmsbnchd tgthr and jm cld stnd up strght in it  it ws cl inthre jm ws fr ptng or trps in thre rght awy bt i sd wdnt wnt to be clmbng up and dwn thre al the tmjm sd if we hd the cne hd in a gd plce and hd al the trpsn the cvrn we cld rsh thre if anybdy ws to cme to the islndnd thy wld nvr fnd us wtht dgs  and bsds he sd thmltle brds hd sd it ws gng to rn and d i wnt the thngs tgt wtso we wnt bck and gt the cne and pdld up abrst the cvrnd lgd al the trps up thre  thn we hntd up a plce clse byto hde the cne in amngst the thck wlws  we tk sme fsh of the lns and st thm agn and bgn to gt rdy fr dnrthe dr of the cvrn ws bg engh to rl a hgshd in and on onsde of the dr the flr stck ot a ltle bt and ws flt and agd plce to bld a fre on  so we blt it thre and ckd dnrlstrtn in the cvwe sprd the blnkts insde fr a crpt and et or dnr in thrwe pt al the othr thngs hndy at the bck of the cvrn  prtysn it drknd up and bgn to thndr and lghtn so the brds wsrght abt it  drctly it bgn to rn and it rnd lke al fryto and i nvr se the wnd blw so  it ws one of thse rglrsmr strms  it wld gt so drk tht it lkd al blblcktsde and lvly and the rn wld thrsh alng by so thck ththe trs of a ltle wys lkd dm and spdrwby and hre wldcme a blst of wnd tht wld bnd the trs dwn and trn up the plndrsde of the lvs and thn a prfct rpr of a gst wldflw alng and st the brnchs to tsng thr arms as if thy wsjst wld and nxt whn it ws jst abt the blst and blckstfst ws as brght as glry and yd hve a ltle glmpse of trtpsplngng abt awy of yndr in the strm hndrds of yrds frthrthn yu cld se bfre drk as sn agn in a scnd and nw ydhr the thndr lt go wth an awfl crsh and thn go rmblngrmblng tmblng dwn the sky twrds the undr sde of the wrldlke rlng empty brls dwn strswhre its lng strs and thybnce a gd dl yu knwjm ths is nce i sys  i wldnt wnt to be nwhre else bthre ps me alng anthr hnk of fsh and sme ht crnbrdwl yu wldnt a bn hre f it hdnt a bn fr jm  yd a bndwn dh in de wds wdt any dnr en gtn ms drwnd tdt yu wld hny  chckns knws whn its gwyne to rn en so de brds chlthe rvr wnt on rsng and rsng fr tn or twlve dys tl atlst it ws ovr the bnks  the wtr ws thre or fr ft dp onthe islnd in the lw plcs and on the ilns btm  on tht sdt ws a gd mny mls wde bt on the msri sde it ws the smld dstnce acrsa hlf a mlbcse the msri shre ws jst awl of hgh blfsdytms we pdld al ovr the islnd in the cne it ws mghty clnd shdy in the dp wds evn if the sn ws blzng otsde  wnt wndng in and ot amngst the trs and smtms the vns hngso thck we hd to bck awy and go sme othr wy  wl on evry oldbrkndwn tre yu cld se rbts and snks and sch thngs andwhn the islnd hd bn ovrflwd a dy or two thy gt so tme oncnt of bng hngry tht yu cld pdle rght up and pt yrhnd on thm if yu wntd to bt nt the snks and trtlsthy wldslde of in the wtr  the rdge or cvrn ws in ws fl of thmwe cld a hd pts and gtbrdclmb in at an upstrs wndw  bt it ws to drk to se ytso we mde the cne fst and st in hr to wt fr dylghthe lght bgn to cme bfre we gt to the ft of the islnd  thnwe lkd in at the wndw  we cld mke ot a bd and a tble andtwo old chrs and lts of thngs arnd abt on the flr and thrws clths hngng agnst the wl  thre ws smthng lyng on thflr in the fr crnr tht lkd lke a mn  so jm syshlo ybt it dnt bdge  so i hlrd agn and thn jm sysde mn ant aslphs d  yu hld stl go en she wnt and bnt dwn and lkd and systs a d mn  ys indy nkd to  hs bn sht in de bcki rckn hs bn d two er thre dys  cme in hck bt dn lkt of msks mde ot of blck clth and al ovr the wlsws the ignrntst knd of wrds and pctrs mde wth chrcl thrws two old drty clco drs and a snbnt and sme wmnsndrclths hngng agnst the wl and sme mns clthng to  wpt the lt into the cnt mght cme gd  thre ws a bys oldspckld strw ht on the flr i tk tht to  and thre ws abtle tht hd hd mlk in it and it hd a rg stpr fr a by tsck  we wld a tk the btle bt it ws brke  thre ws a sdyld chst and an old hr trnk wth the hngs brke  thy stdpn bt thre wrnt nthng lft in thm tht ws any acnt thwy thngs ws sctrd abt we rcknd the ple lft in a hrynd wrnt fxd so as to cry of mst of thr stfwe gt an old tn lntrn and a btchrknfe wtht any hndle and abrnw brlw knfe wrth two bts in any stre and a lt of tlwcndls and a tn cndlstck and a grd and a tn cp and a rtyld bdqlt of the bd and a rtcle wth ndls and pns andbswx and btns and thrd and al sch trck in it and a htchtnd sme nls and a fshlne as thck as my ltle fngr wth smnstrs hks on it and a rl of bckskn and a lthr dgclrnd a hrshe and sme vls of mdcne tht dnt hve no lbl onthm and jst as we ws lvng i fnd a tlrble gd crycmbnd jm he fnd a rty old fdlbw and a wdn lg  the strpsws brke of of it bt brng tht it ws a gd engh lg thght ws to lng fr me and nt lng engh fr jm and we cldnt fndthe othr one thgh we hntd al arndnd so tke it al arnd we mde a gd hl  whn we ws rdy tshve of we ws a qrtr of a mle blw the islnd and it ws prtybrd dy so i mde jm ly dwn in the cne and cvr up wth thqlt bcse if he st up ple cld tl he ws a ngr a gdwys of  i pdld ovr to the ilns shre and drftd dwn mst ahlf a mle dng it  i crpt up the d wtr undr the bnk andhdnt no acdnts and dnt se nbdy  we gt hme al sflstrtn thy fnd eght dlrschptr xftr brkfst i wntd to tlk abt the d mn and gs ot hw hcme to be kld bt jm dnt wnt to  he sd it wld ftch bdlck and bsds he to prt  itscmn  mnd i tl yu its acmnt d cme to  it ws a tsdy tht we hd tht tlk  wl aftrdnr frdy we ws lyng arnd in the grs at the upr end of thrdge and gt ot of tbco  i wnt to the cvrn to gt sme andfnd a rtlsnke in thre  i kld hm and crld hm up on thft of jms blnkt evr so ntrl thnkng thrd be sme fnwhn jm fnd hm thre  wl by nght i frgt al abt the snknd whn jm flng hmslf dwn on the blnkt whle i dwnlstrtn jm and the snkhe ws brftd and the snke bt hm rght on the hl  tht alcms of my bng sch a fl as to nt rmbr tht whrvr yu lva d snke its mte alwys cms thre and crls arnd it  jm tldme to chp of the snks hd and thrw it awy and thn skn thbdy and rst a pce of it  i dne it and he et it and sd itwld hlp cre hm he mde me tke of the rtls and te thm arndhs wrst to  he sd tht tht wld hlp  thn i sld shtwr and sprd hmslf ot so ththe ws jst a knd of a lyr as yu my sy and thy sld hmdgwys btwn two brn drs fr a cfn and brd hm so so thysy bt i dnt se it  p tld me  bt anywy it al cme oflkng at the mn tht wy lke a flstrtn old hnk bnkrwl the dys wnt alng and the rvr wnt dwn btwn its bnksgn and abt the frst thng we dne ws to bt one of the bghks wth a sknd rbt and st it and ctch a ctfsh tht ws asbg as a mn bng sx ft two inchs lng and wghd ovr twhndrd pnds we cldnt hndle hm of crse he wld a flng usnto ilns  we jst st thre and wtchd hm rp and tr arndtl he drwnd  we fnd a brs btn in hs stmch and a sd he hdnt evr sn abgr one  he wld a bn wrth a gd dl ovr at the vlge thypdle ot sch a fsh as tht by the pnd in the mrkthse thrvrybdy bys sme of hm hs mts as whte as snw and mks a gdfrynxt mrng i sd it i pt on sme of thm old thngs and drs up lke a grl thtws a gd ntn to  so we shrtnd up one of the clco gwns andi trnd up my trsrlgs to my kns and gt into it  jm htchd itbhnd wth the hks and it ws a fr thngs and by and by i cld do prty wl in thmnly jm sd i dnt wlk lke a grl and he sd i mst qt plngp my gwn to gt at my brtchspckt  i tk ntce and dnbtrlstrtn a fr fti strtd up the ilns shre in the cne jst aftr drki strtd acrs to the twn frm a ltle blw the frylndng andthe drft of the crnt ftchd me in at the btm of the twn  itd up and strtd alng the bnk  thre ws a lght brng in altle shnty tht hdnt bn lvd in fr a lng tme and i wndrdwho hd tk up qrtrs thre  i slpd up and pd in at thwndw  thre ws a wmn abt frty yr old in thre kntng by acndle tht ws on a pne tble  i dnt knw hr fce she ws astrngr fr yu cldnt strt a fce in tht twn tht i dnt knwnw ths ws lcky bcse i ws wkng i ws gtng afrd i hdcme ple mght knw my vce and fnd me ot  bt if ths wmn hdbn in sch a ltle twn two dys she cld tl me al i wntd tknw so i knckd at the dr and mde up my mnd i wldnt frgt iws a grlstrtn cme inchptr xcme in sys the wmn and i d  she sys  tke a chri dne it  she lkd me al ovr wth hr ltle shny eys and syswht mght yr nme bsrh wlmswhre bts do yu lve  in ths nghbrhdnm  in hkrvle svn mle blw  ive wlkd al the wy andm al trd othngry to i rckn  il fnd yu smthngnm i ant hngry  i ws so hngry i hd to stp two mls blwhre at a frm so i ant hngry no mre  its wht mks me so ltmy mthrs dwn sck and ot of mny and evrythng and i cme tl my uncle abnr mre  he lvs at the upr end of the twn shsys  i hnt evr bn hre bfre  do yu knw hmno bt i dnt knw evrybdy yt  i hvnt lvd hre qte twks its a cnsdrble wys to the upr end of the twn  ybtr sty hre al nght  tke of yr bntno i sys il rst a whle i rckn and go on  i ant afrdf the drkshe sd she wldnt lt me go by myslf bt hr hsbnd wld be inby and by mybe in a hr and a hlf and shd snd hm alng wth mthn she gt to tlkng abt hr hsbnd and abt hr rltns upthe rvr and hr rltns dwn the rvr and abt hw mch btrf thy usd to ws and hw thy dnt knw bt thyd mde a mstkcmng to or twn instd of ltng wl alnd so on and so ontl i ws afrd i hd mde a mstke cmng to hr to fnd ot whtws gng on in the twn bt by and by she drpd on to p and thmrdr and thn i ws prty wlng to lt hr cltr rght alngshe tld abt me and tm swyr fndng the sx thsnd dlrs onlyshe gt it tn and al abt p and wht a hrd lt he ws and wht ahrd lt i ws and at lst she gt dwn to whre i ws mrdrd  isyswho dne it  wve hrd cnsdrble abt thse gngs on dwn inhkrvle bt we dnt knw who tws tht kld hck fnwl i rckn thrs a rght smrt chnce of ple hre thtd lkto knw who kld hm  sme thnk old fn dne it hmslfns tht smst evrybdy thght it at frst  hl nvr knw hw ngh he cmto gtng lynchd  bt bfre nght thy chngd arnd and jdgd itws dne by a rnwy ngr nmd jmwhy hi stpd  i rcknd i btr kp stl  she rn on and nvrntcd i hd pt in at althe ngr rn of the vry nght hck fn ws kld  so thrs arwrd ot fr hmthre hndrd dlrs  and thrs a rwrd ot frld fn two hndrd dlrs  yu se he cme to twn the mrngftr the mrdr and tld abt it and ws ot wth em on thfrybt hnt and rght awy aftr he up and lft  bfre nght thywntd to lynch hm bt he ws gne yu se  wl nxt dy thyfnd ot the ngr ws gne thy fnd ot he hdnt bn sn snctn oclck the nght the mrdr ws dne  so thn thy pt it on hmyu se and whle thy ws fl of it nxt dy bck cms old fnd wnt bhng to jdge thtchr to gt mny to hnt fr thngr al ovr ilns wth the jdge gve hm sme and tht evnghe gt drnk and ws arnd tl aftr mdnght wth a cple of mghtyhrdlkng strngrs and thn wnt of wth thm  wl he hntcme bck snce and thy ant lkng fr hm bck tl ths thngblws ovr a ltle fr ple thnks nw tht he kld hs by andfxd thngs so flks wld thnk rbrs dne it and thn hd gthcks mny wtht hvng to bthr a lng tme wth a lwst pldo sy he wrnt any to gd to do it  oh hs sly i rckn if hdnt cme bck fr a yr hl be al rght  yu cnt prve anythngn hm yu knw evrythng wl be qtd dwn thn and hl wlkn hcks mny as esy as nthngys i rckn so m  i dnt se nthng in the wy of it  hsvrybdy gt thnkng the ngr dne ith no nt evrybdy  a gd mny thnks he dne it  bt thyl gthe ngr prty sn nw and mybe thy cn scre it ot of hmwhy are thy aftr hm ytwl yre incnt ant yu  ds thre hndrd dlrs lyrnd evry dy fr ple to pck up  sme flks thnk the ngrnt fr frm hre  im one of thmbt i hnt tlkd it arnd  afw dys ago i ws tlkng wth an old cple tht lvs nxt dr inthe lg shnty and thy hpnd to sy hrdly anybdy evr gs tht islnd ovr yndr tht thy cl jcksns islnd  dnt anybdylve thre sys i no nbdy sys thy  i dnt sy any mre bt idne sme thnkng  i ws prty nr crtn id sn smke ovrthre abt the hd of the islnd a dy or two bfre tht so i systo myslf lke as nt tht ngrs hdng ovr thre anywy sys its wrth the trble to gve the plce a hnt  i hnt sn anysmke snce so i rckn mybe hs gne if it ws hm bt hsbndsgng ovr to shm and anthr mn  he ws gne up itmy hnds shk and i ws mkng a bd jb of it  whn the wmnstpd tlkng i lkd up and she ws lkng at me prty crsnd smlng a ltle  i pt dwn the ndle and thrd and lt on tbe intrstdnd i ws tnd systhre hndrd dlrs at me prty crs and i dnt fl a btcmfrtble  prty sn she syswht d yu sy yr nme ws hnymry wlmsmhw it dnt sm to me tht i sd it ws mry bfre so i dntlk upsmd to me i sd it ws srh so i flt srt of crnrdnd ws afrd mybe i ws lkng it to  i wshd the wmn wldsy smthng mre the lngr she st stl the unsr i ws  btnw she syshny i thght yu sd it ws srh whn yu frst cme inh ysm i d  srh mry wlms  srhs my frst nme  smcls if thy ownd thplce and so frth and so on and thn i gt esy agn  she ws rghtbt the rts yd se one stck hs nse ot of a hle in the crnrvry ltle whle  she sd she hd to hve thngs hndy to thrw athm whn she ws alne or thy wldnt gve hr no pce  she shwdme a br of ld twstd up into a knt and sd she ws a gd shtwth it gnrly bt shd wrnchd hr arm a dy or two ago and dntknw whthr she cld thrw tre nw  bt she wtchd fr a chncnd drctly bngd awy at a rt bt she msd hm wde and sdch it hrt hr arm so  thn she tld me to try fr the nxt one iwntd to be gtng awy bfre the old mn gt bck bt of crse idnt lt on  i gt the thng and the frst rt tht shwd hs nsi lt drve and if hd a styd whre he ws hd a bn a tlrblsck rt  she sd tht ws frstrte and she rcknd i wld hvthe nxt one  she wnt and gt the lmp of ld and ftchd it bcknd brght ovrlkd in the strms and shve fr shre and hdthe trck thn wl wt  nw i sy it ant agn to be mrn twhrs bfo ths wrck brks up and wshs of dwn the rvr  shl be drwnd and wnt hve nbdy to blme fr it bt hs ownslf bt thre mnths ago my csnbd frtn yr old ws rdng thrgh the wds on thr sde ofthe rvr and dnt hve no wpn wth hm whch ws blmflshns and in a lnsme plce he hrs a hrse acmng bhndhm and s old bldy shphrdsn alnkn aftr hm wth hs gn inhs hnd and hs whte hr aflyng in the wnd and std of jmpngf and tkng to the brsh bd lwd he cld otrn hm so thyhd it np and tck fr fve mle or mre the old mn agng althe tme so at lst bd sn it wrnt any use so he stpd and fcdrnd so as to hve the blt hls in frnt yu knw and the oldmn he rde up and sht hm dwn  bt he dnt gt mch chnce tnjy hs lck fr insde of a wk or flks ld hm oti rckn tht old mn ws a cwrd bcki rckn he wrnt a cwrd  nt by a blme sght  thre ant acwrd amngst thm shphrdsnsnt a one  and thre ant no cwrdsmngst the grngrfrds ethr  why tht old mn kp up hs end in afght one dy fr hlf an hr agnst thre grngrfrds and cme otwnr  thy ws al ahrsbck he lt of of hs hrse and gtbhnd a ltle wdple and kp hs hrse bfre hm to stp thblts bt the grngrfrds styd on thr hrs and cprd arndthe old mn and prd awy at hm and he prd awy at thm hmnd hs hrse bth wnt hme prty lky and crpld bt thgrngrfrds hd to be ftchd hmnd one of em ws d and anthrd the nxt dy  no sr if a bdys ot hntng fr cwrds hdnt wnt to fl awy any tme amngst thm shphrdsns bcz thydnt brd any of tht kndnxt sndy we al wnt to chrch abt thre mle evrybdyhrsbck the mn tk thr gns alng so d bck and kpt thmbtwn thr kns or std thm hndy agnst the wl  thshphrdsns dne the sme  it ws prty ornry prchngl abtbrthrly lve and schlke trsmns bt evrybdy sd it ws agd srmn and thy al tlkd it ovr gng hme and hd sch apwrfl lt to sy abt fth and gd wrks and fre grce andprfrdstntn and i dnt knw wht al tht it d sm to mto be one of the rghst sndys i hd rn acrs ytbt an hr aftr dnr evrybdy ws dzng arnd sme in thrchrs and sme in thr rms and it gt to be prty dl  bck anda dg ws strtchd ot on the grs in the sn snd aslp  i wnt upto or rm and jdgd i wld tke a np myslf  i fnd tht swtms spha stndng in hr dr whch ws nxt to ors and she tkme in hr rm and sht the dr vry sft and askd me if i lkd hrnd i sd i d and she askd me if i wld do smthng fr hr andnt tl anybdy and i sd i wld  thn she sd shd frgt hrtstmnt and lft it in the st at chrch btwn two othr bksnd wld i slp ot qt and go thre and ftch it to hr and nt synthng to nbdy  i sd i wld so i sld ot and slpd of up thrd and thre wrnt anybdy at the chrch excpt mybe a hg or twfr thre wrnt any lck on the dr and hgs lks a pnchn flrn smrtme bcse its cl  if yu ntce mst flks dnt go tchrch only whn thyve gt to bt a hg is dfrntlstrtn and askd me if i lkd hrsys i to myslf smthngs up it ant ntrl fr a grl to be insch a swt abt a tstmnt  so i gve it a shke and ot drps altle pce of pr wth hlfpst two wrte on it wth a pncl  irnsckd it bt cldnt fnd anythng else  i cldnt mke anythngt of tht so i pt the pr in the bk agn and whn i gt hmnd upstrs thre ws ms spha in hr dr wtng fr me  shpld me in and sht the dr thn she lkd in the tstmnt tlshe fnd the pr and as sn as she rd it she lkd gld andbfre a bdy cld thnk she grbd me and gve me a sqze and sdi ws the bst by in the wrld and nt to tl anybdy  she wsmghty rd in the fce fr a mnte and hr eys lghtd up and itmde hr pwrfl prty  i ws a gd dl astnshd bt whn i gtmy brth i askd hr wht the pr ws abt and she askd me if ihd rd it and i sd no and she askd me if i cld rd wrtngnd i tld hr no only crshnd and thn she sd the prwrnt anythng bt a bkmrk to kp hr plce and i mght go andply nwi wnt of dwn to the rvr stdyng ovr ths thng and prty sni ntcd tht my ngr ws flwng alng bhnd  whn we ws ot ofsght of the hse he lkd bck and arnd a scnd and thn cmsrng and sysmrs jwge if yl cme dwn into de swmp il shw yu a whlstck o wtrmcsnsthnks i thts mghty crs he sd tht ystrdy  he oghtrknw a bdy dnt lve wtrmcsns engh to go arnd hntng frthm wht is he up to anywy  so i sysl rght trt ahdi flwd a hlf a mle thn he strck ot ovr the swmp and wdnkle dp as mch as anthr hlfmle  we cme to a ltle flt pcf lnd whch ws dry and vry thck wth trs and bshs and vnsnd he sysyu shve rght in dh jst a fw stps mrs jwge dhs wh dy is sd m bfo i dnt kyr to se em no mthn he slpd rght alng and wnt awy and prty sn the trs hdhm  i pkd into the plce awys and cme to a ltle opn ptch asbg as a bdrm al hng arnd wth vns and fnd a mn lyngthre aslpnd by jngs it ws my old jmi wkd hm up and i rcknd it ws gng to be a grnd srprse thm to se me agn bt it wrnt  he nrly crd he ws so gld bthe wrnt srprsd  sd he swm alng bhnd me tht nght and hrdme yl evry tme bt dsnt answr bcse he dnt wnt nbdy tpck hm up and tke hm into slvry agn  sys hi gt hrt a ltle en cldnt swm fs so i wz a cnsdble wysbhne yu de hse so i strck ot fr de wds to wt fr dy  erlyn de mwn sme er de ngrs cme alng gwyne to de flds en dytk me en shwd me ds plce wh de dgs cnt trck me on acntso de wtr en dy brngs me trck to et evry jwn bt whch un umshe blng to de ms dt i cme to h bt it pty sn so i upsn stls de trble by tln um she dnt blng to ne uv um bto yu en me en i ast m if dy gwyne to grb a yng whte gnlmnsprpty en gt a hdn sphs rn of d she hs  she rn of in dnght sme tmnbdy dnt knw js whn rn of to gt mrd tdt yng hrny shphrdsn yu knwlstwys so dy spc  dfmbly fn it ot bt hlf an hr agmybe a ltle mn i tlyu dy wrnt no tme ls arnd awhle and thn rde awy  as sn as thy wst of sght i sng ot to bck and tld hm  he dnt knw wht tmke of my vce cmng ot of the tre at frst  he ws awflsrprsd  he tld me to wtch ot shrp and lt hm knw whn clckthe frst one tht shwd agn mnt mrngws cmng so we hntd a plce to hde and te up rght awyne mrng abt dybrk i fnd a cne and crsd ovr a chte the mn shrt ws only two hndrd yrdsnd pdld abt a mle upa crck cldnt sthm thy smd to stp and fl arnd a whle thn as we gtfrthr and frthr awy al the tme we cldnt hrdly hr thm atl by the tme we hd lft a mle of wds bhnd us and strck thrvr evrythng ws qt and we pdld ovr to the twhd and hdn the ctnwds and ws sfne of thse flws ws abt svnty or upwrds and hd a bld hdnd vry gry whskrs  he hd an old btrdp slch ht on and agrsy ble wln shrt and rgd old ble jns brtchs stfdnto hs btps and hmknt glsno he only hd one  he hdn old lngtld ble jns ct wth slck brs btns flng ovrhs arm and bth of thm hd bg ft rtylkng crptbgsthe othr flw ws abt thrty and drsd abt as ornry it of to and gnrly the enml alng wth itbt istyd abt one nght lngr thn i oght to and ws jst in the actf sldng ot whn i rn acrs yu on the trl ths sde of twn andyu tld me thy wre cmng and bgd me to hlp aprvte jg on the sly  a ngr rstd me ot ths mrn and tldme the ple ws gthrn on the qt wth thr dgs and hrs andthyd be alng prty sn and gve me bt hlf an hrs strt andthn rn me dwn if thy cld and if thy gt cmpmtnsnd msnryn arndnbdy nvr sd anythng fr a whle thn the yng mn hve a sghnd syslswht re yu alsn abt sys the bldhdto thnk i shld hve lvd to be ldng sch a lfe and be dgrdwn into sch cmpny  and he bgn evrybdy and nxt he wnt achrgng up on to the pltfrm andthe prchr he bgd hm to spk to the ple and he dne it  htld thm he ws a prtbn a prte fr thrty yrs ot in thndn ocnd hs crw ws thnd ot cnsdrble lst btr thn anybdy else bng acqntd wth al prte crwsn tht ocn and thgh it wld tke hm a lng tme to gt thrwtht mny he wld gt thre anywy and evry tme he cnvncd aprte he wld sy to hm dnt yu thnk me dnt yu gve me ncrdt it al blngs to thm dr ple in pkvle cmpmtngntrl brthrs and bnfctrs of the rce and tht dr prchrthre the trst frnd a prte evr hdlstrtn a prte fr thrty yrsnd thn he bstd into trs and so d evrybdy swbng hs eysnd blsng the ple and prsng thm and thnkng thm fr bng sgd to the pr prts awy of thre and evry ltle whle thprtst knd of grls wth the trs rng dwn thr chks wldp and ask hm wld he lt thm ks hm fr to rmbr hm by and hlwys dne it and sme of thm he hgd and ksd as mny as fve orsx tmsnd he ws invtd to sty a wk and evrybdy wntd hm tlve in thr hs and sd thyd thnk it ws an hnr bt he sds ths ws the lst dy of the cmpmtng he cldnt do no gd andbsds he ws in a swt to gt to the indn ocn rght of and go twrk on the prtswhn we gt bck to the rft and he cme to cnt up he fnd he hdclctd eghtysvn dlrs and svntyfve cnts  and thn he hdftchd awy a thrgln jg of whsky to tht he fnd undr awgn whn he ws strtng hme thrgh the wds  the kng sd tkt al arnd it ld ovr any dy hd evr pt in in thmsnryng lne  he sd it wrnt no use tlkng hthns dntmnt to shcks alngsde of prts to wrk a cmpmtng wththe dke ws thnkng hd bn dng prty wl tl the kng cme tshw up bt aftr tht he dnt thnk so so mch  he hd st up andprntd of two ltle jbs fr frmrs in tht prntngfchrsblsnd tk the mny fr dlrs  and he hd gt in tn dlrswrth of advrtsmnts fr the pr whch he sd he wld pt in frfr dlrs if thy wld py in advncso thy dne it the prce ofthe pr ws two dlrs a yr bt he tk in thre sbscrptns frhlf a dlr apce on cndtn of thm pyng hm in advnce thywre gng to py in crdwd and ons as usl bt he sd he hdjst bght the cncrn and knckd dwn the prce as lw as he cldfrd it and ws gng to rn it fr csh  he st up a ltle pcf ptry whch he mde hmslf ot of hs own hdthre vrskndf swt and sdshthe nme of it ws ys crsh cld wrld thsbrkng hrtnd he lft tht al st up and rdy to prnt in thpr and dnt chrge nthng fr it  wl he tk in ne dlrsnd a hlf and sd hd dne a prty sqre dys wrk fr ithn he shwd us anthr ltle jb hd prntd and hdnt chrgdfr bcse it ws fr us  it hd a pctre of a rnwy ngr wth abndle on a stck ovr hs shldr and  rwrd undr it  thrdng ws al abt jm and jst dscrbd hm to a dt  it sd hrn awy frm st jcqs plntn frty mle blw nw orlnslst wntr and lkly wnt nrth and whvr wld ctch hm and sndhm bck he cld hve the rwrd and expnslstrtn anthr ltle jbnw sys the dke aftr tnght we cn rn in the dytme if wnt to  whnvr we se anybdy cmng we cn te jm hnd and ftwth a rpe and ly hm in the wgwm and shw ths hndbl and sy wcptrd hm up the rvr and wre to pr to trvl on a stmbtso we gt ths ltle rft on crdt frm or frnds and are gng dwnto gt the rwrd  hndcfs and chns wld lk stl btr on jmbt it wldnt go wl wth the stry of us bng so pr  to mchlke jwlry  rps are the crct thngwe mst prsrve the unts we sy on the brdswe al sd the dke ws prty smrt and thre cldnt be no trblbt rng dytms  we jdgd we cld mke mls engh tht nghto gt ot of the rch of the pw we rcknd the dks wrk in thprntng ofce ws gng to mke in tht ltle twn thn we cldbm rght alng if we wntd twe ld lw and kpt stl and nvr shvd ot tl nrly tnclck thn we sld by prty wde awy frm the twn and dnthst or lntrn tl we ws clr ot of sght of itwhn jm cld me to tke the wtch at fr in the mrng he syshck ds yu rckn we gwyne to rn acrst any mo kngs on dstrpno i sys i rckn ntwl sys he dts al rght dn  i dn mne one er two kngsbt dts engh  ds ons pwrfl drnk en de dke an mchbtri fnd jm hd bn tryng to gt hm to tlk frnch so he cld hrwht it aftrthyd jmpd ovrbrd and tk a swm it chprd thm up a gdl aftr brkfst the kng he tk a st on the crnr of the rftnd pld of hs bts and rld up hs brtchs and lt hs lgsdngle in the wtr so as to be cmfrtble and lt hs pe and wnto gtng hs rmo and jlt by hrt  whn he hd gt it prtygd hm and the dke bgn to prctce it tgthr  the dke hd tlrn hm ovr and ovr agn hw to sy evry spch and he mde hmsgh and pt hs hnd on hs hrt and aftr a whle he sd he dnt prty wl only he sys yu mstnt blw ot rmo thtwy lke a blyu mst sy it sft and sck and lngshysrmo tht is the ida fr jlts a dr swt mre chld ofa grl yu knw and she dsnt bry lke a jckswl nxt thy gt ot a cple of lng swrds tht the dke mde otf ok lths and bgn to prctce the swrd fghthe dke cldhmslf rchrd i and the wy thy ld on and prncd arnd thrft ws grnd to se  bt by and ltle mre to it  we wnt a ltle smthng tnswr encrs wth anywywhts onkrs blgwtrthe dke tld hm and thn sysl answr by dng the hghlnd flng or the slrs hrnpe andywl lt me sh ive gt ityu cn do hmlts slqyhmlts whchmlts slqy yu knw the mst clbrtd thng in shksprh its sblme sblme  alwys ftchs the hse  i hvnt gt itn the bkve only gt one vlmbt i rckn i cn pce it otfrm mry  il jst wlk up and dwn a mnte and se if lynchng anybdy  its amsng  the ida of ythnkng yu hd plck engh to lynch a mn  bcse yre brvngh to tr and fthr pr frndls cst wmn tht cme alnghre d tht mke yu thnk yu hd grt engh to ly yr hnds on amn  why a mns sfe in the hnds of tn thsnd of yr kndslng as its dytme and yre nt bhnd hmdo i knw yu  i knw yu clr thrgh ws brn and rsd in thsth and ive lvd in the nrth so i knw the avrge al arndthe avrge mns a cwrd  in the nrth he lts anybdy wlk ovr hmtht wnts to and gs hme and prys fr a hmble sprt to br itn the sth one mn al by hmslf hs stpd a stge fl of mn inthe dytme and rbd the lt  yr nwsprs cl yu a brvple so mch tht yu thnk yu are brvr thn any othrplwhrs yre jst as brve and no brvr  why dnt yrjrs hng mrdrs  bcse thyre afrd the mns frnds wlsht thm in the bck in the drknd its jst wht thy wld dso thy alwys acqt and thn a mn gs in the nght wth a hndrdmskd cwrds at hs bck and lynchs the rscl  yr mstke istht yu dnt brng a mn wth yu thts one mstke and the othrs tht yu dnt cme in the drk and ftch yr msks  yu brghtprt of a mnbck hrkns thrnd if yu hdnt hd hm to strtyu yd a tkn it ot in blwngyu dnt wnt to cme  the avrge mn dnt lke trble andngr yu dnt lke trble and dngr  bt if only hlf a mnlkbck hrkns thrshts lynch hm lynch hm yre afrd tbck dwnfrd yl be fnd ot to be wht yu arcwrdsnd syu rse a yl and hng yrslvs on to tht hlfmns ctlnd cme rgng up hre swrng wht bg thngs yre gng to dthe ptflst thng ot is a mb thts wht an army isa mb thydnt fght wth crge thts brn in thm bt wth crge thtsbrwd frm thr ms and frm thr ofcrs  bt a mb wthtny mn at the hd of it is bnth ptflns  nw the thng fr yto do is to drp yr tls and go hme and crwl in a hle  if anyrl lynchngs gng to be dne it wl be dne in the drk sthrnfshn and whn thy cme thyl brng thr msks and ftch a mnlng  nw lvnd tke yr hlfmn wth ytsng hs gn upcrs hs lft arm and ckng it whn he sys thsthe crwd wshd bck sdn and thn brke al aprt and wnt trngf evry whch wy and bck hrkns he hld it aftr thm lkngtlrble chp  i cld a styd if i wntd to bt i dnt wnt ti wnt to the crcs and lfd arnd the bck sde tl the wtchmnwnt by and thn dvd in undr the tnt  i hd my twntydlr gldpce and sme othr mny bt i rcknd i btr sve it bcsthre ant no tlng hw sn yu are gng to nd it awy frm hmnd amngst strngrs tht wy  yu cnt be to crfl  i antpsd to spndng mny on crcs whn thre ant no othr wy bthre ant no use in wstng it on thmlstrtn a d hdt ws a rl bly crcs  it ws the splndst sght tht evr wswhn thy al cme rdng in two and two a gntlmn and ldy sde bysde the mn jst in thr drwrs and undrshrts and no shs nrstrps and rstng thr hnds on thr thghs esy andcmfrtblthre mst a bn twnty of thmnd evry ldy wth alvly cmplxn and prfctly btfl and lkng jst lke a gngf rl srngh qns and drsd in clths tht cst mlns ofdlrs and jst ltrd wth dmnds  it ws a pwrfl fne sghti nvr se anythng so lvly  and thn one by one thy gt up andstd and wnt awvng arnd the rng so gntle and wvy andgrcfl the mn lkng evr so tl and ary and strght wth thrhds bng and skmng alng awy up thre undr the tntrf andvry ldys rslfy drs flpng sft and slky arnd hr hpsnd she lkng lke the mst lvlst prslnd thn fstr and fstr thy wnt al of thm dncng frst onft ot in the ar and thn the othr the hrs lng mre andmre and the rngmstr gng rnd and rnd the cntrple crcknghs whp and shtng hi and the clwn crckng jks bhnd hmnd by and by al hnds drpd the rns and evry ldy pt hrknckls on hr hps and evry gntlmn fld hs arms and thn hwthe hrs d ln ovr and hmp thmslvs  and so one aftr ththr thy al skpd of into the rng and mde the swtst bw ivr se and thn scmprd ot and evrybdy clpd thr hnds andwnt jst abt wldwl al thrgh the crcs thy dne the mst astnshng thngs andl the tme tht clwn crd on so it mst kld the ple  thrngmstr cldnt evr sy a wrd to hm bt he ws bck at hm qcks a wnk wth the fnst thngs a bdy evr sd and hw he evrcld thnk of so mny of thm and so sdn and so pt ws wht icldnt nwy undrstnd why i cldnt a thght of thm in a yrnd by and by a drnk mn trd to gt into the rngsd he wntd trde sd he cld rde as wl as anybdy tht evr ws  thy argdnd trd to kp hm ot bt he wldnt lstn and the whle shwcme to a stndstl  thn the ple bgn to hlr at hm and mkfn of hm and tht mde hm md and he bgn to rp and tr so thtstrd up the ple and a lt of mn bgn to ple dwn of of thbnchs and swrm twrds the rng syng knck hm dwn thrw hmt and one or two wmn bgn to scrm  so thn the rngmstr hmde a ltle spch and sd he hpd thre wldnt be ndstrbnce and if the mn wld prmse he wldnt mke no mrtrble he wld lt hm rde if he thght he cld sty on the hrso evrybdy lghd and sd al rght and the mn gt on the mnthe ws on the hrse bgn to rp and tr and jmp and cvrt arndwth two crcs mn hngng on to hs brdle tryng to hld hm and thdrnk mn hngng on to hs nck and hs hls flyng in the ar evryjmp and the whle crwd of ple stndng up shtng and lghngtl trs rld dwn  and at lst sre engh al the crcs mncld do the hrse brke lse and awy he wnt lke the vry ntnrnd and rnd the rng wth tht st lyng dwn on hm and hngngto hs nck wth frst one lg hngng mst to the grnd on one sdnd thn thr one on thr sde and the ple jst crzy  itwrnt fny to me thgh i ws al of a trmble to se hs dngrbt prty sn he strgld up astrdle and grbd the brdlrlng ths wy and tht and the nxt mnte he sprng up andrpd the brdle and std and the hrse agng lke a hse afrto  he jst std up thre aslng arnd as esy and cmfrtbls if he wrnt evr drnk in hs lfnd thn he bgn to pl of hsclths and slng thm  he shd thm so thck thy knd of clgd upthe ar and altgthr he shd svntn sts and thn thre hws slm and hndsme and drsd the gdst and prtst yu evrsw and he lt into tht hrse wth hs whp and mde hm frlyhmnd fnly skpd of and mde hs bw and dncd of to thdrsngrm and evrybdy jst ahwlng wth plsre andstnshmntlstrtn he shd svntn ststhn the rngmstr he se hw he hd bn fld and he ws thsckst rngmstr yu evr se i rckn  why it ws one of hs ownmn  he hd gt up tht jke al ot of hs own hd and nvr lt onto nbdy wl i flt shpsh engh to be tk in so bt i wldnta bn in tht rngmstrs plce nt fr a thsnd dlrs  i dntknw thre my be blr crcs thn wht tht one ws frlylghd thr bns lse ovr the wy thyd srvd thm ple  thdke sysgrnhrns flthds  i knw the frst hse wld kp m and lthe rst of the twn gt rpd in and i knw thyd ly fr us ththrd nght and cnsdr it ws thr trn nw bndfr yng mnfr the stmbt gng to orlnsgt abrd sys the kng  hld on a mnte my srvnt l hp ywth thm bgs  jmp ot and hp the gntlmn adlphsmng mi slstrtn adlphsi dne so and thn we al thre strtd on agn  the frnd on a frm up thre  thyng flw syswhn i frst se yu i sys to myslf its mr wlks sre and hcme mghty nr gtng hre in tme  bt thn i sys agn no irckn it ant hm or else he wldnt be pdlng up the rvr  ynt hm are yno my nms bldgtlxndr bldgtrvrnd elxndr bldgti spse i mst sy as im one o the lrds pr srvnts  bt stlm jst as able to be sry fr mr wlks fr nt arvng in tme althe sme if hs msd anythng by itwhch i hpe he hsntwl he dnt ms any prprty by it bcse hl gt tht alrght bt hs msd sng hs brthr ptr dwhch he myntmnd nbdy cn tl as to thtbt hs brthr wld a gve anythngn ths wrld to se hm bfre he d nvr tlkd abt nthng elsl thse thre wks hdnt sn hm snce thy ws bys tgthrndhdnt evr sn hs brthr wlm at althts the df and dmbnwlm ant mre thn thrty or thrtyfve  ptr and grgwre the only ons tht cme ot hre grge ws the mrd brthrhm and hs wfe bth d lst yr  hrvy and wlms the onlyns thts lft nw and as i ws syng thy hvnt gt hre intmd anybdy snd em wrdh ys a mnth or two ago whn ptr ws frst tk bcse ptrsd thn tht he srtr flt lke he wrnt gng to gt wl thstme yu se he ws prty old and grgs gyrls ws to yng tbe mch cmpny fr hm excpt mry jne the rdhd one and so hws kndr lnsme aftr grge and hs wfe d and dnt sm tcre mch to lve  he mst dsprtly wntd to se hrvyndwlm to fr tht mtrbcse he ws one of thm knd tht cntbr to mke a wl  he lft a ltr bhnd fr hrvy and sd hdtld in it whre hs mny ws hd and hw he wntd the rst of thprprty dvd up so grgs gyrls wld be al rghtfr grgdnt lve nthng  and tht ltr ws al thy cld gt hm to pta pn twhy do yu rckn hrvy dnt cme  whr ds he lvh he lvs in englndshfldprchs thrhsnt evr bn inths cntry  he hsnt hd any to mch tmnd bsds he mghtnt agt the ltr at al yu knwto bd to bd he cldnt a lvd to se hs brthrs pr slyu gng to orlns yu sys bt tht ant only a prt of it  im gng in a shp nxtwdnsdy fr ryo jnro whre my uncle lvsts a prty lng jrny  bt itl be lvly wsht i ws agngs mry jne the oldst  hw old is the othrsmry jns ntn sns ftn and jns abtfrtnthts the one tht gvs hrslf to gd wrks and hs a hrlpr thngs to be lft alne in the cld wrld swl thy cld be wrse of  old ptr hd frnds and thy antgng to lt thm cme to no hrm  thrs hbsn the btsprchr and dcn lt hvy and bn rckr and abnr shcklfrdnd lvi bl the lwyr and dr rbnsn and thr wvs and thwdw brtly andwl thrs a lt of thm bt thse are the onstht ptr ws thckst wth and usd to wrte abt smtms whn hwrte hme so hrvy l knw whre to lk fr frnds whn he gtshrlstrtn he frly emptd tht yng flwl the old mn wnt on askng qstns tl he jst frly emptdtht yng flw  blmd if he dnt inqre abt evrybdy andvrythng in tht blsd twn and al abt the wlks and abtptrs bsnswhch ws a tnr and abt grgswhch ws acrpntr and abt hrvyswhch ws a dsntrng mnstr and sn and so on  thn he syswht d yu wnt to wlk al the wy up to the stmbt frbcse shs a bg orlns bt and i ws afrd she mghtnt stpthre  whn thyre dp thy wnt stp fr a hl  a cncnti btwl bt ths is a st ls onws ptr wlks wl ofh ys prty wl of  he hd hs and lnd and its rcknd hlft thre or fr thsnd in csh hd up smrswhn d yu sy he di dnt sy bt it ws lst nghtfnrl tmrw lklys bt the mdle of the dywl its al trble sd bt wve al gt to go one tme ornthr so wht we wnt to do is to be prprd thn wre al rghtys sr its the bst wy  ma usd to alwys sy thtwhn we strck the bt she ws abt dne ldng and prty sn shgt of  the kng nvr sd nthng abt gng abrd so i lst myrde aftr al  whn the bt ws gne the kng mde me pdle upnthr mle to a lnsme plce and thn he gt ashre and sysnw hstle bck rght of and ftch the dke up hre and the nwcrptbgs  and if hs gne ovr to thr sde go ovr thre andgt hm  and tl hm to gt hmslf up rgrdls  shve alng nwi se wht he ws up to bt i nvr sd nthng of crse  whn igt bck wth the dke we hd the cne and thn thy st dwn on alg and the kng tld hm evrythng jst lke the yng flw hdsd itvry lst wrd of it  and al the tme he ws adng it htrd to tlk lke an englshmn and he dne it prty wl to fr aslch i cnt imte hm and so i ant agng to try to bt hrly dne it prty gd  thn he syshw are yu on the df and dmb blgwtrthe dke sd lve hm alne fr tht sd he hd plyd a df andmb prsn on the hstrnc brds  so thn thy wtd fr astmbtbt the mdle of the aftrn a cple of ltle bts cme alngbt thy dnt cme frm hgh engh up the rvr bt at lst thrws a bg one and thy hld hr  she snt ot hr ywl and we wntbrd and she ws frm cncnti and whn thy fnd we only wntdto go fr or fve mle thy ws bmng md and gve us a csng andsd thy wldnt lnd us  bt the kng ws cm  he sysf gntlmn kn afrd to py a dlr a mle apce to be tk on andpt of in a ywl a stmbt kn afrd to cry em cnt itso thy sftnd dwn and sd it ws al rght and whn we gt to thvlge thy ywld us ashre  abt two dzn mn flckd dwn whnthy se the ywl acmng and whn the kng syskn any of yu gntlmn tl me whr mr ptr wlks lvs thygve a glnce at one anthr and nd thr hds as mch as to sywht d i tl yu  thn one of thm sys knd of sft and gntlm sry sr bt the bst we cn do is to tl yu whre he d lvystrdy evngsdn as wnkng the ornry old crtr wnt an to smsh and fl upgnst the mn and pt hs chn on hs shldr and crd dwn hsbck and sysls als or pr brthrgne and we nvr gt to se hm ohts to to hrdlstrtn als or pr brthrsthn he trns arnd blbrng and mks a lt of idtc sgns the dke on hs hnds and blmd if he dnt drp a crptbg andbst ot acryng  if thy wrnt the btnst lt thm two frdstht evr i strckwl the mn gthrd arnd and sympthzd wth thm and sd alsrts of knd thngs to thm and crd thr crptbgs up the hlfr thm and lt thm ln on thm and cry and tld the kng al abths brthrs lst mnts and the kng he tld it al ovr agn onhs hnds to the dke and bth of thm tk on abt tht d tnrlke thyd lst the twlve dscpls  wl if evr i strck anythnglke it im a ngr it ws engh to mke a bdy ashmd of the hmnrclstrtn yu bt it ischptr xvthe nws ws al ovr twn in two mnts and yu cld se the pltrng dwn on the rn frm evry whch wy sme of thm ptng onthr cts as thy cme  prty sn we ws in the mdle of a crwdnd the nse of the trmpng ws lke a sldr mrch  the wndws andryrds ws fl and evry mnte smbdy wld sy ovr a fncs it thmnd smbdy trtng alng wth the gng wld answr bck and syu bt it iswhn we gt to the hse the strt in frnt of it ws pckd and ththre grls ws stndng in the dr  mry jne ws rdhd btht dnt mke no dfrnce she ws mst awfl btfl and hrfce and hr eys ws al lt up lke glry she ws so gld hr unclsws cme the kng he sprd hs arms and mry jne she jmpd frthm and the hrlp jmpd fr the dke and thre thy hd itvrybdy mst lstwys wmn crd fr jy to se thm mt agn atlst and hve sch gd tmsthn the kng he hnchd the dke prvti se hm do itnd thn hlkd arnd and se the cfn ovr in the crnr on two chrs sthn hm and the dke wth a hnd acrs ech othrs shldr andthr hnd to thr eys wlkd slw and slmn ovr thre evrybdydrpng bck to gve thm rm and al the tlk and nse stpngple syng sh and al the mn tkng thr hts of and drpngthr hds so yu cld a hrd a pn fl  and whn thy gt thrthy bnt ovr and lkd in the cfn and tk one sght and thnthy bst ot acryng so yu cld a hrd thm to orlns mst andthn thy pt thr arms arnd ech othrs ncks and hng thr chnsvr ech othrs shldrs and thn fr thre mnts or mybe fri nvr se two mn lk the wy thy dne  and mnd yu evrybdyws dng the sme and the plce ws tht dmp i nvr se anythnglke it thn one of thm gt on one sde of the cfn and thr onthr sde and thy knld dwn and rstd thr frhds on thcfn and lt on to pry al to thmslvs  wl whn it cme tht it wrkd the crwd lke yu nvr se anythng lke it andvrybdy brke dwn and wnt to sbng rght ot ldthe pr grlsto and evry wmn nrly wnt up to the grls wtht syng awrd and ksd thm slmn on the frhd and thn pt thr hndn thr hd and lkd up twrds the sky wth the trs rngdwn and thn bstd ot and wnt of sbng and swbng and gvthe nxt wmn a shw  i nvr se anythng so dsgstnglstrtn lkngwl by and by the kng he gts up and cms frwrd a ltle andwrks hmslf up and slbrs ot a spch al fl of trs andflpdle abt its bng a sre trl fr hm and hs pr brthr tlse the dsd and to ms sng dsd alve aftr the lngjrny of fr thsnd mle bt its a trl hw hm and hsncs wld be gld if a fw of the mn prncpl frnds of thfmly wld tke spr hre wth thm ths evng and hlp st upwth the ashs of the dsd and sys if hs pr brthr lyngyndr cld spk he knws who he wld nme on hnd and so thy alcme and shk hnds wth the kng and thnkd hm and tlkd to hmnd thn thy shk hnds wth the dke and dnt sy nthng bt jstkpt asmlng and bng thr hds lke a psl of sphds whlsthe mde al srts of the twn or tgrgs fmly or to ptr  and he alwys lt on tht ptr wrte hmthe thngs bt tht ws a le  he gt evry blsd one of thm ot oftht yng flthd tht we cnd up to the stmbthn mry jne she ftchd the ltr hr bhnd us and whn thy fnd the bg thy splt ot on the flr and it ws a lvly sght al thm ylr bysmy the wy the kngs eys d shne  he slps the dke on thshldr and sysh ths ant bly nr nthn  oh no i rckn nt  why bljy itbts the nsch dnt ithe dke alwd it d  thy pwd the ylrbys and sftd thmthrgh thr fngrs and lt thm jngle dwn on the flr and thkng syst ant no use tlkn bn brthrs to a rch d mn andrprsntvs of frn hrs abt the dsdgn and hw gd he ws and wht a ls he ws and al tht andbfre lng a bg irnjwd mn wrkd hmslf in thre frm otsdnd std alstng and lkng and nt syng anythng and nbdysyng anythng to hm ethr bcse the frnd and physcn  ikp yr hnds of of me sys the dctr  yu tlk lke anglshmn dnt yu  its the wrst imtn i evr hrd  yptr wlks brthr  yre a frd thts wht yu arlstrtn the dctrwl hw thy al tk on  thy crwd arnd the dctr and trd tqt hm dwn and trd to expln to hm and tl hm hw hrvy dshwd in frty wys tht he ws hrvy and knwd evrybdy by nmnd the nms of the vry dgs and bgd and bgd hm nt to hrthrvys flngs and the pr grls flngs and al tht  bt itwrnt no use he strmd rght alng and sd any mn tht prtndto be an englshmn and cldnt imte the lngo no btr thn whthe d ws a frd and a lr  the pr grls ws hngng to the kngnd cryng and al of a sdn the dctr ups and trns on thm  hsysi ws yr fthrs frnd and im yr frnd and i wrn yu as afrnd and an hnst one tht wnts to prtct yu and kp yu ot ofhrm and trble to trn yr bcks on tht scndrl and hve nthngto do wth hm the ignrnt trmp wth hs idtc grk and hbrws he cls it  he is the thnst knd of an impstrhs cme hrwth a lt of empty nms and fcts whch he pckd up smwhrs andyu tke thm fr prfs and are hlpd to fl yrslvs by thsflsh frnds hre who oght to knw btr  mry jne wlks yknw me fr yr frnd and fr yr unslfsh frnd to  nw lstnto me trn ths ptfl rscl oti bg yu to do it  wl ymry jne strghtnd hrslf up and my bt she ws hndsme  shsyshre is my answr  she hve up the bg of mny and pt it in thkngs hnds and sys tke ths sx thsnd dlrs and invst frme and my strs any wy yu wnt to and dnt gve us no rcpt frthn she pt hr arm arnd the kng on one sde and sn and thrlp dne the sme on the othr  evrybdy clpd thr hnds andstmpd on the flr lke a prfct strm whlst the kng hld up hshd and smld prd  the dctr sysl rght i wsh my hnds of the mtr  bt i wrn yu al tht atme s cmng whn yre gng to fl sck whnvr yu thnk of thsdy and awy he wntl rght dctr sys the kng kndr mckng hm wl try andgt em to snd fr yu frncle wlm and shd gve hr own rm to uncle hrvy whch ws altle bgr and she wld trn into the rm wth hr strs andslp on a ct and up grt ws a ltle cby wth a plt in ithe kng sd the cby wld do fr hs vlymng mso mry jne tk us up and she shwd thm thr rms whch wspln bt nce  she sd shd hve hr frcks and a lt of othr trpstk ot of hr rm if thy ws in uncle hrvys wy bt he sd thywrnt  the frcks ws hng alng the wl and bfre thm ws acrtn mde ot of clco tht hng dwn to the flr  thre ws anld hr trnk in one crnr and a gtrbx in anthr and al srtsf ltle knckncks and jmcrcks arnd lke grls brskn up a rmwth  the kng sd it ws al the mre hmly and mre plsntr frthse fxngs and so dnt dstrb thm  the dks rm ws prtysml bt plnty gd engh and so ws my cbytht nght thy hd a bg spr and al thm mn and wmn ws thrnd i std bhnd the kng and the dks chrs and wtd on thmnd the ngrs wtd on the rst  mry jne she st at the hd ofthe tble wth sn alngsde of hr and sd hw bd the bsctsws and hw mn the prsrvs ws and hw ornry and tgh the frdchckns to lt on to gt chkd wth a chcknbne so as to gt tme to thnk hw to gt dwn agn  thn i sysi mn he gs to or chrch rglr whn hs in shfld  thtsnly in the smr tme whn he cms thre to tke the sa bthswhy hw yu tlkshfld ant on the swl who sd it wswhy yu di dnt nthryu di dntyu di nvr sd nthng of the kndwl wht d yu sy thnsd he cme to tke the sa bthsthts wht i sdwl thn hws he gng to tke the sa bths if it ant on to do on pns and inscrptns and jrnls and thngswhch mde it mre trble and wry and rspnsblty to be a prsnrthn anythng he evr undrtk tht tm mst lst al ptnce wthm and sd he ws jst ldnd dwn wth mre gdr chncs thn aprsnr evr hd in the wrld to mke a nme fr hmslf and yt hdnt knw engh to aprcte thm and thy ws jst abt wstd onhm  so jm he ws sry and sd he wldnt bhve so no mre andthn me and tm shvd fr bdlstrtn kpng of dl tmschptr xn the mrng we wnt up to the vlge and bght a wre rtrp andftchd it dwn and unstpd the bst rthle and in abt an hrwe hd ftn of the blst knd of ons and thn we tk it and pt in a sfe plce undr ant slys bd  bt whle we ws gne frspdrs ltle thms frnkln bnjmn jfrsn elxndr phlps fndt thre and opnd the dr of it to se if the rts wld cme otnd thy d and ant sly she cme in and whn we mdlsme cb and thy wrnthe lklst nthr bcse the frst hl ws the pck of the flcki nvr se a lklr lt of rts thn wht tht frst hl wswe gt a splnd stck of srtd spdrs and bgs and frgs andctrplrs and one thng or anthr and we lke to gt a hrntsnst bt we dnt  the fmly ws at hme  we dnt gve it rghtp bt styd wth thm as lng as we cld bcse we alwd wdtre thm ot or thyd gt to tre us ot and thy dne it  thn wgt alycmpn and rbd on the plcs and ws prty nr al rghtgn bt cldnt st dwn cnvnt  and so we wnt fr the snksnd grbd a cple of dzn grtrs and hsnks and pt thm ina bg and pt it in or rm and by tht tme it ws sprtme anda rtlng gd hnst dys wrk  and hngryh no i rckn ntnd thre wrnt a blsd snke up thre whn we wnt bckwe dnthlf te the sck and thy wrkd ot smhw and lft  bt it dntmtr mch bcse thy ws stl on the prms smwhrs  so wjdgd we cld gt sme of thm agn  no thre wrnt no rlscrcty of snks abt the hse fr a cnsdrble spl  yd sthm drpng frm the rftrs and plcs evry nw and thn and thygnrly lnd in yr plte or dwn the bck of yr nck and mst ofthe tme whre yu dnt wnt thm  wl thy ws hndsme andstrpd and thre wrnt no hrm in a mln of thm bt tht nvrmde no dfrnce to ant sly she dspsd snks be the brd whthy mght and she cldnt stnd thm no wy yu cld fx it andvry tme one of thm flpd dwn on hr it dnt mke no dfrncwht she ws dng she wld jst ly tht wrk dwn and lght ot  invr se sch a wmn  and yu cld hr hr whp to jrcho  ycldnt gt hr to tke ahlt of one of thm wth the tngs  and ifshe trnd ovr and fnd one in bd she wld scrmble ot and lft ahwl tht yu wld thnk the hse ws afre  she dstrbd the oldmn so tht he sd he cld mst wsh thre hdnt evr bn no snkscrtd  why aftr evry lst snke hd bn gne clr ot of thse fr as mch as a wk ant sly wrnt ovr it yt she wrntnr ovr it whn she ws stng thnkng abt smthng yu cldtch hr on the bck of hr nck wth a fthr and she wld jmprght ot of hr stckngs  it ws vry crs  bt tm sd alwmn ws jst so  he sd thy ws mde tht wy fr sme rsn orthrwe gt a lckng evry tme one of or snks cme in hr wy and shlwd thse lckngs wrnt nthng to wht she wld do if we evrld up the plce agn wth thm  i dnt mnd the lckngsbcse thy dnt amnt to nthng bt i mnd the trble we hdto ly in anthr lt  bt we gt thm ld in and al the othrthngs and yu nvr se a cbn as blthsme as jms ws whn thydl swrm ot fr msc and go fr hm  jm dnt lke the spdrsnd the spdrs dnt lke jm and so thyd ly fr hm and mke itmghty wrm fr hm  and he sd tht btwn the rts and the snksnd the grndstne thre wrnt no rm in bd fr hm sksly andwhn thre ws a bdy cldnt slp it ws so lvly and it wslwys lvly he sd bcse thy nvr al slpt at one tme btk trn abt so whn the snks ws aslp the rts he sd if he evr gt ot ths tme he wldntvr be a prsnr agn nt fr a slrywl by the end of thre wks evrythng ws in prty gd shpe thshrt ws snt in erly in a pe and evry tme a rt bt jm he wldgt up and wrte a ltle in hs jrnl whlst the ink ws frsh thpns ws mde the inscrptns and so on ws al crvd on thgrndstne the bdlg ws swd in two and we hd et up the swdstnd it gve us a mst amzng stmchche  we rcknd we ws algng to de bt dnt  it ws the mst undgstble swdst i evrse and tm sd the smbt as i ws syng wd gt al the wrk dne nw at lst and we wsl prty mch fgd ot to bt mnly jm  the old mn hd wrta cple of tms to the plntn blw orlns to cme and gt thrnwy ngr bt hdnt gt no answr bcse thre wrnt no schplntn so he alwd he wld advrtse jm in the st ls andnw orlns prs and whn he mntnd the st ls ons it gve mthe cld shvrs and i se we hdnt no tme to lse so tm sd nwfr the nms ltrswhts thm  i syswrngs to the ple tht smthng is up  smtms its dne onwy smtms anthr  bt thrs alwys smbdy spyng arnd thtgvs ntce to the gvrnr of the cstle  whn ls xvi ws gngto lght ot of the tlrs a srvntgrl dne it  its a vry gdwy and so is the nms ltrs  wl use thm bth  and itsl fr the prsnrs mthr to chnge clths wth hm and shstys in and he slds to do evrythng  thyre so cnfdng andmlthd thy dnt tke ntce of nthng at al  so if we dntgve thm ntce thre wnt be nbdy nr nthng to intrfre wth usnd so aftr al or hrd wrk and trble ths escpe l go ofprfctly flt wnt amnt to nthngwnt be nthng to itwl as fr me tm thts the wy id lkshcks he sys and lkd dsgstd  so i sysbt i ant gng to mke no cmplnt  any wy tht sts yu stsme wht yu gng to do abt the srvntgrlyl be hr  yu slde in in the mdle of the nght and hk thtylr grls frckwhy tm tht l mke trble nxt mrng bcse of crse shprbly hnt gt any bt tht oni knw bt yu dnt wnt it bt ftn mnts to cry thnms ltr and shve it undr the frnt drl rght thn il do it bt i cld cry it jst as hndy in mywn tgsyu wldnt lk lke a srvntgrl thn wld yno bt thre wnt be nbdy to se wht i lk lke anywytht ant gt nthng to do wth it  the thng fr us to do is jsto do or dty and nt wry abt whthr anybdy s us do it ornt hnt yu gt no prncple at al rght i ant syng nthng im the srvntgrl  whs jmsmthrm hs mthr  il hk a gwn frm ant slywl thn aprsnr of style escps its cld an evsn  its alwys cld swhn a kng escps frnstnce  and the sme wth a kngs sn itdnt mke no dfrnce whthr hs a ntrl one or an untrlnso tm he wrte the nms ltr and i smchd the ylr wnchsfrck tht nght and pt it on and shvd it undr the frnt dr thwy tm tld me to  it sdbwre  trble is brwng  kp a shrp lkt unknwn frndlstrtn trble is brwngnxt nght we stck a pctre whch tm drwd in bld of a skl andcrsbns on the frnt dr and nxt nght anthr one of a cfn onthe bck dr  i nvr se a fmly in sch a swt  thy cldnt abn wrse scrd if the plce hd a bn fl of ghsts lyng fr thmbhnd evrythng and undr the bds and shvrng thrgh the ar  ifa dr bngd ant sly she jmpd and sd och if anythng flshe jmpd and sd och if yu hpnd to tch hr whn shwrnt ntcng she dne the sme she cldnt fce nwy and bstsfd bcse
