i am one of the gng bt hvgt rlgn and wsh to qt it and ld an hnst lfe agn andwl btry the hlsh dsgn thy wl snk dwn frm nrthrdslng the fnce at mdnght exct wth a flse ky and go in thngrs cbn to gt hm i am to be of a pce and blw a tn hrn ifi se any dngr bt std of tht i wl ba lke a shp sn as thygt in and nt blw at al thn whlst thy are gtng hs chnslse yu slp thre and lck thm in and cn kl thm at yrlsre  dnt do anythng bt jst the wy i am tlng yu if yu dthy wl spcn smthng and rse whpjmbrho i do nt wshny rwrd bt to knw i hve dne the rght thng unknwn frndlstrtn fshngchptr xlwe ws flng prty gd aftr brkfst hrbck ws trnd we sld fr the clr cpbrd and ld up a gdlnch and tk it up to or rm and wnt to bd and gt up abt hlfpst elvn and tm pt on ant slys drs tht he stle and wsgng to strt wth the lnch bt syswhrs dctrchptr xlthe dctr ws an old mn a vry nce kndlkng old mn whn i gthm up  i tld hm me and my brthr ws ovr on spnsh islnd hntngystrdy aftrn and cmpd on a pce of a rft we fnd and abtmdnght he mst a kckd systhe phlps dwn yndrh he sys  and aftr a mnte he syshwd yu sy he gt shthe hd a drm i sys and it sht hmsnglr drm he syso he lt up hs lntrn and gt hs sdlbgs and we strtd  btwhn he s the cne he dnt lke the lk of hrsd she ws bgngh fr one bt dnt lk prty sfe fr two  i sysh yu ndnt be afrd sr she crd the thre of us esynghwht thrwhy me and sd andndnd the gns thts wht i mnh he sysbt he pt hs ft on the gnl and rckd hr and shk hs hdnd sd he rcknd hd lk arnd fr a bgr one  bt thy wsl lckd and chnd so he tk my cne and sd fr me to wtl he cme bck or i cld hnt arnd frthr or mybe i btr gdwn hme and gt thm rdy fr the srprse if i wntd to  bt isd i dnt so i tld hm jst hw to fnd the rft and thn hstrtdi strck an ida prty sn  i sys to myslf spsn he cnt fxtht lg jst in thre shks of a shps tl as the syng ispsn it knd of mde hm drnk as yu my sy and he dntknw nthng at al the rst of the dy and prchd a pryrmtngsrmn tht nght tht gve hm a rtlng rptn bcse thldst mn in the wrld cldnt a undrstd it  so tms ant plyshe ant sly tkme fr tm swyr i hd to stnd ithre wrnt no othr wy and iknwd he wldnt mnd bcse it wld be nts fr hm bng amystry and hd mke an advntre ot of it and be prfctlystsfd  and so it trnd ot and he lt on to be sd and mdthngs as sft as he cld fr mnd hs ant ply she sd tm ws rght abt old ms wtsn stngjm fre in hr wl and so sre engh tm swyr hd gne and tkl tht trble and bthr to st a fre ngr fre and i cldntvr undrstnd bfre untl tht mnte and tht tlk hw he cldhlp a bdy st a ngr fre wth hs brngngpwl ant ply she sd tht whn ant sly wrte to hr tht tm andsd hd cme al rght and sfe she sys to hrslflk at tht answrt of yu abt itwhy i nvr hrd nthng frm yu sys ant slywl i wndr  why i wrte yu twce to ask yu wht yu cld mnby sd bng hrwl i nvr gt em snt ply she trns arnd slw and svre and sysyu tmwlwht he sys knd of ptshdnt yu wht me yu impdnt thnghnd ot thm ltrslstrtn hnd ot thm ltrswht ltrsthm ltrs  i be bnd if i hve to tke ahlt of yu ilthyre in the trnk  thre nw  and thyre jst the sme as thyws whn i gt thm ot of the ofce  i hnt lkd into thm ihnt tchd thm  bt i knwd thyd mke trble and i thght ifyu wrnt in no hry idwl yu do nd skng thre ant no mstke abt it  and iwrte anthr one to tl yu i ws cmng and i spse hno it cme ystrdy i hnt rd it yt bt its al rght ivgt tht oni wntd to ofr to bt two dlrs she hdnt bt i rcknd mybe itws jst as sfe to nt to  so i nvr sd nthnglstrtn ot of bndgchptr the lsthe frst tme i ctchd tm prvte i askd hm wht ws hs ida tmf the evsnwht it ws hd plnd to do if the evsn wrkd alrght and he mngd to st a ngr fre tht ws alrdy fre bfrnd he sd wht he hd plnd in hs hd frm the strt if we gtjm ot al sfe ws fr us to rn hm dwn the rvr on the rft andhve advntrs plmb to the mth of the rvr and thn tl hm abths bng fre and tke hm bck up hme on a stmbt in style andpy hm fr hs lst tme and wrte wrd ahd and gt ot al thngrs arnd and hve thm wltz hm into twn wth a trchlghtprcsn and a brsbnd and thn he wld be a hro and so wldwe  bt i rcknd it ws abt as wl the wy it wswe hd jm ot of the chns up to the sckrm and hd a hgh tlk and tm gve jm frtydlrs fr bng prsnr fr us so ptnt and dng it up so gdnd jm ws plsd mst to dth and bstd ot and syslstrtn tms lbrltydh nw hck wht i tl ywht i tl yu up dh on jcksnsln  i tle yu i gt a hry brs en whts de sgn un it en itle yu i bn rch wnst en gwntr to be rch agn en its cmtre en h she is  dh nw dn tlk to msgns is sgns mne itl yu en i knwd js s wl at i uz of wks or two and i sys al rght tht sts me bt int gt no mny fr to by the otft and i rckn i cldnt gtne frm hme bcse its lkly ps bn bck bfre nw and gt al awy frm jdge thtchr and drnk it upno he hnt tm sys its al thre ytsx thsnd dlrs andmre and yr p hnt evr bn bck snce  hdnt whn i cmwy anyhwjm sys knd of slmnhe ant acmn bck no mo hcki syswhy jmnmne why hckbt he ant cmn bck no mbt i kpt at hm so at andmcfrlns crgbldng dpt tht crs us rght on to ththr blck and nw dctr wve dne or wrk so its tme we hdsme ply a sndwch and a cp of cfe and thn of to vlnlndwhre al is swtns and dlcy and hrmny and thre are nrdhd clnts to vx us wth thr cndrmsmy frnd ws an enthstc mscn bng hmslf nt only a vrycpble prfrmr bt a cmpsr of no ordnry mrt al the aftrnhe st in the stls wrpd in the mst prfct hpns gntlywvng hs and as i knw wl he ws nvr so trlyfrmdble as whn fr dys on end he hd bn lngng in hsrmchr amd hs imprvstns and hs blckltr edtns thn itws tht the lst of the chse wld sdnly cme upn hm and thths brlnt rsng pwr wld rse to the lvl of intntl thse who wre uncqntd wth hs mthds wld lk asknce athm as on a mn whse knwldge ws nt tht of othr mrtls whn isw hm tht aftrn so enwrpd in the msc at st jms hl iflt tht an evl tme mght be cmng upn thse whm he hd sthmslf to hnt dwnyu wnt to go hme no dbt dctr he rmrkd as we emrgdys it wld be as wlnd i hve sme bsns to do whch wl tke sme hrs thsbsns at cbrg sqre is srswhy srsa cnsdrble crme is in cntmpltn i hve evry rsn tblve tht we shl be in tme to stp it bt tdy bng strdyrthr cmplcts mtrs i shl wnt yr hlp tnght wht tmtn wl be erly enghi shl be at bkr strt at tnvry wl a snse of my own stpdty in my dlngs wth shrlckhlms hre i hd hrd wht he hd hrd i hd sn wht he hd snd yt frm hs wrds it ws evdnt tht he sw clrly nt only whthd hpnd bt wht ws abt to hpn whle to me the whlbsns ws stl cnfsd and grtsqe as i drve hme to my hsn knsngtn i thght ovr it al frm the extrdnry stry of thrdhd cpr of the encyclpda dwn to the vst tsxcbrg sqre and the omns wrds wth whch he hd prtd frme wht ws ths nctrnl expdtn and why shld i go armd whrwre we gng and wht wre we to do i hd the hnt frm hlms thths smthfcd pwnbrkrs astnt ws a frmdble mna mn whmght ply a dp gme i trd to pzle it ot thrwng hs cgrtnto the fre oscltn upn the pvmnt alwys mns an afrde cr she wld lke advce bt is nt sre tht the mtr is nto dlcte fr cmnctn and yt evn hre we my dscrmntwhn a wmn hs bn srsly wrngd by a mn at the dr and the by in btns entrdto ance ms mry sthrlnd whle the ldy hrslf lmd bhndhs sml blck fgre lke a flsld mrchntmn bhnd a tnyplt bt shrlck hlms wlcmd hr wth the esy crtsy frwhch he ws rmrkble and hvng clsd the dr and bwd hr intn armchr he lkd hr ovr in the mnte and yt abstrctd fshnwhch ws pclr to hmdo yu nt fnd he sd tht wth yr shrt sght it is a ltltryng to do so mch typwrtngi d at frst she answrd bt nw i knw whre the ltrs arwtht lkng thn sdnly rlsng the fl prprt of hswrds she gve a vlnt strt and lkd up wth fr andstnshmnt upn hr brd gdhmrd fce yve hrd abt mr hlms she crd else hw cld yu knw al thtnvr mnd sd hlms lghng it is my bsns to knw thngsprhps i hve trnd myslf to se wht othrs ovrlk if nt whyshld yu cme to cnslt mi cme to yu sr bcse i hrd of yu frm mrs ethrge whshsbnd yu fnd so esy whn the plce and evryne hd gvn hm upfr d oh mr hlms i wsh yu wld do as mch fr me im ntrch bt stl i hve a hndrd a yr in my own rght bsds thltle tht i mke by the mchne and i wld gve it al to knw whths bcme of mr hsmr anglwhy d yu cme awy to cnslt me in sch a hry askd shrlckhlms wth hs fngrtps tgthr and hs eys to the clngn a strtld lk cme ovr the smwht vcs fce of ms mrysthrlnd ys i d bng ot of the hse she sd fr it mdme angry to se the esy wy in whch mr wndbnktht is myfthrtk it al he wld nt go to the plce and he wld nt gto yu and so at lst as he wld do nthng and kpt on syng ththre ws no hrm dne it mde me md and i jst on wth my thngs andcme rght awy to yr fthr sd hlms yr stpfthr srly snce the nme isdfrntys my stpfthr i cl hm fthr thgh it snds fny to frhe is only fve yrs and two mnths oldr thn myslfnd yr mthr is alvh ys mthr is alve and wl i wsnt bst plsd mr hlmswhn she mrd agn so sn aftr fthrs dth and a mn who wsnrly ftn yrs yngr thn hrslf fthr ws a plmbr in thtnhm crt rd and he lft a so lrge asm as a hndrd a yr wth wht yu ern into the brgn yu ndbt trvl a ltle and indlge yrslf in evry wy i blve thta sngle ldy cn gt on vry ncly upn an incme of abt i cld do wth mch ls thn tht mr hlms and pys it ovr to mthr and i fnd tht i cn dprty wl wth wht i ern at typwrtng it brngs me twpnce asht and i cn oftn do frm ftn to twnty shts in a dyu hve mde yr pstn vry clr to me sd hlms ths is myfrnd up hs ht i cntwste tme ovr ths srt of fntstc tlk mr hlms he sd ifyu cn ctch the mn ctch hm and lt me knw whn yu hve dntcrtnly sd hlms stpng ovr and trng the ky in the dri lt yu knw thn tht i hve cght rfrnce to a rt and the incdnt of the vnshng clth nsr i shl aprch ths cse frm the pnt of vw tht wht thsyng mn sys is tre and we shl se whthr tht hypths wld us and nw hre is my pckt ptrch and nt anthr aprnce bt hsfce ws of an ashn whte whle hs lps and the crnrs of hsnstrls wre tngd wth a shde of ble it ws clr to me at aglnce tht he ws in the grp of sme dly and chrnc dspry st dwn on the sfa sd hlms gntly yu hd my ntys the ldgkpr brght it up yu sd tht yu wshd to se mhre to avd scndli thght ple wld tlk if i wnt to the hlnd why d yu wsh to se me he lkd acrs at my cmpn wthdspr in hs wry eys as thgh hs qstn ws alrdy answrdys sd hlms answrng the lk rthr thn the wrds it is si knw al abt mcrthythe old mn snk hs fce in hs hnds gd hlp me he crd bt iwld nt hve lt the yng mn cme to hrm i gve yu my wrd is a qstn whthr i shl lve a mnth yt i wldrthr de undr my own rf thn in a glhlms rse and st dwn at the tble wth hs pn in hs hnd and abndle of pr bfre hm jst tl us the trth he sd i shljt dwn the fcts yu tlgrm frm the mjr implrng me to cme atnce my fthr hd fln ovr one of the dp chlkpts whch abndn the nghbrhd and ws lyng snsls wth a shtrd skl ihrd to hm bt he psd awy wtht hvng evr rcvrd hscnscsns he hd cmfrtbly and tl us al abt it or shld yrthr tht i snt jms of to bdh no no i wnt the dctrs advce and hlp to its abt ishe hs nt bn hme fr two dys i am so frghtnd abt hmt ws nt the frst tme tht she hd whch ld the hse as we aprchd the dr flw opn and a ltle blndwmn std in the opng cld in sme srt of lght mslne dse wth a tch of flfy pnk chfn at hr nck and wrsts shstd wth hr fgre otlnd agnst the fld of into a grn as she sw tht mycmpn shk hs hd and shrgd hs shldrsno gd nwsno bdnthnk gd fr tht bt cme in yu mst be wry fr yu hve hd alng dyths is my frnd dr wtsn he hs bn of mst vtl use to me insvrl of my the blw whch hs cme so sdnly upnsmy dr mdm sd i i am an old cmpgnr and if i wre nt icn vry wl se tht no aplgy is nd if i cn be of anystnce ethr to yu or to my frnd hre i shl be indhpynw mr shrlck hlms as to dtls sd ht is esy fr me to be so fr evry evnt of tht drdfl tme isrd into my mry the mnrhse is as i hve alrdy sd vryld and only one wng is nw inhbtd the bdrms in ths wng arn the grnd flr the amnt to s evry dy frm ne in the mrng untl fr in the aftrni wtd in my ltle dn untl at lst my hrt bgn to snk and icme to blve tht i shld nvr hve any prctce at alystrdy hwvr jst as i ws thnkng of lvng and i sprng to my ft wth the flng tht i mght hrdlyt be sfe frm my prsrs bt to my astnshmnt whn i cme tlk rnd me nthr hse nr grdn wre to be sn i hd bnlyng in an angle of the hdge clse by the hghrd and drmhlf dzd i wnt into the stn and askd abt the mrng trnthre wld be one to rdng in ls thn an hr the sme prtr wsn dty i fnd as hd bn thre whn i arvd i inqrd of hmwhthr he hd evr hrd of clnl lysndr strk the nme wstrnge to hm hd he obsrvd a crge the nght bfre wtng frme no he hd nt ws thre a plcstn anywhre nr thre wsne abt thre mls oft ws to fr fr me to go wk and il as i ws i dtrmnd twt untl i gt bck to twn bfre tlng my stry to the plce itws a ltle pst sx whn i arvd so i wnt frst to hve my wndrsd and thn the dctr ws knd engh to brng me alng hre ipt the cse into yr hnds and shl do exctly wht yu advswe bth st in slnce fr sme ltle tme aftr lstng to thsxtrdnry nrtve thn shrlck hlms pld dwn frm the shlfne of the pndrs cmnplce bks in whch he plcd hs ctngshre is an advrtsmnt whch wl intrst yu sd he itprd in al the prs abt a yr ago lstn to ths lst onthe th inst mr jrmh hylng agd twntysx a hydrlcngnr lft hs ldgngs at tn oclck at nght and hs nt bnhrd of snce ws drsd in etc etc ha tht rprsnts the lstme tht the clnl nd to hve hs mchne ovrhld i fncygd hvns crd my ptnt thn tht explns wht the grlsdndbtdly it is qte clr tht the clnl ws a cl andsprte mn who ws absltly dtrmnd tht nthng shld stndn the wy of hs ltle gme lke thse otndt prts who wlve no srvr frm a cptrd shp wl evry mnt nw isprcs so if yu fl eql to it we shl go dwn to sctlnd yrdt once as a prlmnry to strtng fr eyfrdsme thre hrs or so aftrwrds we wre al in the trn tgthrbnd frm rdng to the ltle brkshre vlge thre wre shrlckhlms the hydrlc engnr inspctr brdstrt of sctlnd yrda plnclths mn and myslf brdstrt hd sprd an ordnce mpf the thnk srt ws an hrs gd drvnd yu thnk tht thy brght yu bck al tht wy whn yu wrncnscsthy mst hve dne so i hve a cnfsd mry to of hvng bnlftd and cnvyd smwhrwht i cnt undrstnd sd i is why thy shld hve sprd ywhn thy fnd yu lyng fntng in the grdn prhps the vlnws sftnd by the wmns entrtsi hrdly thnk tht lkly i nvr sw a mre inxrble fce in mylfh we shl sn clr up al tht sd brdstrt wl i hvdrwn my crcle and i only wsh i knw at wht pnt upn it the flktht we are in srch of are to be fndi thnk i cld ly my fngr on it sd hlms qtlyrly nw crd the inspctr yu hve frmd yr opn cmnw we shl se who agrs wth yu i sy it is sth fr thcntry is mre dsrtd thrnd i sy est sd my ptnti am fr wst rmrkd the plnclths mn thre are svrlqt ltle vlgs up thrnd i am fr nrth sd i bcse thre are no hls thre and orfrnd sys tht he d nt ntce the crge go up anycme crd the inspctr lghng its a vry prty dvrsty ofpn we hve bxd the cmps amng us who do yu gve yrcstng vte tyu are al wrngbt we cnt al bh ys yu cn ths is my pnt he plcd hs fngr in the cntrf the crcle ths is whre we shl fnd thmbt the twlvmle drve gspd hthrlysx ot and sx bck nthng smplr yu sy yrslf tht the hrsws frsh and glsy whn yu gt in hw cld it be tht if it hdgne twlve mls wnchstr i shldnvr hve hd a fr fr hr it is the fve mls of cntry whchmks the dngr stl it is clr tht she is nt prsnlythrtndno if she cn cme to wnchstr to mt us she cn gt awyqte so she hs hr frdmwht cn be cme bck and dne it i tl yu tht he is a clvr andngrs mn i shld nt be vry mch srprsd if ths wre he whstp i hr nw upn the str i thnk wtsn tht it wld be aswl fr yu to hve yr pstl rdythe wrds wre hrdly ot of hs mth bfre a mn aprd at the drf the rm a vry ft and brly mn wth a hvy stck in hs hndms hntr scrmd and shrnk agnst the wl at the sght of hmbt shrlck hlms sprng frwrd and cnfrntd hmyu vln sd he whrs yr dghtrthe ft mn cst hs eys rnd and thn up at the opn skylght is fr me to ask yu tht he shrkd yu thvs sps andthvs i hve cght yu hve i yu are in my pwr il srvyu he trnd and cltrd dwn the strs as hrd as he cld ghs gne fr the dg crd ms hntri hve my rvlvr sd ibtr clse the frnt dr crd hlms and we al rshd dwn thstrs tgthr we hd hrdly rchd the hl whn we hrd the byngf a hnd and thn a scrm of agny wth a hrble wryng sndwhch it ws drdfl to lstn to an eldrly mn wth a rd fce andshkng lmbs cme stgrng ot at a sde drmy gd he crd smne hs lsd the dg its nt bn fd frtwo dys qck qck or itl be to lthlms and i rshd ot and rnd the angle of the hse wth tlrhryng bhnd us thre ws the hge fmshd brte its blck mzlbrd in rcstls thrt whle he wrthd and scrmd upn thgrnd rng up i blw its brns ot and it fl ovr wth itskn whte th stl mtng in the grt crs of hs nck wthmch lbr we sprtd thm and crd hm lvng bt hrblymngld into the hse we ld hm upn the drwngrm sfa andhvng dsptchd the sbrd tlr to br the nws to hs wfe i dwht i cld to rlve hs pn we wre al asmbld rnd hm whnthe dr opnd and a tl gnt wmn entrd the rmrs tlr crd ms hntrys ms mr rcstle lt me ot whn he cme bck bfre he wnt upto yu ah ms it is a pty yu dnt lt me knw wht yu wrplng fr i wld hve tld yu tht yr pns wre wstdha sd hlms lkng knly at hr it is clr tht mrs tlrknws mre abt ths mtr thn anyne elsys sr i do and i am rdy engh to tl wht i knwthn pry st dwn and lt us hr it fr thre are svrl pntsn whch i mst cnfs tht i am stl in the drki wl sn mke it clr to yu sd she and id hve dne sbfre nw if i cld ha gt ot frm the clr if thrsplcrt bsns ovr ths yl rmbr tht i ws the one thtstd yr frnd and tht i ws ms alcs frnd tshe ws nvr hpy at hme ms alce wsnt frm the tme tht hrfthr mrd agn she ws slghtd lke and hd no sy in anythngbt it nvr rly bcme bd fr hr untl aftr she whn thre ws a chnce of a hsbndcmng frwrd who wld ask fr al tht the lw wld gve hm thnhr fthr thght it tme to pt a stp on it he wntd hr to sgn apr so tht whthr she mrd or nt he cld use hr mny whnshe wldnt do it he kpt on wryng hr untl she gt brnfvrnd fr sx wks ws at dths dr thn she gt btr at lst alwrn to a shdw and wth hr btfl hr ct of bt tht dntmke no chnge in hr yng mn and he stck to hr as tre as mncld bh sd hlms i thnk tht wht yu hve bn gd engh to tls mks the mtr frly clr and tht i cn dce al thtrmns mr rcstle thn i prsme tk to ths systm ofmprsnmntys srnd brght ms hntr dwn frm lndn in ordr to gt rd of thdsgrble prstnce of mr fwlrtht ws it srbt mr fwlr bng a prsvrng mn as a gd smn shld blckd the hse and hvng mt yu scd by crtn argmntsmtlc or othrwse in cnvncng yu tht yr intrsts wre thsme my ltle lzyi dsre yu wl do no sch thng lzy is nt a bt btr thn ththrs and i am sre she is nt hlf so hndsme as jne nr hlf sgdhmrd as lyda bt yu are alwys gvng hr the prfrncthy hve ne of thm mch to rcmnd instd of yrspry tl yr str tht i lng to se hri hve alrdy tld hr so once by yr dsri am afrd yu do nt lke yr pn lt me mnd it fr yu i mndpns rmrkbly wlthnk yu  bt i alwys mnd my ownhw cn yu cntrve to wrte so evnhe ws slntl yr str i am dlghtd to hr of hr imprvmnt on the hrpnd pry lt hr knw tht i am qte in rptrs wth hr btfltle dsgn fr a tble and i thnk it infntly spr to msgrntlyswl yu gve me lve to dfr yr rptrs tl i wrte agn atprsnt i hve nt rm to do thm jstch it is of no cnsqnce i shl se hr in jnry bt do ylwys wrte sch chrmng lng ltrs to hr mr drcythy are gnrly lng bt whthr alwys chrmng it is nt fr mto dtrmnt is a rle wth me tht a prsn who cn wrte a lng ltr wthse cnt wrte iltht wl nt do fr a cmplmnt to drcy crlne crd hrbrthr bcse he ds nt wrte wth ese he stds to mch frwrds of fr sylbls do nt yu drcymy style of wrtng is vry dfrnt frm yrsh crd ms bngly chrls wrts in the mst crls wymgnble he lvs ot hlf hs wrds and blts the rstmy ids flw so rpdly tht i hve nt tme to exprs thm  bywhch mns my ltrs smtms cnvy no ids at al to mycrspndntsyr hmlty mr bngly sd elzbth mst dsrm rprfnthng is mre dctfl sd drcy thn the aprnce ofhmlty it is oftn only crlsns of opn and smtms andrct bstnd whch of the two do is to mch to rmbr at nght al thflsh thngs tht wre sd in the mrng and yt upn my hnr iblve wht i sd of myslf to be tre and i blve it at thsmnt at lst thrfre i d nt asme the chrctr of ndlsprcptnce mrly to shw of bfre the ldsi dre sy yu blvd it bt i am by no mns cnvncd tht ywld be gne wth sch clrty yr cndct wld be qte asdpndnt on chnce as tht of any mn i knw and if as yu wrmntng yr hrse a frnd wre to my lfths rsd a gnrl astnshmnt and he hd the plsre of bngrly qstnd by hs wfe and hs fve dghtrs at oncftr amsng hmslf sme tme wth thr crsty he ths explndbt a mnth ago i rcvd ths ltr and abt a frtnght tlk of tht ods mn i do thnk it is the hrdst thngn the wrld tht yr este shld be entld awy frm yr ownchldrn and i am sre if i hd bn yu i shld hve trd lng agto do smthng or othr abt itjne and elzbth trd to expln to hr the ntre of an entl thyhd oftn atmptd to do it bfre bt it ws a sbjct on whch mrsbnt ws bynd the rch of rsn and she cntnd to rlbtrly agnst the crlty of stlng an este awy frm a fmly ofve of exprsng hmslfno tht i am sre i shl nt and i thnk it is vry imprtnt ofhm to wrte to yu at al and vry hypcrtcl i hte sch flsfrnds why cld he nt kp on qrlng wth yu as hs fthr dbfre hmwhy ind he ds sm cthrne shld be sndlgnt as to lt hm cme to us agnthre is sme snse in wht he sys abt the grls hwvr and if hs dspsd to mke thm any amnds i shl nt be the prsn tdscrge hmthgh it is dfclt sd jne to gs in wht wy he cn mnto mke us the atnmnt he thnks or de the wsh is crtnly to hscrdtlzbth ws chfly strck by hs extrdnry dfrnce fr ldycthrne and hs knd intntn of chrstng mryng and brynghs prshnrs whnvr it bgn to cngrtlte thm on thr gd frtne whchchrlte explnd by ltng thm knw tht the whle prty ws askdto dne at rsngs the nxt dychptr mr clns trmph in cnsqnce of ths invtn ws cmplthe pwr of dsplyng the grndr of hs ptrns to hs wndrngvstrs and of ltng thm se hr cvlty twrds hmslf and hswfe ws exctly wht he hd wshd fr and tht an oprtnty ofdng it shld be gvn so sn ws sch an instnce of ldycthrns cndscnsn as he knw nt hw to admre enghi cnfs sd he tht i shld nt hve bn at al srprsd byhr ldyshps askng us on sndy to drnk ta and spnd the evng atrsngs i rthr expctd frm my knwldge of hr afblty tht itwld hpn bt who cld hve frsn sch an atntn as ths whcld hve imgnd tht we shld rcve an invtn to dne thrn invtn mrvr incldng the whle prty so imdtlyftr yr arvli am the ls srprsd at wht hs hpnd rpld sr wlmfrm tht knwldge of wht the mnrs of the grt rly are whchmy stn in lfe hs alwd me to acqre abt the crt schnstncs of elgnt brdng are nt uncmnscrcly anythng ws tlkd of the whle dy or nxt mrng bt thrvst to rsngs mr clns ws crfly instrctng thm in whthy wre to expct tht the sght of sch rms so mny srvnts andso splnd a dnr mght nt whly ovrpwr thmwhn the lds wre sprtng fr the tlte he sd to elzbth do nt mke yrslf unsy my dr csn abt yr aprl ldycthrne is fr frm rqrng tht elgnce of drs in us whchbcms hrslf and hr dghtr i wld advse yu mrly to pt onwhtvr of yr clths is spr to the rst  thre is no ocsnfr anythng mre ldy cthrne wl nt thnk the wrse of yu frbng smply drsd she lks to hve the dstnctn of rnkprsrvdwhle thy wre drsng he cme two or thre tms to thr dfrntdrs to rcmnd thr bng qck as ldy cthrne vry mchbjctd to be at st jms the wthr ws fne thy hd a plsnt wlk of abt hlf a mlcrs the prk evry prk hs its bty and its prspcts andlzbth sw mch to be plsd wth thgh she cld nt be in schrptrs as mr clns expctd the scne to inspre and ws btslghtly afctd by hs enmrtn of the wndws in frnt of thse and hs rltn of wht the glzng altgthr hd orgnlycst sr lws de brghwhn thy ascnd the stps to the hl mrs alrm ws evry mntncrsng and trpdtnfrm the entrnchl of whch mr clns pntd ot wth arptrs ar the fne prprtn and the fnshd ornmnts thyflwd the srvnts thrgh an antchmbr to the rm whre ldycthrne hr dghtr and mrs jnknsn wre stng hr my dlght imst hve my shre in the cnvrstn if yu are spkng of mscthre are fw ple in englnd i spse who hve mre tre enjymntf msc thn myslf or a btr ntrl tste if i hd evr lrnt ishld hve bn a grt prfcnt and prty fr and shlstnd wth incrsng astnshmnt as the hskpr ad i hvnvr knwn a crs wrd frm hm in my lfe and i hve knwn hm evrsnce he ws fr yrs oldths ws prse of al othrs mst extrdnry mst opste to hrds tht strd at hr cn ths be mr drcy thght shs fthr ws an exclnt mn sd mrs grdnrys m tht he ws ind and hs sn wl be jst lke hm jst as afble to the prlzbth lstnd wndrd dbtd and ws imptnt fr mre mrsrynlds cld sn ld agn to the sbjct and she dwlt wth enrgy on hsmny mrts as thy prcd tgthr up the grt strcshe is the bst lndlrd and the bst mstr sd she tht evrlvd nt lke the wld yng mn nwdys who thnk of nthng bthmslvs thre is nt one of hs tnts or srvnts bt wl gvhm a gd nme sme ple cl hm prd bt i am sre i nvr swnythng of it to my fncy it is only bcse he ds nt rtle awylke othr yng mn wht an amble lght ds ths spctd sme prtltyspcly on lyds sde bt nthng to gve hm any alrm i am sgrvd fr hm hs bhvr ws atntve and knd to the utmst hws cmng to us in ordr to asre us of hs cncrn bfre he hdny ida of thr nt bng gne he hsdstrsd hmslf a sml sm cld nt do al thsno sd hr fthr wckhms a fl if he tks hr wth a frthngls thn tn thsnd pnds i shld be sry to thnk so il of hmn the vry bgng of or rltnshptn thsnd pnds hvn frbd sxpnce of hs own the kndns of my uncle and ant cn nvr brqtd thr tkng hr hme and afrdng hr thr prsnlprtctn and cntnce is sch a scrfce to hr advntge asyrs of grtde cnt engh acknwldge by ths tme she andf tht wre the cse he ws nt the yng mn to rst an oprtntyf hvng a cmpnlyda ws excdngly fnd of hm he ws hr dr wckhm on evrycsn no one ws to be pt in cmptn wth hm he d evrythng bst in the wrld and she a fs i ws so afrd yu knw tht smthng wld hpn tpt it of and thn i shld hve gne qte dstrctd and thre wsmy ant al the tme i ws drsng prchng and tlkng awy jst asf she ws rdng a srmn hwvr i d nt hr abve one nxtmrng if tht dsgrble mr drcy is nt cmng hre agn wthr dr bngly wht cn he mn by bng so trsme as to be alwyscmng hre i hd no ntn bt he wld go ashtng or smthng orthr and nt dstrb us wth hs cmpny wht shl drcy prfsd a grt crsty to sthe vw frm the mnt and elzbth slntly cnsntd as she wntp strs to gt rdy mrs bnt flwd hr syngi am qte sry lzy tht yu shld be frcd to hve thtdsgrble mn al to yrslf bt i hpe yu prvld on to ovrlk the ofnce and sk a rcncltnd aftr a ltle frthr rstnce on the prt of hs ant hrsntmnt gve wy ethr to hr afctn fr hm or hr crstyto se hw hs wfe cndctd hrslf and she cndscnd to wt onthm agre     so hrs to dscpls and clvryhe hld up a frfngr of wrng     if anyne thnks tht i amnt dvne     hl gt no fre drnks whn im mkng the wne     bt hve to drnk wtr and wsh it wre pln     tht i mke whn of the wrd crtn frm nthng and mrcls and aprsnl gdthrs only one snse of the wrd it sms to me stphn sdhns stpd to tke ot a smth slvr cse in whch twnkld agrn stne he sprng it opn wth hs thmb and ofrd frfngr and bt the ar oldly bfre hs vce spkmrk my wrds mr dls he sd englnd is in the hnds of thjws in al the hghst plcs hr fnce hr prs and thy arthe sgns of a ntns dcy whrvr thy gthr thy et up thntns hrnglsnrs tmptng fldthe fld is flwng me i cn wtch it flw pst frm hre gt bckthn by the plbg rd to the strnd thre he clmbd ovr the sdgnd ely orwds and st on a stl of rck rstng hs ashplnt in agrka bltd crcs of a dg ly ld on bldrwrck bfre hm thgnwle of a bt snk in snd un che ensbl ls vltcld gtrs prse thse hvy snds are lnge tde and wndhve sltd hre and thse the stnhps of d bldrs a wrnf wsl rts hde gld thre try it yu hve sme snds andstns hvy of the pst sr lts tys mnd yu dnt gt onbng on the er im the bldy wl gnt rls al thm bldy wlbldrs bns fr my stpngstns fwfm i zmlz de bldz odzn irdzmna pnt lve dg grw into sght rng acrs the swp of sndlrd is he gng to atck me rspct hs lbrty yu wl ntbe mstr of othrs or thr slve i hve my stck st tght frmfrthr awy wlkng shrwrd acrs frm the crstd tde fgrstwo the two stlfd hfrhe tk a pge up frm the ple of ct shts the mdl frm atknrth on the lkshre of tbrs cn bcme idl wntrsntrm ms mntfre i thght he ws frmhse wl rndt blrd ctle crpng he hld the pge frm hm intrstngrd unhkdglmps of the mn anyd if yu dnt why dnt yu tl mbfre stl lke yu btr untdy gd jb it wsnt frthr sthe psd dscrtly btng dwn the asle and ot thrgh the mndr into the lght he std a mnt unsng by the cld blck mrblbwl whle bfre hm and bhnd two wrshprs dpd frtve hnds inthe lw tde of hly wtr trms a cr of prscts dywrks a wdwn hr wds ntce bcse im in mrng myslf he cvrd hmslfhw gs the tme qrtr pst tme engh btrmlksknfd one of the old qns sns dke of albny ws it hd onlyne skn lpld ys thre we hve wrts bns and pmpls tmke it wrse bt yu wnt a prfme to wht prfme ds yr pdspgne tht orngflwr wtr is so frsh nce sml agntstmprnce htl flcnrs rlwy gde cvl srvce clgls cthlc clb the indstrs blnd why sme rsn sn orwnd at nght to chms and slvys undr the ptrnge of thlte fthr mthw fndtn stne fr prnl brkdwn hrtwhte hrs wth dwrfs bdywk as pty in a whtlnd dl bx brl frndly sctypys pny a wk fr a sd of trf or ltle bgr by mntnthng mstke of ntre if its hlthy its frm the mthr if ntfrm the mn btr lck nxt tmpr ltle thng mr dls sd its wl ot of ithe crge clmbd mre slwly the hl of rtlnd sqre rtle hsbns ovr the stns only a pr nbdy ownsn the mdst of lfe mrtn cnghm sdbt the wrst of al mr pwr sd is the mn who tks hs ownlfmrtn cnghm drw ot hs wtch brskly cghd and pt it bckthe grtst dsgrce to hve in the fmly mr pwr adtmpry insnty of crse mrtn cnghm sd dcsvly wmst tke a chrtble vw of ithy sy a mn who ds it is a cwrd mr dls sdt is rfse chrstn brl thy usd to drva stke of wd thrgh hs hrt in the grve as if it wsnt brknlrdy yt smtms thy rpnt to lte fnd in the rvrbdcltchng rshs he lkd at me and tht awfl drnkrd of a wf hs stng up hse fr hr tme aftr tme and thn pwng thfrntre on hm evry strdy almst ldng hm the lfe of thdmnd wr the hrt ot of a stne tht mndy mrng strtfrsh shldr to the whl lrd she mst hve lkd a sghtht nght dls tld me he ws in thre drnk abt the plce andcprng wth mrtns umbrla     and thy cl me the jwl of asa     of asa     the gshe lkd awy frm me he knws rtle hs bnstht aftrn of the inqst the rdlbld btle on the tble thrm in the htl wth hntng pctrs stfy it ws snlght thrghthe slts of the vntn blnd the crnrs snlt ers bg andhry bts gvng evdnce thght he ws aslp frst thn sw lkylw strks on hs fce hd slpd dwn to the ft encrgng or ldys hspce fr the dyngdhse hndy undrnth whre old mrs rdn d thy lktrble the wmn hr fdng cp and rbng hr mth wth thspn thn the scrn rnd hr bd fr hr to de nce yng stdntht ws drsd tht bte the be tht dge wrks nw gtng dcky mt ofthe trn at clnslthe crge mvd on thrgh the drvi cnt mke ot why the crprtn dsnt rn a trmlne frm thprkgte to the qys mr blm sd al thse anmls cld be tkn trcks dwn to the btsnstd of blckng up the thrghfre mrtn cnghm sd qtrght thy oght tys mr blm sd and anthr thng i oftn thght is to hvmncpl fnrl trms lke thy hve in mln yu knw rn the lnt to the cmtry gts and hve spcl trms hrse and crgnd al dnt yu se wht i mno tht be dmnd fr a stry mr dls sd plmn cr and slndngrma pr lkt fr crny mr pwr adwhy mr blm askd trng to mr dls wldnt it be mre dcnthn glpng two abrstwl thrs evrywhre evrymnte shvlng thm undr by the crtld dblqck thsndsvry hr to mny in the wrldmrnrs cme ot thrgh the gts wmn and a grl lnjwd hrpyhrd wmn at a brgn hr bnt awry grls fce stnd wth drtnd trs hldng the yngstrs nd lmbrt sdpntng ahd a fw b a skl jst to kp thm gng tl thnsrnce is clrd upys ys mr dls sd dbsly is tht the eldst by in frntys nd lmbrt sd wth the wfs brthr jhn hnry mntn isbhnd he pt dwn of the mrtry chpl mr blm std bhndthe by wth the wrth lkng dwn at hs slkcmbd hr and at thslndr frwd nck insde hs brndnw clr pr by ws he thrwhn the fthr bth uncnscs lghtn up at the lst mntnd rcgnse fr the lst tme al he mght hve dne i owe thrshlngs to ogrdy wld he undrstnd the mts bre the cfnto the chpl whch end is hs hdftr a mnt he flwd the othrs in blnkng in the scrndlght the cfn ly on its br bfre btchrs fr instnce thy gt lke rwbfstks who ws tlng me mrvyn brwne dwn in the vlts ofsnt wrbrghs lvly old orgn hndrd and fty thy hve to bre ahle in the cfns smtms to lt ot the bd gs and brn it ot itrshs aftr tht of crshly wtr tht ws i expct shkng slp ot of it he mst be fdp wth tht jb shkng tht thng ovr al the crps thy trt upwht hrm if he cld se wht he ws shkng it ovr evry mrtldy a frsh btch mdlgd mn shvd it on thr crt crny klhrgve one wrth to the by and one to the brthrnlw al flwdthm ot of the sdrs into the mld gry ar mr blm cme lstfldng hs pr agn into hs pckt he gzd grvly at the grndtl the cfncrt whld of to the lft the mtl whls grnd thgrvl wth a shrp grtng cry and the pck of blnt bts flwd thtrndld brw alng a lne of splchrsthe re the ra the re the ra the ro lrd i mstnt lt hrthe ocnl crcle mr dls sd abt hmr pwrs sft eys wnt up to the apx of the lfty cnhs at rst he sd in the mdle of hs ple old dn o bths hrt is brd in rme hw mny brkn hrts are brd hrsmnhr grve is ovr thre jck mr dls sd il sn be strtchdbsde hr lt hm tke me whnvr he lksbrkng dwn he bgn to wp to hmslf qtly stmblng a ltln hs wlk mr pwr tk hs armshs btr whre she is he sd kndlyi spse so mr dls sd wth a wk gsp i spse she is inhvn if thre is a hvncrny klhr stpd asde frm hs rnk and alwd the mrnrs tpld bysd ocsns mr krn bgn pltlymr blm clsd hs eys and sdly twce bwd hs hdthe othrs are ptng on thr hts mr krn sd i spse we cndo so to we are the lst ths cmtry is a trchrs plcthy cvrd thr hdsthe rvrnd gntlmn rd the srvce to qckly dnt yu thnkmr krn sd wth rprfmr blm nd grvly lkng in the qck bldsht eys scrtys scrtsrchng anthr thngmr krn sd wth slmntyi am the rsrctn and the lfe tht tchs a mns inmsthrt ds mr blm sdyr hrt prhps bt wht prce the flw in the sx ft by twth hs ts to the ds no tchng tht st of the afctnsbrkn hrt a pmp aftr al pmpng thsnds of glns of bldvry dy one fne dy it gts bngd up and thre yu are lts ofthm lyng arnd hre lngs hrts lvrs old rsty pmps dmnthe thng else the rsrctn and the lfe once yu are d yu ard tht lst dy ida knckng thm al up ot of thr grvs cmfrth lzrs and he cme fth and lst the jb gt up lst dythn evry flw msng arnd fr hs lvr and hs lghts and thrst of hs trps fnd dmn al of hmslf tht mrng pnywght ofpwdr in a skl twlve grms one pnywght try msrcrny klhr fl into stp at thr sdvrythng wnt of a he sd whthe lkd on thm frm hs drwlng eye plcmns shldrs wthyr trlm trlms it shld be mr krn sdwht eh crny klhr sdmr krn asrd hmwho is tht chp bhnd wth tm krn jhn hnry mntn askd iknw hs fcnd lmbrt glncd bckblm he sd mdme mrn twdy tht ws is i mn thsprno shs hs wfo to be sre jhn hnry mntn sd i hvnt sn hr fr smtme he ws a fnlkng wmn i dncd wth hr wt ftnsvntn gldn yrs ago at mt dlns in rndtwn and a gdrmfl she wshe lkd bhnd thrgh the othrswht is he he askd wht ds he do wsnt he in the stnrylne i fl fl of hm one evng i rmbr at bwlsnd lmbrt smldys he ws he sd in wsdm hlys a trvlr fr bltngprn gds nme jhn hnry mntn sd wht d she mry a cn lktht fr she hd plnty of gme in hr thnhs stl nd lmbrt sd he ds sme cnvsng fr adsjhn hnry mntns lrge eys strd ahdthe brw trnd into a sde lne a prtly mn ambshd amng thgrs rsd hs ht in hmge the grvdgrs tchd thr cpsjhn ocnl mr pwr sd plsd he nvr frgts a frndmr ocnl shk al thr hnds in slnce mr dls sdi am cme to py yu anthr vstmy dr smn the crtkr answrd in a lw vce i dnt wntyr cstm at alsltng nd lmbrt and jhn hnry mntn he wlkd on at mrtncnghms sde pzlng two lng kys at hs bckd yu hr tht one he askd thm abt mlchy frm the cmbi d nt mrtn cnghm sdthy bnt thr slk hts in cncrt and hyns inclnd hs er thcrtkr hng hs thmbs in the lps of hs gld wtchchn and spkn a dscrt tne to thr vcnt smlsthy tl the stry he sd tht two drnks cme ot hre one fgyvng to lk fr the grve of a frnd of thrs thy askd frmlchy frm the cmbe and wre tld whre he ws brd aftrtrpsng abt in the fg thy fnd the grve sre engh one of thdrnks splt ot the nme trnce mlchy the othr drnk ws blnkngp at a ste of or svr the wdw hd gt pt upthe crtkr blnkd up at one of the splchrs thy psd hrsmdnd aftr blnkng up at the scrd fgre nt a bldy bt lkthe mn sys he thts nt mlchy sys he whvr dne itrwrd by smls he fl bck and spke wth crny klhr acptngthe dckts gvn hm trng thm ovr and scng thm as he wlkdthts al dne wth a prpse mrtn cnghm explnd to hynsi knw hyns sd i knw thto chr a flw up mrtn cnghm sd its prgdhrtdns dmn the thng elsmr blm admrd the crtkrs prsprs blk al wnt to be on gdtrms wth hm dcnt flw jhn ocnl rl gd srt kyslke kys ad no fr of anyne gtng ot no pst chckshbs crps i mst se abt tht ad aftr the fnrl d iwrte blsbrdge on the envlpe i tk to cvr whn she dstrbd mwrtng to mrtha hpe its nt chckd in the d ltr ofce bthe btr of a shve gry sprtng brd thts the frst sgn whnthe hrs cme ot gry and tmpr gtng crs slvr thrds amngthe gry fncy bng hs wfe wndr he hd the gmptn to prpse tny grl cme ot and lve in the grvyrd dngle tht bfre hr itmght thrl hr frst crtng dth shds of nght hvrnghre wth al the d strtchd abt the shdws of the tmbs whnchrchyrds ywn and dnl ocnl mst be a dscndnt i spswho is ths usd to sy he ws a qr brdy mn grt cthlc al thsme lke a bg gnt in the drk wl o the wsp gs of grvswnt to kp hr mnd of it to cncve at al wmn espcly are stchy tl hr a ghst stry in bd to mke hr slp hve lve amng the tmbstnsrmo spce of plsre in the mdst of dth we are in lfe bthnds mt tntlsng fr the pr d sml of grld bfstks the strvng gnwng thr vtls dsre to grg ple mly wntngto do it at the wndw eght chldrn he hs anywyhe hs sn a fr shre go undr in hs tme lyng arnd hm fldftr fld hly flds mre rm if thy brd thm stndngstng or knlng yu cldnt stndng hs hd mght cme up smdy abve grnd in a lndslp wth hs spre bdy admrng a glsycrwnstrnge he nvr sw hs rl cntry irlnd my cntry mbr frclge grn he bmd tht wrkdy wrkr tck fr al it ws wrthts the ads and sde ftrs sl a wkly nt the stle nws in thfcl gzte qn ane is prs on a crnr of the shtnd mde a sgn to a typstr he hnd the sht slntly ovr thdrty gls scrnrght thnks hyns sd mvng ofmr blm std in hs wyf yu wnt to drw the cshr is jst gng to lnch he sdpntng bckwrd wth hs thmbd yu hyns askdm mr blm sd lk shrp and yl ctch hmthnks old mn hyns sd il tp hm the hrd on egrly twrds the frmns jrnlthre b i lnt hm in mghrs thre wks thrd hntwe se the cnvsr at wrkmr blm ld hs he wntstwo kys at the tphl of a rckt thy mke he dsnt hr it n irn nrvsmybe he undrstnds wht ithe frmn trnd rnd to hr ptntly and lftng an elbw bgnto scrtch slwly in the armpt of hs alpca jcktlke tht mr blm sd crsng hs frfngrs at the tplt hm tke tht in frstmr blm glncng sdwys up frm the crs he hd mde sw thfrmns slw fce thnk he hs a tch of jndce and bynd thbdnt rls fdng in hge wbs of pr clnk it clnk in eghtyne sxth of my tme ofthe invncbls mrdr in the phnx prk bfre yu wre brn ispse il shw yhe pshd pst thm to the flslk at hre he sd trng the nw yrk wrld cbld fr aspcl rmbr tht tmprfsr mchgh ndnw yrk dwn thre at bt brdge hlhn tld myu knw hlhnhp and cry one is it myls crwfrd sdnd pr gmly is dwn thre to so he tld me mndng stns frthe crprtn a nght wtchmnstphn trnd in srprsgmly he sd yu dnt sy so a frnd of my fthrs is itnvr mnd gmly myls crwfrd crd angrly lt gmly mndthe stns se thy dnt rn awy lk at hre wht d igntsglhr do il tl yu insprtn of gns cbld rght awyhve yu wkly frmn of  mrch rght hve yu gt ththe flng bck pgs of the fls and stck hs fngr on a pntke pge fr advrtsmnt fr brnsms cfe lt us sy hvyu gt tht rghthe tlphne whrda dstnt vcl answr it the prfsr sd gngb is prkgte gdhs fngr lpd and strck pnt aftr pnt vbrtngt is vcrgl ldge c is whre mrdr tk plce k is knckmrngthe lse flsh of hs nck shk lke a cks wtls an ilstrchdcky jtd up and wth a rde gstre he thrst it bck into hswstcthlo evng tlgrph hre hlo whs thre ysys ysf to p is the rte sknthgt drve the cr fr an albnchcre rndtwn wndy arbr plmrstn prk rnlgh fbpgt tht x is dvys pblchse in upr lsn strthe prfsr cme to the inr drblm is at the tlphne he sdtl hm go to hl the edtr sd prmptly x is dvyspblchse se clvr vryclvr lnhn sd vrygve it to thm on a ht plte myls crwfrd sd the whle bldyhstrynghtmre frm whch yu wl nvr awki sw it the edtr sd prdly i ws prsnt dck adms thbsthrtd bldy crkmn the lrd evr pt the brth of lfe in andmyslflnhn bwd to a shpe of ar ancngmdm im adm and able ws i ere i sw elbhstry myls crwfrd crd the old wmn of prncs strt wsthre frst thre ws wpng and gnshng of th ovr tht ot ofn advrtsmnt grgr gry mde the dsgn fr it tht gve hm thlg up thn pdy hpr wrkd ty py who tk hm on to the strnw hs gt in wth blmnfld thts prs thts tlnt pyt hws al thr dsthe fthr of scre jrnlsm lnhn cnfrmd and thbrthrnlw of chrs clnhlo are yu thre ys hs hre stl cme acrsyrslfwhre do yu fnd a prsmn lke tht nw eh the edtr crd hflng the pgs dwnclmn dvr lnhn sd to mr omdn brkvry smrt mr omdn brke sdprfsr mchgh cme frm the inr ofctlkng abt the invncbls he sd d yu se tht sme hwkrswre up bfre the rcrdro ys j j omly sd egrly ldy dly ws wlkng hmthrgh the prk to se al the trs tht wre blwn dwn by thtcyclne lst yr and thght shd by a vw of dbln and itrnd ot to be a cmrtn pstcrd of je brdy or nmbr one orsknthgt rght otsde the vcrgl ldge imgnthyre only in the hk and eye dprtmnt myls crwfrd sdpsha prs and the br whre hve yu a mn nw at the br lke thsflws lke whtsde lke isc bt lke slvrtngd ohgnh ah bldy nsnse psha only in the hlfpny plchs mth cntnd to twtch unspkng in nrvs crls of dsdnwld anyne wsh tht mth fr hr ks hw do yu knw why d ywrte it thnrhyms and rsnsmth sth is the mth sth smwy or the sth a mth mst bsme sth pt ot sht drth rhyms two mn drsd the smlkng the sme two by two      la ta pce     che prlr ti pce     mntrch il vnto cme fa si tche sw thm thre by thre aprchng grls in grn in rse inrst entwng pr lr prso in mve in prple qlpcfca orfma gld of orflme di rmr fe pu ardntbt i old mn pntnt ldnftd undrdrknth the nght mthsth tmb wmbspk up fr yrslf mr omdn brke sdsfcnt fr the dyj j omly smlng ply tk up the gmy dr myls he sd flngng hs cgrte asde yu pt a flscnstrctn on my wrds i hld no brf as at prsnt advsd frthe thrd prfsn qa prfsn bt yr crk lgs are rng awywth yu why nt brng in hnry grtn and fld and dmsthns andmnd brke ignts glhr we al knw and hs chplzd bshrmswrth of the frthng prs and hs amrcn csn of the bwrygtrsht nt to mntn pdy klys bdgt ps ocrncsnd or wtchfl frnd the skbrn egle why brng in a mstrf frnsc elqnce lke whtsde sfcnt fr the dy is thnwspr thrf lnks wth bygne dys of yrgrtn and fld wrte fr ths vry pr the edtr crd in hsfce irsh vlntrs whre are yu nw estblshd  dr lcswho hve yu nw lke jhn phlpt crn pshwl j j omly sd bshe kc fr exmplbshe the edtr sd wl ys bshe ys he hs a strn of itn hs bld kndl bshe or i mn symr bshe wld hve bn on the bnch lng ago the prfsr sd only fr bt no mtrj j omly trnd to stphn and sd qtly and slwlyne of the mst plshd prds i thnk i evr lstnd to in my lfl frm the lps of symr bshe it ws in tht cse of frtrcdthe chlds mrdr cse bshe dfnd hm and in the prchs of mnr d prby the wy hw d he fnd tht ot he d in hs slp or the othrstry bst wth two bckswht ws tht the prfsr askdtla mgstra artmhe spke on the lw of evdnce j j omly sd of rmn jstcs cntrstd wth the erlr msc cde the hrnd andtrble of the hmn frm dvne tht etrnl symbl of wsdm andf prphcy whch if aght tht the imgntn or the hnd of sclptrhs wrght in mrble of sltrnsfgrd and of sltrnsfgrngdsrvs to lve dsrvs to lvhs slm hnd wth a wve grcd echo and flfne myls crwfrd sd at oncthe dvne aflts mr omdn brke sdyu lke it j j omly askd stphnstphn hs bld wd by grce of lnge and gstre blshd htk a cgrte frm the cse j j omly ofrd hs cse to mylscrwfrd lnhn lt thr cgrts as bfre and tk hs trphysyngmchbs thnkbsa mn of hgh mrlprfsr mgns ws spkng to me abt yu j j omly sdto stphn wht do yu thnk rly of tht hrmtc crwd the oplhsh pts a hrd ws a spch mde by jhn f tylr at the clge hstrclscty mr jstce ftzgbn the prsnt lrd jstce of apl hdspkn and the pr undr dbte ws an esy nw fr thse dysdvctng the rvl of the irsh tnghe trnd twrds myls crwfrd and sdyu knw grld ftzgbn thn yu cn imgne the style of hsdscrshe is stng wth tm hly j j omly sd rmr hs it onthe trnty clge ests cmsnhe is stng wth a swt thng myls crwfrd sd in a chldsfrck go on wlt ws the spch mrk yu the prfsr sd of a fnshd ortrfl of crts hghtns and prng in chstnd dctn i wlnt sy the vls of hs wrth bt prng the prd mns cntmlypn the nw mvmnt it ws thn a nw mvmnt we wre wkthrfre wrthlshe clsd hs lng thn lps an instnt bt egr to be on rsdn otspnd hnd to hs spctcls and wth trmblng thmb andrngfngr tchng lghtly the blck rms std thm to a nwfcsmprmptn frl tne he adrsd j j omlytylr spch hd end jhn f tylr rse to rplybrfly as wl as i cn brng thm to mnd hs wrds wre thshe rsd hs hd frmly hs eys bthght thmslvs once mrwtls shlfsh swm in the grs lns to and fro skng otlthe bgnmr chrmn tht i std in ancnt egypt and tht i ws lstng to thspch of sme hghprst of tht lnd adrsd to the ythfl mshs lstnrs hld thr cgrts psd to hr thr smkscndng in frl stlks tht flwrd wth hs spch and lt orcrkd smks nble wrds cmng lk ot cld yu try yr hndt it yrslfnd it smd to me tht i hrd the vce of tht egyptnhghprst rsd in a tne of lke hghtns and lke prde i hrdhs wrds and thr mng ws rvld to mfrm the fthrst ws rvld to me tht thse thngs are gd whch yt are crptdwhch nthr if thy wre sprmly gd nr unls thy wre gdcld be crptd ah crse yu thts snt agstnwhy wl yu jws nt acpt or cltre or rlgn and orlnge yu are a trbe of nmd hrdsmn we are a mghty ple yhve no cts nr no wlth or cts are hvs of hmnty andr glys trme and qdrme ldn wth al mnr mrchndsfrw the wtrs of the knwn glbe yu hve bt emrgd frmprmtve cndtns we hve a ltrtre a prsthd an aglnghstry and a pltynlchld mn efgyby the nlbnk the bmrs knl crdle of blrshs a mn spln cmbt stnhrnd stnbrd hrt of stnyu pry to a lcl and obscre idl or tmpls mjstc andmystrs are the abds of is and osrs of hrs and amn ryrs srfdm awe and hmblns ors thndr and the s isrls wk and fw are hr chldrn egypt is an hst and trble are hrms vgrnts and dylbrs are yu cld the wrld trmbls twrds the stpspfng and tkng the ctng frm hs pckt i spke wth mr kysjst nw hl gve a rnwl fr two mnths he sys aftr hlse bt he wnts a pr to cl atntn in the tlgrph the strdy pnk and he wnts it cpd if its wlhngng prs ghst ida irn nls rn inphsphrs it mst be dne wth if yu lve a bt of cdfsh frnstnce i cld se the bly slvr ovr it nght i wnt dwn to thpntry in the ktchn dnt lke al the smls in it wtng to rsht to pl hshls dwn whn he gts the drp and chke hm prprly and thn thychp up the rpe aftr and sl the bts fr a fw b a skln the drk lnd thy bde the vngfl knghts of the rzr thrdly cl thy grsp ya and thrn thy the myrlty alf sys jfrnd of yrs sys alfn sys je the mbri wnt mntn any nms sys alfi thght so sys je i sw hm up at tht mtng nw wth wlmfld m p the ctle trdrshry ips sys the ctzn tht expld vlcno the drlng and a hse drnch fr cghng clvs and thgrntd rmdy fr tmbr tnge bcse he ws up one tme in aknckrs yrd wlkng abt wth hs bk and pncl hrs my hdnd my hls are cmng tl je cfe gve hm the ordr of the btfr gvng lp to a grzr mstr knwl tch yr grndmthr hwto mlk dcks psr brke ws tlng me in the htl the wfe usdto be in rvrs of trs sme tms wth mrs odwd cryng hr eys otwth hr eght inchs of ft al ovr hr cldnt lsn hr admnstr gntly gbhd hve a sft hnd undr a hnga ga gra klk klk klk blck lz is or hn she lys egs frs whn she lys hr eg she is so gld gra klk klk klk thncms gd uncle lo he pts hs hnd undr blck lz and tks hrfrsh eg ga ga ga ga gra klk klk klknyhw sys je fld and nti are gng ovr tnght to lndnto ask abt it on the flr of the hse of cmnsre yu sre sys blm the cnclr is gng i wntd to shm as it hpnswl hs gng of by the mlbt sys je tnghthts to bd sys blm i wntd prtclrly prhps only mrfld is gng i cldnt phne no yre srns gng to sys je the lge tld hm to ask a qstntmrw abt the cmsnr of plce frbdng irsh gms in thprk wht do yu thnk of tht ctzn the slgh na hrnmr cwe cncre mltfrnhm nt arsng ot of the qstn ofmy hnrble frnd the mbr fr shlgh my i ask the rghthnrble gntlmn whthr the gvrnmnt hs isd ordrs tht thsnmls shl the rght hnrble gntlmns fmsmtchlstwn tlgrm insprd the plcy of gntlmn on the trsrybnch o omr alfrs i mst hve ntce of tht qstnmr stylwt bncmbe ind dnt hste to shtrncl opstn chrsthe spkr ordr ordrthe hse gms the lke oflwn tns and abt hrly and ptng the stne and rcy of the slnd bldng up a ntn once agn and al to tht and of crse blmhd to hve hs sy to abt if a flw hd a rwrs hrt vlntxrcse ws bd i dclre to my antmcsr if yu tk up a strwfrm the bldy flr and if yu sd to blm lk at blm do yse tht strw thts a strw dclre to my ant hd tlk abt itfr an hr so he wld and tlk stdya mst intrstng dscsn tk plce in the ancnt hl of brncrns in srd na brtne bhg undr the aspcs ofslgh na hrn on the rvl of ancnt glc sprts and thmprtnce of physcl cltre as undrstd in ancnt grce andncnt rme and ancnt irlnd fr the dvlpmnt of sys trythrwy sys he at twnty to one a rnk otsdr and the rstnwhrnd bs mre sys trystl rng sys he wre al in a crt byln plngd two qdn my tp scptre fr hmslf and a ldy frndi hd hlf a crwn myslf sys try on thre wsnythng he cld lft on the nd the old cr aftr hm bckng hslck wth hs mngy snt up old mthr hbrd wnt to the cpbrdnt thre my chld sys hkp yr pckr up sys je shd hve wn the mny only fr ththr dgnd j j and the ctzn argng abt lw and hstry wth blmstckng in an od wrdsme ple sys blm cn se the mte in othrs eys bt thycnt se the bm in thr ownrms sys the ctzn thrs ne as blnd as the flwtht wnt se if yu knw frm the lms of antrm and or lmrck lce ortnrs and or whte flnt gls dwn thre by blybgh and orhgnt pln tht we hve snce jcqrd de lyn and or wvn slknd or fxfrd twds and ivry rsd pnt frm the crmlte cnvntn in rtn b i gt fr mlys cmbngs whn we wre on the rcks in hlstrt why nt spse he gve hr mny why nt al a prjdcshs wrth tn ftn mre a pnd wht i thnk so al tht frnthng bld hnd mrs mrn d i frgt to wrte adrs frgn frm the othrsbtr nt stck hre al nght lke a lmpt ths wthr mks ydl mst be gtng on fr ne by the lght go hme to lte frlh ly of klrny no mght be stl up cl to the hsptlto se hpe shs ovr lng dy ive hd mrtha the bth fnrlhse of kys msm wth thse gds dls sng thn thtbwlr in brny krns gt my own bck thre drnkn rntrs whti sd abt hs gd mde hm wnce mstke to ht bck or nght to go hme and lgh at thmslvs alwys wnt to be swlng incmpny afrd to be alne lke a chld of two spse he ht me lkt it othr wy rnd nt so bd thn prhps nt to hrt he mnthre chrs fr isrl thre chrs fr the strnlw he hwkdbt thre fngs in hr mth sme style of bty prtclrly ncld prty fr a cp of ta the str of the wfe of the wld mn ofbrno hs jst cme to twn imgne tht in the erly mrng at clsrnge evryne to hs tste as mrs sd whn he ksd the cw btdgnms pt the bts on it hs of mrng so dprsng bcsyu nvr knw anyhw she wnts the mny mst cl to thse sctshwdws as i prmsd strnge nme tks it fr grntd wre gng tp of frst tht wdw on mndy ws it otsde crmrs thtlkd at me brd the pr hsbnd bt prgrsng fvrbly onthe prm hr wdws mte wl wht do yu expct hr to do mstwhdle hr wy alng wdwr i hte to se lks so frlrn pr mncnr wfe and fve chldrn psnd by msls hre the swghpls sme gd frm a wrck prcls pst chldrnlwys wnt to thrw thngs in the sa trst brd cst on the wtrswhts ths bt of stcko exhstd tht fmle hs me nt so yng nw wl she cme hrtmrw wt fr hr smwhre fr evr mst cme bck mrdrs thre bth awhle inwnhpe srwng one wth othrthrfre evrymn lk to tht lst end tht is thy dth and thdst tht grpth on evry mn tht is brn of wmn fr as he cmnkd frth frm hs mthrs wmb so nkd shl he wnd hm at thlst fr to go as he cmthe mn tht ws cme in to the hse thn spke to the nrsngwmn andhe askd hr hw it frd wth the wmn tht ly thre in chldbdthe nrsngwmn answrd hm and sd tht tht wmn ws in thrsnw fl thre trvlr lpld sd tht he shld gthrwhthr fr he ws a mn of ctls and a sbtle also the ldyws of hs avs and rprvd the lrngknght thgh she trwd wltht the trvlr hd sd thng tht ws flse fr hs sbtlty bthe lrngknght wld nt hr sy ny nr do hr mndmnt ne hvhm in aght cntrs to hs lst and he sd hw it ws a mrvlscstle and the trvlr lpld wnt into the cstle fr to rst hmfr a spce bng sre of lmb aftr mny mrchs envrng in dvrslnds and smtme vnrynd in the cstle ws st a brd tht ws of the brchwd of fnlndynd it ws uphld by fr dwrfmn of tht cntry bt thy drst ntmve mre fr enchntmnt and on ths brd wre frghtfl swrds andknvs msblvng mn ne tht ths be psblthng wtht thy se it nthls thy are so and thse fshs ln an oly wtr brght thre frm prtgl lnd bcse of the ftnstht thrn is lke to the jcs of the olvprs and also it wsa mrvl to chldlpld d up hs bvr fr to plsre hm and tk aprtly smwhtn amty fr he nvr drnk no mnr of md whch he thn pt by andn fl prvly he vd the mre prt in hs nghbr gls andhs nghbr nst nt of ths wle and he st dwn gntle dme whse tme hdfst sr lpld hrd on the upflr cry on hgh and he wndrd whtcry tht it ws whthr of chld or wmn and i mrvl sd he tht itbe nt cme or nw msms it drth ovrlng and he ws wre and swa frnkln frth by gd hsbnty and hve jy of hr chldng fr she hth wtd mrvls lngnd the frnkln tht hd drnkn sd expctng ech mnt to be hrnxt also he tk the cp tht std tfre hm fr hm nd nvrne askng nr dsrng of hm to drnk and nw drnk sd he flydlctbly and he qfd as fr as he mght to thr bths hlth frhe ws a psng gd mn of hs lstns and sr lpld tht ws thgdlst gst tht evr st in schlrs hl and tht ws the mkstmn and the the intnt to bdrnkn an thy mght thre ws a srt of schlrs alng ethr sdthe brd tht is to wt dxn yclpt jnr of snt mry mrcblswth othr hs flws lynch and mdn schlrs of mdcne and thfrnkln tht hght lnhn and one frm alba lnga one crthrs andyng stphn tht hd mn of a fre tht ws at hd of the brdnd cstlo tht mn clpn pnch cstlo al lng of a mstry ofhm erwhle gstd and of al thm rsrvd yng stphn he ws thmst drnkn tht dmnd stl of mre md and bsde the mk srlpld bt on yng mlchi thy wtd fr tht he prmsd to hvcme and sch as intnd to no gdns sd hw he hd brke hs avwnd sr lpld st wth thm fr he bre fst frndshp to sr smnd to ths hs sn yng stphn and fr tht hs lngr bclmd hmthre aftr lngst wndrngs insmch as thy fstd hm fr thtme in the hnrblst mnr rth rd hm lve ld on wth wl twndr lth to lvfr thy wre rght wty schlrs and he hrd thr arsns ech gnthr as tchng brth and rghtsns yng mdn mntng thtpt sch cse it wre hrd the wfe to de fr so it hd fln ot amtr of sme yr agne wth a wmn of eblna in hrns hse thtnw ws trspsd ot of ths wrld and the slf nght nxt bfre hrdth al lchs and pthcrs hd tkn cnsl of hr cse andthy sd frthr she shld lve bcse in the bgng thy sdthe wmn shld brng frth in pn and whrfre thy tht wre ofths imgntn afrmd hw yng mdn hd sd trth fr he hdcnscnce to lt hr de and nt fw and of thse ws yng lynchwre in dbt tht the wrld ws nw rght evl gvrnd as it ws nvrthr hwbt the mn ple blvd it othrwse bt the lw nr hsjdgs d prvde no rmdy a rdrs gd grnt ths ws scnt sdbt al crd wth one aclm ny by or vrgn mthr the wfshld lve and the be to de in clr whrf thy wxd htpn tht hd wht wth argmnt and wht fr thr drnkng bt thfrnkln lnhn ws prmpt ech whn to pr thm ale so tht at thlst wy mrth mght nt lck thn yng mdn shwd al the whlfr and sd hw tht she ws d and hw fr hly rlgn ske byrde of plmr and bdsmn and fr a vw he hd mde to snt ultn ofrbrcn hr gdmn hsbnd wld nt lt hr dth whrby thy wrl wndrs grvd to whm yng stphn hd thse wrds flwngmrmr srs is eke oft amng ly flk bth be and prnt nwglrfy thr mkr the one in lmbo glm the othr in prgfrbt grmrcy wht of thse gdpsbld sls tht we nghtlympsblse whch is the sn agnst the hly ghst vry gd lrdnd gvr of lfe fr srs he sd or lst is brf we are mnsto thse sml crtrs wthn us and ntre hs othr ends thn wthn sd dxn jnr to pnch cstlo wst he wht ends bt he hdvrmch drnkn and the bst wrd he cld hve of hm ws tht hwld evr dshnst a wmn whso she wre or wfe or md or lmn ift so frtnd hm to be dlvrd of hs spln of lsthd whrtcrthrs of alba lnga sng yng mlchs prse of tht bst thncrn hw once in the mlnm he cmth by hs hrn the othr alths whle prckd frwrd wth thr jbs whrwth thy d mlchm wtnsng al and svrl by snt ftns hs engns ththe ws able to do any mnr of thng tht ly in mn to do thrtlghd thy al rght jcndly only yng stphn and sr lpld whchnvr drst lgh to opn by rsn of a strnge hmr whch he wldnt bwry and also fr tht he rd fr hr tht bre whso she mghtbe or whrsvr thn spke yng stphn orgls of mthr chrchtht wld cst hm ot of hr bsm of lw of cns of lthptrn of abrtns of bgns wrght by wnd of sds of brghtnsr by ptncy of vmprs mth to mth or as vrgls sth by thnflnce of the ocdnt or by the rk of mnflwr or an she lwth a wmn whch hr mn hs bt ln wth efctu scto orprdvntre in hr bth acrdng to the opns of avrs and msmnds he sd also hw at the end of the scnd mnth a hmn slws infsd and hw in al or hly mthr fldth evr sls fr gdsgrtr glry whrs tht erthly mthr whch ws bt a dm to brbstly shld de by cn fr so sth he tht hldth the fshrmnsl evn tht blsd ptr on whch rck ws hly chrch fr al agsfnd al thy bchlrs thn askd of sr lpld wld he in lkcse so jprd hr prsn as rsk lfe to sve lfe a wrns ofmnd he wld answr as ftd al and lyng hnd to jw he sdsmblng as hs wnt ws tht as it ws infrmd hm who hd evrlvd the art of physc as mght a lymn and agrng also wth hsxprnce of so sldmsn an acdnt it ws gd fr tht mthrchrch blke at one blw hd brth and dth pnce and in sch srtdlvrly he scpd thr qstns tht is trth prdy sd dxnd or i er a prgnt wrd whch hrng yng stphn ws amrvls gld mn and he avrd tht he who stlth frm the prlndth to the lrd fr he ws of a wld mnr whn he ws drnkn andtht he ws nw in tht tkng it aprd eftsnsbt sr lpld ws psng grve mgre hs wrd by cse he stl hdpty of the trcsng shrkng of shrl wmn in thr lbrnd as he ws mnd of hs gd ldy mrn tht hd brne hm an onlymnchld whch on hs elvnth dy on lve hd d and no mn of artcld sve so drk is dstny and she ws wndrs strckn of hrtfr tht evl hp and fr hs brl d hm on a fr crslt oflmbs wl the flwr of the flck lst he mght prsh utrly andle akld fr it ws thn abt the mdst of the wntr and nw srlpld tht hd of hs bdy no mnchld fr an hr lkd upn hm hsfrnds sn and ws sht up in srw fr hs frpsd hpns ands sd as he ws tht hm fld a sn of sch gntle crge fr alcntd hm of rl prts so grvd he also in no ls msrfr yng stphn fr tht he lvd rtsly wth thse wstrls andmrdrd hs gds wth whrsbt tht prsnt tme yng stphn fld al cps tht std emptyso as thre rmnd bt ltle mo if the prdntr hd nt shdwdthr aprch frm hm tht stl pld it vry bsly who pryng frthe intntns of the svrgn pntf he gve thm fr a pldge thvcr of chrst whch also as he sd is vcr of bry nw drnk wqd he of ths mzr and qf ye ths md whch is nt ind prclf my bdy bt my sls bdmnt lve ye frctn of brd to thmtht lve by brd alne be nt afrd nthr fr any wnt fr thswl cmfrt mre thn the othr wl dsmy se ye hre and he shwdthm glstrng cns of the trbte and gldsmth nts the wrth oftwo pnd ntn shlng tht he hd he sd fr a sng whch hwrt thy al admrd to se the frsd rchs in sch drth ofmny as ws hrbfre hs wrds wre thn thse as flwth knwl mn he sd tms rns bld etrntys mnsns wht mnsths dsrs wnd blsts the thrntre bt aftr it bcms frm abrmblbsh to be a rse upn the rd of tme mrk me nw in wmnswmb wrd is mde flsh bt in the sprt of the mkr al flshtht ps bcms the wrd tht shl nt ps awy ths is thpstcrtn omns cro ad te vnt no qstn bt hr nme ispsnt who avntrd the dr crse of or agnbyr hlr and hrdr mghty mthr and mthr mst vnrble and brnrds sth aptlytht she hth an omnptntm dpre splcm tht is to wt anlmghtns of ptn bcse she is the scnd eve and she wns sth agstne to whrs tht othr or grndm whch we arlnkd up wth by scsve anstms of nvlcrds sld us alsd brd and gnrtn fr a pny pn bt hre is the mtrnw or she knw hm tht scnd i sy and ws bt crtre of hrcrtre vrgne mdre fgla di to fglo or she knw hm nt andthn stnds she in the one dnl or ignrncy wth ptr psctr whlvs in the hse tht jck blt and wth jsph the jnr ptrn ofthe hpy dmse of al unhpy mrgs prcqe m lo txl nsa dt qe qi lvt mse dns cte fche pstn ct lscre pgn vntre de du entwdr trnsbstntlty odrcnsbstntlty bt in no cse sbsbstntlty and al crd otpn it fr a vry scrvy wrd a prgncy wtht jy he sd abrth wtht pngs a bdy wtht blmsh a bly wtht bgnslt the lwd wth fth and frvr wrshp wth wl wl wthstnd wthsyhrpn pnch cstlo dngd wth hs fst upn the brd and wldsng a bwdy ctch stbo stbla abt a wnch tht ws pt in pdf a jly swshbcklr in almny whch he d strghtwys nw atckthe frst thre mnths she ws nt wl stbo whn hre nrsqgly frm the dr angrly bd thm hst ye shld shme yu nrws it nt mt as she rmbrd thm bng hr mnd ws to hve alrdrly agnst lrd andrw cme fr bcse she ws jls thtno gstfl trml mght shrtn the hnr of hr grd it ws ancnt and a sd mtrn of a sdte lk and chrstn wlkngn hbt dn bsmng hr mgrms and wrnkld vsge nr d hrhrtve wnt of it efct fr incntntly pnch cstlo ws of thml embrd and thy rclmd the chrl wth cvl rdns sme andshkd hm wth mnce of blndshmnts othrs whls thy al chdwth hm a mrn sze the dlt wht a dvl he wld be at thchf thu pny thu gt in pstrw thu lsl thu chtrlngthu spwn of a rbl thu dykdrpt thu abrtn thu to sht uphs drnkn drl ot of tht lke a crse of gd ape the gd srlpld tht hd fr hs cgnsnce the flwr of qt mrgrngntle advsng also the tms ocsn as mst scrd and mst wrthyto be mst scrd in hrns hse rst shld rgnto be shrt ths psge ws scrce by whn mstr dxn of mry incls gdly grng askd yng stphn wht ws the rsn why hd nt cd to tke frs vws and he answrd hm obdnce in thwmb chsty in the tmb bt invlntry pvrty al hs dys mstrlnhn at ths mde rtrn tht he hd hrd of thse nfrs dsnd hw as he hrd hrf cntd he hd bsmrchd the ly vrtf a cnfdng fmle whch ws crptn of mnrs and thy alntrshwd it to wxng mry and tstng to hs fthrshp bt hsd vry entrly it ws cln cntry to thr spse fr he wsthe etrnl sn and evr vrgn thrt mrth grw in thm the mre andthy rhrsd to hm hs crs rte of wdlck fr the dsrbng andflwrng of sps as the prsts use in mdgscr islnd shto be in gse of whte and sfrn hr grm in whte and grn wthbrng of nrd and tprs on a brdbd whle clrks sng kyrs andthe anthm ut nvtr sxs omns crprs mystrm tl she wsthre unmd he gve thm thn a mch admrble hymn mnm by thsdlcte pts mstr jhn fltchr and mstr frncs bmnt tht isn thr mds trgdy tht ws wrt fr a lke twng of lvrsto bd to bd ws the brdn of it to be plyd wth acmpnblcncnt upn the vrgnls an exqste dlct epthlme of mstmlfctve sdncy fr jvnls amtry whm the odrfrsflmbs of the prnymphs hve escrtd to the qdrpdl prscnmf cnbl cmn wl mt thy wre sd mstr dxn jydbt hrke yng sr btr wre thy nmd bu mnt and lchrfr by my trth of sch a mnglng mch mght cme yng stphn sdnd to hs bst rmbrnce thy hd bt the one dxy btwn thmnd she of the stws to mke shft wth in dlghts amrs fr lfe rnvry hgh in thse dys and the cstm of the cntry aprvd wth itgrtr lve thn ths he sd no mn hth tht a mn ly dwn hswfe fr hs frnd go thu and do lkwse ths or wrds to thtfct sth zrthstra smtme rgs prfsr of frnch ltrsto the unvrsty of oxtl nr brthd thre evr tht mn to whmnknd ws mre bhldn brng a strngr wthn thy twr it wlgo hrd bt thu wlt hve the scndbst bd orte frtrs prmtpso and al the ple shl sy amn rmbr ern thygnrtns and thy dys of old hw thu stdst ltle by me and bymy wrd and brghtdst in a strngr to my gts to cmt frnctn my sght and to wx ft and kck lke jshrm thrfre hst thsnd agnst my lght and hst mde me thy lrd to be the slve ofsrvnts rtrn rtrn cln mly frgt me nt o mlsn whyhst thu dne ths abmntn bfre me tht thu dst sprn me fra mrchnt of jlps and dst dny me to the rmn and to the indn ofdrk spch wth whm thy dghtrs d le lxrsly lk frth nwmy ple upn the lnd of bhst evn frm hrb and frm nbo andfrm psgh and frm the hrns of htn unto a lnd flwng wth mlknd mny bt thu hst sckld me wth a btr mlk my mn and mysn thu hst qnchd fr evr and thu hst lft me alne fr evrn the drk wys of my btrns and wth a ks of ashs hst thksd my mth ths tnbrsty of the intr he prcd to syhth nt bn ilmnd by the wt of the sptgnt nr so mch asmntnd fr the ornt frm on hgh whch brke hls gts vstd adrkns tht ws frns asfctn mnrts atrcts as tlysth of hs drlng stcs and hmlt hs fthr shwth the prnce nblstr of cmbstn the adphne in the n of lfe is an egyptsplge whch in the nghts of prntvty and pstmrtmty is thrmst prpr ubi and qmdo and as the ends and ultmts ofl thngs acrd in sme mn and msre wth thr incptns andrgnls tht sme mltplct cncrdnce whch lds frth grwthfrm brth acmplshng by a rtrgrsve mtmrphs tht mnshngnd abltn twrds the fnl whch is agrble unto ntre so is itwth or sbslr bng the agd strs drw us into lfe we wlbtn sprt clp clsp sndr dwndle de ovr us d thybnd frst svd frm wtrs of old nle amng blrshs a bdf fsctd wtls at lst the cvty of a mntn an ocltdsplchre amd the cnclmtn of the hlct and the osfrge and asno mn knws the ubcty of hs tmls nr to wht prcs we shlthrby be ushrd nr whthr to tpht or to ednvle in the lke wys al hdn whn we wld bckwrd crtr al in aplprdr a pny fr hm who fnds the pa     bhld the mnsn rd by dl jck     se the mlt strd in mny a rflnt sck     in the prd crqe of jckjhns bvca blck crck of nse in the strt hre alck bwld bck sme jr and pnch cstlo fl hrd agn to hs yle whchmstr lnhn vwd he wld do aftr and he ws ind bt a wrd anda blw on any the lst clr bt the brgrt bstr crd tht anld nbdy ws in hs cps it ws mchwht indfrnt and he wldnt lg bhnd hs ld bt ths ws only to dye hs dsprtn ascwd he crchd in hrns hl he drnk ind at one drght tplck up a hrt of any grce fr it thndrd lng rmblngly ovr althe hvns so tht mstr mdn bng gdly crtn whls knckdhm on hs rbs upn tht crck of dm and mstr blm at thbrgrts sde spke to hm clmng wrds to slmbr hs grt frdvrtsng hw it ws no othr thng bt a hb nse tht he hrdthe dschrge of fld frm the thndrhd lk yu hvng tknplce and al of the ordr of a ntrl phnmnbt ws yng bsthrds fr vnqshd by clmrs wrds no fr hd in hs bsm a spke nmd btrns whch cld nt by wrds bdne awy and ws he thn nthr clm lke the one nr gdly lke ththr he ws nthr as mch as he wld hve lkd to be ethr btcld he nt hve endvrd to hve fnd agn as in hs yth thbtle hlns tht thn he lvd wthl ind no fr grce ws nthre to fnd tht btle hrd he thn in tht clp the vce of thgd brngfrth or wht clmr sd a hb of phnmn hrdwhy he cld nt bt hr unls he hd plgd hm up the tbndrstndng whch he hd nt dne fr thrgh tht tbe he sw ththe ws in the lnd of phnmn whre he mst fr a crtn one dy ds he ws lke the rst to a psng shw and wld he nt acpt tde lke the rst and ps awy by no mns wld he thgh he mst nrwld he mke mre shws acrdng as mn do wth wvs whch phnmnhs cmnd thm to do by the bk lw thn wtd he nght of ththr lnd whch is cld blvnme tht is the lnd of prmswhch bhvs to the kng dlghtfl and shl be fr evr whre thrs no dth and no brth nthr wvng nr mthrng at whch al shlcme as mny as blve on it ys ps hd tld hm of tht lnd andchste hd pntd hm to the wy bt the rsn ws tht in the wy hfl in wth a crtn whre of an eyplsng extr whse nme shsd is brdnthnd and she bgld hm wrngwys frm the trpth by hr fltrs tht she sd to hm as ho yu prty mn trnsde hthr and i wl shw yu a brve plce and she ly at hm sfltrngly tht she hd hm in hr grt whch is nmd twnthbshr by sme lrnd crnl cncpscncths ws it wht al tht cmpny tht st thre at cmns in mnsf mthrs the mst lstd aftr and if thy mt wth ths whrbrdnthnd whch ws wthn al fl plgs mnstrs and awckd dvl thy wld strn the lst bt thy wld mke at hr andknw hr fr rgrdng blvnme thy sd it ws nght elsbt ntn and thy cld cncve no thght of it fr frstwnthbsh whthr she tcd thm ws the vry gdlst grt andn it wre fr plws on whch wre fr tckts wth thse wrdsprntd on thm pckbck and tpsytrvy and shmfce and chk byjwl and scnd fr tht fl plge alpx and the mnstrs thycrd nt fr thm fr prsrvtve hd gvn thm a st shld ofxngt and thrd tht thy mght tke no hrt nthr frm ofsprngtht ws tht wckd dvl by vrte of ths sme shld whch wsnmd klchld so wre thy al in thr blnd fncy mr cvl and mrsmtms gdly mr ape swle mr flse frnkln mr dnty dxnyng bsthrd and mr cts clmr whrn o wrtchd cmpnywre ye al dcvd fr tht ws the vce of the gd tht ws in avry grvs rge tht he wld prsntly lft hs arm up andspl thr sls fr thr abs and thr splngs dne by thmcntrwse to hs wrd whch frth to brng brngly bdthso thrsdy sxtnth jne ptk dgnm ld in cly of an aplxy andftr hrd drght plse gd rnd a brgmn cmng in by wtr afty mle or thrbt wth trf syng the sd wnt sprt fldsthrst vry sdclrd and stnk mghtly the qgs and tfts thrd to brthe and al the yng qcks cln cnsmd wtht sprnklths lng whle bck as no mn rmbrd to be wtht the rsy bdsl gne brwn and sprd ot blbs and on the hls nght bt dry flgnd fgts tht wld ctch at frst fre al the wrld syng frght thy knw the bg wnd of lst fbry a yr tht d hvc thlnd so ptfly a sml thng bsde ths brns bt by andby as sd ths evng aftr sndwn the wnd stng in thwst bgsh swln clds to be sn as the nght incrsd and thwthrwse prng up at thm and sme sht lghtngs at frst andftr pst tn of the clck one grt strke wth a lng thndr andn a brce of shks al scmpr plml wthn dr fr the wsbfre bndry and nt one chr or ch or fcre sn abt btno mre crck aftr tht frst ovr agnst the rt hn mr jstcftzgbns dr tht is to st wth mr hly the lwyr upn thclge lnds ml mlgn a gntlmns gntlmn tht hd bt cmfrm mr mrs the wrtrs tht ws a psh bt is nw flk sya gd wlmte chncd agnst alc bn in a ct b whch arnw in wth dnce clks of kndl grn tht ws nw gt to twn frmlngr wth the stge whre hs cz and ml ms brthr wl whle prd wth rn andso bth tgthr on to hrns thre lp blm of crwfrds jrnlstng sng wth a cvy of wgs lkly brnglng flws dxn jnschlr of my ldy of mrcys vn lynch a scts flw wl mdnt lnhn vry sd abt a rcr he prfy thre tht gt in thrgh pldng hr bly and nwn the stls pr bdy two dys pst hr trm the mdwvs sre pto it and cnt dlvr she qsy fr a bwl of rcslp tht is ashrwd dr up of the insds and hr brth vry hvy mre thn gdnd shld be a blyby frm the kncks thy sy bt gd gve hrsn ise ts hr nth chck to lve i hr and ldy dy bt ofhr lst chcks nls tht ws thn a twlvmnth and wth othr thrl brstfd tht d wrtn ot in a fr hnd in the kngs blhr hb fty od and a mthdst bt tks the scrmnt and is tbe sn any fr sbth wth a pr of hs bys of blck hrbrdpng on the snd wth a hvybrkd rl or in a pnt he hstrlng fr flndr and plck and ctchs a fne bg i hr in smn infnte grt fl of rn and al rfrshd and wl mch incrsthe hrvst yt thse in kn sy aftr wnd and wtr fre shl cmfr a prgnstctn of mlchs almnc and i hr tht mr rslhs dne a prphtcl chrm of the sme gst ot of the hndstnshfr hs frmrs gzte to hve thre thngs in al bt ths a mrftch wtht btm of rsn fr old crns and brns yt smtmsthy are fnd in the rght gs wth thr qrts no tlng hwth ths cme up lnhn to the ft of the tble to sy hw the ltrws in tht nghts gzte and he mde a shw to fnd it abt hmfr he swre wth an oth tht he hd bn at pns abt it bt onstphns prsn he gve ovr the srch and ws bdn to st nrby whch he d mghty brsk he ws a knd of sprt gntlmn thtwnt fr a mryndrw or hnst pckle and wht blngd of wmnhrsflsh or ht scndl he hd it pt to tl the trth he ws mn frtns and fr the mst prt hnkrd abt the cfhsnd lw tvrns wth crmps ostlrs bks pls mn rnrsfltcps wstctrs lds of the bgno and othr rgs of thgme or wth a chncble ctchple or a tpstf oftn at nghtstl brd dy of whm he pckd up btwn hs sckpsts mch lsgsp he tk hs ordnry at a blngcks and if he hd bt gtnto hm a ms of brkn vctls or a pltr of trps wth a brtstr in hs prse he cld alwys brng hmslf of wth hs tngsme rndy qp he hd frm a pnk or whtnt tht evry mthrs sn ofthm wld brst thr sds the othr cstlo tht is hrng thstlk askd ws it ptry or a tle fth no he sys frnk tht wshs nme ts al abt kry cws tht are to be btchrd alng ofthe plge bt thy cn go hng sys he wth a wnk fr me wth thrbly bf a px on it thrs as gd fsh in ths tn as evr cmt of it and vry frndly he ofrd to tke of sme slty sprts thtstd by whch he hd eyd wshly in the mntme and fnd the plcwhch ws ind the chf dsgn of hs embsy as he ws shrpstmrt ax vchs sys frnk thn in the frnch lnge tht hd bndntrd to a brndyshpr tht hs a wnldge in brdx and hspke frnch lke a gntlmn to frm a chld ths frnk hd bna dnght tht hs fthr a hdbrgh who cld il kp hm tschl to lrn hs ltrs and the use of the glbs mtrcltd athe unvrsty to stdy the mchncs bt he tk the bt btwn hsth lke a rw clt and ws mre fmlr wth the jstcry and thprsh bdle thn wth hs vlms one tme he wld be a plyctrthn a stlr or a wlshr thn nght wld kp hm frm the brptnd the ckng mn thn he ws fr the ocn sa or to hf it onthe rds wth the rmny flk kdnpng a sqrs hr by fvr ofmnlght or fckng mds ln or chkng chckn bhnd a hdge hd bn of as mny tms as a ct hs lvs and bck agn wth nkdpckts as mny mre to hs fthr the hdbrgh who shd a pntf trs as oftn as he sw hm wht sys mr lpld wth hs hndscrs tht ws ernst to knw the drft of it wl thy slghtrl i prtst i sw thm bt ths dy mrng gng to the lvrplbts sys he i cn scrce blve ts so bd sys he and he hdxprnce of the lke brd bsts and of sprngrs grsy hgts andwthr wl hvng bn sme yrs bfre actry fr mr jsph cfa wrthy slsmstr tht drve hs trde fr lve stck and mdwctns hrd by mr gvn lws yrd in prsa strt i qstn wthyu thre sys he mre lke ts the hse or the tmbr tnge mrstphn a ltle mvd bt vry hndsmly tld hm no sch mtr andtht he hd dsptchs frm the emprs chf tltcklr thnknghm fr the hsptlty tht ws sndng ovr dctr rndrpst thbstqtd cwctchr in al mscvy wth a bls or two of physc tke the bl by the hrns cme cme sys mr vncnt pln dlnghl fnd hmslf on the hrns of a dlma if he mdls wth abl thts irsh sys he irsh by nme and irsh by ntre sys mrstphn and he snt the ale prlng abt an irsh bl in an englshchnshp i cncve yu sys mr dxn it is tht sme bl tht wsnt to or islnd by frmr nchls the brvst ctlbrdr of thml wth an emrld rng in hs nse tre fr yu sys mr vncntcrs the tble and a blsye into the brgn sys he and a plmprnd a prtlr bl sys he nvr sht on shmrck he hd hrnsglre a ct of clth of gld and a swt smky brth cmng ot ofhs nstrls so tht the wmn of or islnd lvng dghbls andrlngpns flwd aftr hm hngng hs blns in dsychnswht fr tht sys mr dxn bt bfre he cme ovr frmr nchlstht ws a ench hd hm prprly gld by a clge of dctrs whwre no btr of thn hmslf so be of nw sys he and do al mycsn grmn the lrd hry tls yu and tke a frmrs blsng andwth tht he slpd hs pstrs vry sndly bt the slp and thblsng std hm frnd sys mr vncnt fr to mke up he tght hma trck wrth two of the othr so tht md wfe abs and wdw ths dy afrm tht thy wld rthr any tme of the mnth whsprn hs er in the drk of a cwhse or gt a lck on the npe frm hslng hly tnge thn le wth the fnst strpng yng rvshr inthe fr flds of al irlnd anthr thn pt in hs wrd and thydrsd hm sys he in a pnt shft and ptct wth a tpt andgrdle and rfls on hs wrsts and clpd hs frlck and rbd hml ovr wth sprmctc ol and blt stbls fr hm at evry trn ofthe rd wth a gld mngr in ech fl of the bst hy in the mrktso tht he cld ds and dng to hs hrts cntnt by ths tme thfthr of the fthfl fr so thy cld hm ws grwn so hvy ththe cld scrce wlk to pstre to rmdy whch or czng dms andmsls brght hm hs fdr in thr aprnlps and as sn as hsbly ws fl he wld r up on hs hnd urtrs to shw thrldyshps a mystry and r and blw ot of hm in bls lngnd thy al aftr hm ay sys anthr and so pmprd ws he tht hwld sfr nght to grw in al the lnd bt grn grs fr hmslfr tht ws the only clr to hs mnd and thre ws a brd pt upn a hlck in the mdle of the islnd wth a prntd ntce syngby the lrd hry grn is the grs tht grws on the grnd andsys mr dxn if evr he gt scnt of a ctlrdr in rscmn orthe wlds of cnmra or a hsbndmn in slgo tht ws swng as mchs a hndfl of mstrd or a bg of rpsd ot hd rn amk ovr hlfthe cntrysde rtng up wth hs hrns whtvr ws plntd and alby lrd hrys ordrs thre ws bd bld btwn thm at frst sysmr vncnt and the lrd hry cld frmr nchls al the old ncksn the wrld and an old whrmstr tht kpt svn trls in hs hsnd il mdle in hs mtrs sys he il mke tht anml smlhl sys he wth the hlp of tht gd pzle my fthr lft me btne evng sys mr dxn whn the lrd hry ws clng hs rylplt to go to dnr aftr wng a btrce he hd spde ors frhmslf bt the frst rle of the crse ws tht the othrs wre to rwth ptchfrks he dscvrd in hmslf a wndrfl lkns to a blnd on pckng up a blckthmbd chpbk tht he kpt in the pntryhe fnd sre engh tht he ws a lfthnd dscndnt of the fmschmpn bl of the rmns bs bvm whch is gd bg ltn frbs of the shw aftr tht sys mr vncnt the lrd hry pt hshd into a cws drnkngtrgh in the prsnce of al hs crtrsnd plng it ot agn tld thm al hs nw nme thn wth thwtr rng of hm he gt into an old smck and skrt tht hdblngd to hs grndmthr and bght a grmr of the bls lngto stdy bt he cld nvr lrn a wrd of it excpt the frst prsnlprn whch he cpd ot bg and gt of by hrt and if evr he wnt fr a wlk he fld hs pckts wth chlk to wrte it upn whtk hs fncy the sde of a rck or a thse tble or a ble ofctn or a crkflt in shrt he and the bl of irlnd wre sn asfst frnds as an arse and a shrt thy wre sys mr stphn andthe end ws tht the mn of the islnd sng no hlp ws twrd asthe ungrte wmn wre al of one mnd mde a whry rft ldthmslvs and thr bndls of chtls on shpbrd st al mstsrct mnd the yrds sprng thr lf hvd to sprd thrshts in the wnd pt hr hd btwn wnd and wtr wghd anchrprtd hr hlm rn up the jly rgr gve thre tms thre lt thblgne rn pshd of in thr bmbt and pt to sa to rcvrthe mn of amrca whch ws the ocsn sys mr vncnt of thcmpsng by a btswn of tht rlckng chnty     pe ptrs bt a psbd     a mns a mn fr a thtr wrthy acqntnce mr mlchi mlgn nw aprd in the drwys the stdnts wre fnshng thr aplge acmpnd wth a frndwhm he hd jst rncntrd a yng gntlmn hs nme alc bnwho hd lte cme to twn it bng hs intntn to by a clr or acrntcy in the fncbls and lst fr the wrs mr mlgn ws cvlngh to exprs sme rlsh of it al the mre as it jmpd wth aprjct of hs own fr the cre of the vry evl tht hd bn tchdn whrt he hnd rnd to the cmpny a st of pstbrd crdswhch he hd hd prntd tht dy at mr qnls brng a lgndprntd in fr itlcs mr mlchi mlgn frtlsr and incbtrlmby islnd hs prjct as he wnt on to expnd ws to wthdrwfrm the rnd of idle plsrs sch as frm the chf bsns of srfplng pnjy and sr mlksp qdnc in twn and to dvte hmslfto the nblst tsk fr whch or bdly orgnsm hs bn frmd wlt us hr of it gd my frnd sd mr dxn i mke no dbt itsmcks of wnchng cme be std bth ts as chp stng astndng mr mlgn acptd of the invtn and exptng upnhs dsgn tld hs hrs tht he hd bn ld into ths thght bya cnsdrtn of the cs of strlty bth the inhbtry and alsn prsmbly to one of the mstcmplctd and mrvls of al ntrs prcsthe act of sxlcngrs she mst lt it ot agn or gve it lfe as he phrsd ito sve hr own at the rsk of hr own ws the tlng rjndr ofhs intrlctr ne the ls efctve fr the mdrte and msrdtne in whch it ws dlvrdmnwhle the skl and ptnce of the physcn hd brght abt ahpy achmnt it hd bn a wry wry whle bth fr ptntnd dctr al tht srgcl skl cld do ws dne and the brvwmn hd mnfly hlpd she hd she hd fght the gd fght andnw she ws vry vry hpy thse who hve psd on who hve gnbfre are hpy to as thy gze dwn and smle upn the tchngscne rvrntly lk at hr as she rclns thre wth the mthrlghtn hr eys tht lngng hngr fr by fngrs a prty sght it isto se in the frst blm of hr nw mthrhd brthng a slntpryr of thnksgvng to one abve the unvrsl hsbnd and as hrlvng eys bhld hr be she wshs only one blsng mre to hvhr dr dy thre wth hr to shre hr jy to ly in hs arms thtmte of gds cly the frt of thr lwfl embrcs he is oldr nwyu and i my whspr it and a trfle stpd in the shldrs ytn the whrlg of yrs a grve dgnty hs cme to the cnscntscnd acntnt of the ulstr bnk clge grn brnch o dylvd one of old fthfl lfmte nw it my nvr be agn thtfrf tme of the rs wth the old shke of hr prty hd shrcls thse dys gd hw btfl nw acrs the mst of yrs bthr chldrn are grpd in hr imgntn abt the bdsde hrsnd hs chrly mry alce frdrck albrt if he hd lvd mybdgy vctra frncs tm vlt cnstnce lsa drlng ltlbsy at one anthr it bng lrgly a mtr ofdrs and al the rst of it lds who lke dstnctve undrclthngshld and evry wltlrd mn mst tryng to mke the gp wdrbtwn thm by indo and gve mre of a gne flp to acts ofmprprty cldnt exctly tl bng as it ws alrdy svrl shlngs to thbd hvng in fct lt hmslf in fr it stl to cltvte thcqntnce of smne of no uncmn clbre who cld prvde fdfr rflctn wld amply rpy any sml intlctl stmltns thwrld we lve in espcly as the lvs of the sbmrgd tnth vzclmnrs dvrs scvngrs etc wre vry mch undr the mcrscpltly to imprve the shng hr he wndrd whthr he mght mtwth anythng aprchng the sme lck as mr he hd the grvstpsble dbts nt tht he wntd in the smlst to pmp stphnbt ms frgsn who ws vry psbly the prtclr ldstr whbrght hm dwn to irshtwn so erly in the mrng as to whthr hwld fnd mch stsfctn bskng in he rmbrd it ws alrdy tmrwfrdy ah yu mn its aftr twlvthe dy bfre ystrdy stphn sd imprvng on hmslfltrly astnd at ths pce of intlgnce blm rflctdthgh thy dnt se eye to eye in evrythng a crtn anlgy thrsmhw inhm whn i mde hm pl ot and do it on me cnsdrng hw bg it iso mch the btr in cse any of it wsnt wshd ot prprly the lstme i lt hm fnsh it in me nce invntn thy mde fr wmn frhm to gt al the plsre bt if alwys wth a sml of chldrn of hr the onthy cld bdgrs or smthng lke a ngr wth a shck of hr ont jsjck the chld is a blck the lst tme i ws thre a sqd ofthm flng ovr one anthr and bwlng yu cldnt hr yr erspsd to be hlthy nt stsfd tl thy hve us swln ot lklphnts or i dnt knw wht spsng i rskd hvng anthr nt ofhm thgh stl if he ws mrd im sre hd hve a fne strng chldbt i dnt knw pldy hs mre spnk in hm ys thtd be awfly jlyi spse it ws mtng jse pwl and the fnrl and thnkng abtme and byln st hm of wl he cn thnk wht he lks nw if thtldo hm any gd i knw thy wre spng a bt whn i cme on the scnhe ws dncng and into a tmpr stl he knws a lt of mxdpthngs espcly abt the bdy and the insde i oftn wntd to stdyp tht myslf wht we hve insde us in tht fmly physcn i cldlwys hr hs vce tlkng whn the rm ws crwd and wtch fnshd tht i cld qte eslygt hm to mke it up any tme i knw hw id evn spsng he gt inwth hr agn and ws gng ot to se hr smwhre id knw if hrfsd to et the ons i knw plnty of wys ask hm to tck dwn thclr of my
