indfrnt whn thy cme ot wth smthng the knd he is whtspls hm i dnt wndr in the lst bcse he ws vry hndsme atht tme tryng to lk lke lrd byrn i sd i lkd thgh hws to btfl fr a mn and he ws a ltle bfre we gt engdftrwrds thgh she dnt lke it so mch the dy i ws in fts oflghng wth the gls i cldnt stp abt al my hrpns flngt one aftr anthr wth the ms of hr i hd yre alwys in grthmr she sd ys bcse it grgd hr bcse whtrcstrw ht to tke the nwns ot of it the lft sde of my fce thbst my blse opn fr hs lst dy trnsprnt knd of shrt he hd icld se hs chst pnk he wntd to tch mne wth hs fr a mntbt i wldnt le hm he ws awfly bcse thy once tk smthng dwn ot of a wmn tht wsp thre fr yrs cvrd wth lmslts thyre al md to gt in thrwhre thy cme ot of yd thnk thy cld nvr go fr engh up andthn thyre dne wth yu in a wy tl the nxt tme ys bcse thrsa wndrfl flng thre so tndr al the tme hw d we fnsh itf ys o ys i pld hm of into my hndkrchf prtndng nt tbe exctd bt i opnd my lgs i wldnt lt hm tch me insde myptct bcse i hd a skrt opng up the sde i trmntd thlfe ot of hm frst tcklng hm i lvd rsng tht dg in the htlrst awkwkwk hs eys sht and a brd flyng blw us he wshy al the sme i lkd hm lke tht mng i mde hm blsh a ltlwhn i gt ovr hm tht wy whn i unbtnd hm and tk hs ot andrw bck the skn it hd a knd of eye in it thyre al btns mndwn the mdle on the wrng sde of thm mly drlng he cld mwht ws hs nme jck je hry mlvy ws it ys i thnk a ltnthe ws rthr fr he hd a lghng knd of a vce so i wnt rnd the whtyclt evrythng ws whtyclt mstche hd he he sdhd cme bck lrd its jst lke ystrdy to me and if i ws mrdhd do it to me and i prmsd hm ys fthfly id lt hm blck mnw flyng prhps hs d or kld or a cptn or admrl its nrly yrs if i sd frtre cve he wld if he cme up bhnd me andpt hs hnds ovr my eys to gs who i mght rcgnse hm hs yngstl abt  prhps hs mrd sme grl on the blck wtr and isqte chngd thy al do thy hvnt hlf the chrctr a wmn hs shltle knws wht i d wth hr blvd hsbnd bfre he evr drmtf hr in brd dylght to in the sght of the whle wrld yu mghtsy thy cld hve pt an artcle abt it in the chrncle i ws a btwld aftr whn i blw ot the old bg the bscts wre in frm bndybrs and expld it lrd wht a bng al the wdcks and pgnscrmng cmng bck the sme wy tht we wnt ovr mdle hl rndby the old grdhse and the jws brlplce prtndng to rd othe hbrw on thm i wntd to fre hs pstl he sd he hdnt one hdnt knw wht to mke of me wth hs pk cp on tht he alwys wrcrkd as oftn as i stld it strght h m s clypso swngng my htht old bshp tht spke of the altr hs lng prch abt wmnshghr fnctns abt grls nw rdng the bcycle and wrng pkcps and the nw wmn blmrs gd snd hm snse and me mre mny ispse thyre cld aftr hm i nvr thght tht wld be mynme blm whn i usd to wrte it in prnt to se hw it lkd on avstng crd or prctsng fr the btchr and oblge m blm yrlkng blmng jse usd to sy aftr i mrd hm wl its btrthn brn or brgs ds brg or thse awfl nms wth btm in thmrs rmsbtm or sme othr knd of a btm mlvy i wldnt go mdbt ethr or spse i dvrcd hm mrs byln my mthr whvr shws mght hve gvn me a ncr nme the lrd knws aftr the lvlyne she hd lnta lrdo the fn we hd rng alng wls rd trpa pnt twstng in and ot al rnd the othr sde of jrsy thywre shkng and dncng abt in my blse lke mlys ltle ons nwhn she rns up the strs i lvd lkng dwn at thm i ws jmpngp at the pr trs and the whte plrs plng the lvs of andthrwng thm at hm he wnt to inda he ws to wrte the vygs thsmn hve to mke to the ends of the wrld and bck its frm on brd i wre tht frckfrm the b mrche prs and the crl ncklce the strts shng icld se ovr to mrco almst the by of tngr whte and the atlsmntn wth snw on it and the strts lke a rvr so clr hrymly drlng of thr ft if evr thy gta chnce of wlkng dwn the almda on an ofcrs arm lke me on thbndnght my eys flsh my bst tht thy hvnt psn gd hlp thrpr hd i knw mre abt mn and lfe whn i ws i s thn thyl alknw at fnrl trsrs as if the one ntre gve wsntngh fr anybdy hwkng hm dwn into the drty old ktchn nw is hrght in hs hd i ask pty it wsnt wshng dy my old pr of drwrsmght hve bn hngng up to on the lne on exhbtn and hm the othr sde of me tlkng abt spnza and hsl thts d i spse mlns of yrs ago i smld the bst icld al in a swmp lng frwrd as if i ws intrstd hvng tst it ot thn to the lst tg i wnt frgt tht wfe of hd bo i bt the ctslf is btr of thn us hve we to mch bld up in us or wht optnce abve its prng ot of me lke the sa anyhw he dnt mkme prgnt as bg as he is i dnt wnt to rn the cln shts i jstpt on i spse usl rwy hse ispse wl its a pr cse tht thse tht hve a fne sn lke ththyre nt stsfd and i ne ws he nt able to mke one it wsnt myflt we cme tgthr whn i ws wtchng the two dgs up in hr bhndn the mdle of the dsclmrs of crtn impldwrnts or the exclsn or lmtn of crtn typs of dmgsf any dsclmr or lmtn st frth in ths agrmnt vlts thlw of the ste aplcble to ths agrmnt the agrmnt shl bntrprtd to mke the mxm dsclmr or lmtn prmtd bythe aplcble ste lw  the invldty or unfrcblty of anyprvsn of ths agrmnt shl nt vd the rmng prvsnsf  indmnty  yu agre to indmnfy and hld the fndtn thtrdmrk ownr any agnt or emplye of the fndtn anynprvdng cps of prjct gtnbrgtm elctrnc wrks in acrdncwth ths agrmnt and any vlntrs asctd wth the prdctnprmtn and dstrbtn of prjct gtnbrgtm elctrnc wrkshrmls frm al lblty csts and expns incldng csctn    infrmtn abt the msn of prjct gtnbrgtmprjct gtnbrgtm is synyms wth the fre dstrbtn oflctrnc wrks in frmts rdble by the wdst vrty of cmptrsncldng obslte old mdlgd and nw cmptrs  it exstsbcse of the efrts of hndrds of vlntrs and dntns frmple in al wlks of lfvlntrs and fncl sprt to prvde vlntrs wth thstnce thy nd is crtcl to rchng prjct gtnbrgtmsgls and ensrng tht the prjct gtnbrgtm clctn wlrmn frly avlble fr gnrtns to cme  in  the prjctgtnbrg ltry archve fndtn ws crtd to prvde a scrnd prmnt ftre fr prjct gtnbrgtm and ftre gnrtnsto lrn mre abt the prjct gtnbrg ltry archve fndtnd hw yr efrts and dntns cn hlp se sctns  and and the fndtn wb pge at htpwpglfrgsctn   infrmtn abt the prjct gtnbrg ltry archvfndtnthe prjct gtnbrg ltry archve fndtn is a n prftc edctnl crprtn orgnzd undr the gbnwbypglfrgsctn   infrmtn abt dntns to the prjct gtnbrgltry archve fndtnprjct gtnbrgtm dpnds upn and cnt srve wtht wdsprd pblc sprt and dntns to cry ot its msn ofncrsng the nmbr of pblc dmn and lcnsd wrks tht cn bfrly dstrbtd in mchne rdble frm acsble by the wdstry of eqpmnt incldng otdtd eqpmnt  mny sml dntns to  are prtclrly imprtnt to mntng tx exmptsts wth the irsthe fndtn is cmtd to cmplyng wth the lws rgltngchrts and chrtble dntns in al  sts of the untdsts  cmplnce rqrmnts are nt unfrm and it tks acnsdrble efrt mch prwrk and mny fs to mt and kp upwth thse rqrmnts  we do nt slct dntns in lctnswhre we hve nt rcvd wrtn cnfrmtn of cmplnce  tsnd dntns or dtrmne the sts of cmplnce fr anyprtclr ste vst htpglfrgwhle we cnt and do nt slct cntrbtns frm sts whre whve nt mt the slctn rqrmnts we knw of no prhbtngnst acptng unslctd dntns frm dnrs in sch sts whprch us wth ofrs to dntntrntnl dntns are grtfly acptd bt we cnt mkny stmnts cncrng tx trtmnt of dntns rcvd frmtsde the untd sts  us lws alne swmp or sml stfplse chck the prjct gtnbrg wb pgs fr crnt dntnmthds and adrs  dntns are acptd in a nmbr of othrwys incldng chcks onlne pymnts and crdt crd dntnsto dnte plse vst htpglfrgdntsctn prjctgtnbrgtm ebks wth only a lse ntwrk of vlntr sprtprjct gtnbrgtm ebks are oftn crtd frm svrl prntdtns al of whch are cnfrmd as pblc dmn in the usnls a cpyrght ntce is incld  ths we do nt ncsrlykp ebks in cmplnce wth any prtclr pr edtnmst ple strt at or wb ste whch hs the mn pg srch fclty     htpwgtnbrgrgths wb ste inclds infrmtn abt prjct gtnbrgtmncldng hw to mke dntns to the prjct gtnbrg
